name: Marippy
summary: Marippy is a Touhou fan game based on the arcade game Mappy. The game has the player play as Marisa Kirisame as she collects items from Alice Margatroid's house which Alice had stole.

name: Marky Mark and the Funky Bunch: Make My Video
summary: Make My Video: Marky Mark and the Funky Bunch is a video game based on real-time editing of music video footage. The setup is that a brother and sister pair is arguing about what would make the best Marky Mark video. Since they can not agree, they enlist help from some other people: A boxer and his trainer, a trio of teenage girls, the members of a garage band, and their parents. Each group has their ideas about what an ideal Marky Mark video should or should not contain. The specifications normally come in the form of a set of pictures they either do or don't want to see, and perhaps some effects. The game has three Marky Mark videos from which to choose: "Good Vibrations", "I Need Money", and "You Gotta Believe".

name: Marvel's Spider-Man: The Heist
summary: Felicia Hardy aka Black Cat, is back in town and leaving mysterious clues around Marvel‚Äôs New York to toy with Spider-Man.

name: Madness Ambulation
summary: Help Sandford and Deimos ride out to save Hank in this following-cam third person chase shooter! Survive all 10 waves if you've got the stomach for it, but be warned...this game will never end. All you can do is survive the Madness for as long as you can grip that wheel for dear life.

name: Mario's Tennis
summary: Mario's Tennis is a tennis game that was released as a launch title for the Virtual Boy. It is the first tennis-related Mario game, and would later be followed by the Mario Tennis series. You get to choose from seven different characters, all with different ability levels, to play against each other in either singles or doubles matches. You can also play in an exhibition or tournament mode.

name: Market Simulator
summary: You've embarked on a journey to acquire your dream market and have finally reached your goal. Now, manage your market to offer friendly service to the neighborhood! Provide a range of products, from beverages to food, cleaning items to electronics, meeting community needs.

name: Market Empire Simulator
summary: Market Empire Simulator is a business management game where you build, run, and optimize your own supermarket. Manage inventory, hire employees, stock shelves, and expand your store to create the ultimate shopping experience.

name: Mainlining
summary: After MI7 has been hacked, your primary goal is to bring a cyber-criminal network to justice. Played entirely from within the environment of your computer's desktop, Mainlining is a thrilling point and click hacking adventure that features a gripping narrative which will have you hooked from the very first case.

name: Maskonauts: Chat'Attack
summary:
Shoot and loot the content of your favorite Twitch channels!
Get in your Maskopod and play in real time with Twitch chats activities! Survive waves of texts, Emoticodes and enemies.
Collect bonuses and try to defeat the Blockbossters and save the Maskotios!

Everything you type in the chat appears in the game!

name: Marble Parkour 2: Roll and Roll
summary: Sequel to marble parkour. Roll more and avoid new traps and play different minigames

name: Master of Orion III
summary: Experience first-hand the challenges of leading one of 16 different races into unequalled galactic supremacy and face a universe of decisions. Set policies, explore, build, declare war, negotiate - put all these elements into motion to guarantee your place in the annals of space and time.

name: Madden NFL 22
summary: Madden NFL 22 is where gameday happens. All-new features in Franchise include staff management, an enhanced scenario engine, and weekly strategy. Share avatar progress and player class between Face of The Franchise and The Yard with unified progression.

name: Magicka: Aspiring Musician Robes
summary: Some wizards are not only terrible spell casters, but terrible musicians as well! Join their ranks, and explore a variety of music history's greatest styles, from the heavy-metal guitar to the cool-but-moist saxophone! Take the lead in Aldrheim's very own misunderstood progressive basement band, adorned with musically inspired robes and powerful magickal instruments.

name: Maid of Sker
summary:
Maid of Sker is a first-person survival horror, set in a remote hotel with a macabre history from Welsh folklore. Brave the nightmares of the Quiet Men. When they arrive, do not panic ‚Äî don't even breathe.

Featuring realistic 4k visuals with gameplay focused on story, exploration and no-weapon survival tactics. Experience a multiple thread narrative where your decisions matter, unlocking different story paths and multiple endings.

A 3D sound based AI system is the core survival gameplay mechanic. Hide, run, creep, trap and distract are some of the techniques you need to master to survive enemies with super hearing. As you progress, enemies become more difficult to avoid, to the point where standing still and holding your breath is the only option!

Time it correctly and you‚Äôre safe, for now. Run out of breath and ‚Äî suffer.

name: Marvel Collect! by Topps
summary: Collect & trade your favorite MARVEL characters with comic book fans around the world in MARVEL Collect! by Topps. Complete daily collector-based missions, trade 24/7, spin the Card Wheel, FUSE lower-tier cards for higher valued inserts, and customize your profile to showcase your collection!

name: Magret & FaceDeBouc
summary: The pilot episode of a likely long series of police investigations. Take control of an unlikely duo consisting of Inspector Magret, a refined duck and Inspector FaceDeBouc a devilishly contrasting goat. Help them solve the mystery of the murder of Mr. Couane, a local merchant found dead in the city.

name: Magicka 2: Ice, Death, and Fury
summary: The most overpowered and irresponsible wizards known to fantasy are back! In this second DLC for Magicka 2 you will experience more spells, outfits, missions, enemies and co-op fun then you can wave a wand at!

name: Mandinga: A Tale of Banzo
summary: Mandinga: A tale of Banzo is a role-playing game with game style of Japanese RPG classics, with a unique battle system using dice in turn-based combat, full of strategy and challenges. A game with an immersive history, based on a historical moment in Brazil.

name: Marvel's Midnight Suns: Digital+ Edition
summary: Marvel's Midnight Suns: Digital+ Edition is a digital special edition of Marvel's Midnight Suns, developed by Firaxis Games and published by 2K Games. Released in December 2022, this edition includes the full game along with 11 Premium Skins at launch, allowing players to customise the appearance of various characters on the Midnight Suns team.

name: Mario & Wario
summary: Mario & Wario is a puzzle game that is compatible with the SNES Mouse. The player chooses Princess Peach, Mario or Yoshi, and Wario proceeds to drop a bucket on their head (the object changes in later levels). The player controls Wanda the fairy to guide the now-blinded character through an obstacle course, to reach Luigi waiting at the end.

name: Major DS: Dream Baseball
summary: MAJOR DS: Dream Baseball is a Nintendo 3DS game developed by Amedio and released by Takara Tomy on July 31, 2008. The game is based on the anime's 3rd and 4th seasons, where the protagonist (name of player's choice) enrolls into Seishu High School until he lands in America to win the League and defeating Joe Gibson Jr.

name: Maze Lovers Memorial
summary: ‚ÄãGuide a marble through 80 physics-based puzzles set in an atmospheric cemetery. Each solved maze brings flowers and a dad joke to the tombstone, viewing death in a lightening and natural way. A meditative game about movement, memory, and a positive view of the acceptance of death.

name: Mashina
summary: A little robot digs to repair her world. Dig, build, discover and mend in a chill, stop-motion world.

name: Master of Jewelry
summary: Master Of Jewelry is a unique open-world jewelry simulation game with survival elements. Explore Diamond City, take your first order, and repair a gold chain in your workshop.

name: Make The Dead Dead Again
summary: In this third-person action-adventure, use Lux‚Äôs gun skills and enhanced DNA abilities to clear out enemies as she searches for her missing mother. Along the way, level up and acquire loot to equip her - and her home base - with an insane variety of customisation options.

name: Match Master
summary: Learn how to make pairs with us. Game for your child in any age.

name: Manuganu
summary: Run, jump and slide from ropes, dodge rocks! Not enough? There is much more in Manuganu. Avoid swinging hammers and jump over moving ice blocks. Don‚Äôt get burned and jump between walls to collect coins and medallions. Break stone blocks and activate platforms before you fall into fog and much more... Manuganu is a 3D side- scroller running game, in which you control the boy ‚ÄúManuganu‚Äù. Unlike other usual running games, Manuganu brings on the ‚ÄúHalt feature‚Äù to avoid swinging rocks, hammers, flames and other enemies with the right timing. Another important feature of Manuganu is the ability to switch from ‚Äúrunning‚Äù mode to ‚Äúrope climbing‚Äù mode when needed. But be careful! This mode has its own challenges.

name: Majesty 2: The Fantasy Kingdom Sim
summary: In the world of Majesty, you are the ruler of the kingdom of Ardania. At your service are your loyal and somewhat obnoxious subordinates, who have their own minds about how things should be done. Majesty is the only game where your heroes decide on their own what should be done and when, leaving you to try to control them through monetary incentives.

name: MannaRites
summary: Fantasy beat'em'up with a bit of RPG flavor and couch co-op. Explore open map, fight brutal enemies, find and equip weapons, armor and artifacts, make your hero stronger by gaining experience and learning unique perks and combat moves!

name: Mars Colony Builder
summary: Discover a whole new world with Mars City Builder! Construct roads, erect buildings customize the city and take care of its safety. After all, you are the first Martian settler and this is a vast, unknown land. Develop it in any way you please!

name: Match Morphosis
summary: Playtest is Live! Match Morphosis is a Roguelike Match-3 Deckbuilder. Match tiles to defeat enemies, gain artifacts, build synergies and unleash powerful combos. Master your way in this unique turn-based RPG. Kill, death, unlock, repeat. No two runs are the same, no timers, no grinding, no mercy.

name: Mario vs. Donkey Kong Card e+: Laser Panic!
summary: Released through CoroCoro Comic sweepstakes on e-Card ID 18-M011. This was one of the levels that were not present in the North American version in its cancelled e-Reader feature.

name: Mage VR -Mini Version-
summary: Do you want to feel the power of mages? In this little game, you will be able to learn the postures that let you canalize the essence of magic itself. Fire balls, and 7 other spells, including Fire dragons will be there with you to help you kill your enemies.

name: Mars Kitchen
summary:
#  Conquer Mars...with Food!

**Mars Kitchen** is a simulation sandbox game on Mars. Meet strange **aliens**, explore different kitchen styles and embark on an **amazing space food journey!**

You are the new chef in charge of all the kitchens: put on your apron and get to work!

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-sea5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499302344_1920834025421709_213157192951065614_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=tdGqeZPBeU8Q7kNvwF1e4tH&_nc_oc=AdkvnHXT2_FuQipr9oManoGBq1I-BINXU8RPyJ8Z34hrZBEFBzNhJPFMngPJyOm3nnc&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-sea5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=QPWuncc3xoDIbD3o6aE6MA&oh=00_AfUwpnNZh3uSLp2WRCSfxYoY8K7dNnFi0FnIJ9rv74IinA&oe=68A91502)

#  Multiple environments
**Sushi, Pizzeria, Food Truck and Earthbucks**: the top Mars Kitchen restaurants are waiting for you, chef!

Start from the Control Room and take a break at the Stadium: **6 different environments** ready to play!

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-sea5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491819407_1030548655540991_4965165447900272799_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=tmhsd8kGEWgQ7kNvwENS2Si&_nc_oc=AdlGQN6tgXHo1uzFn5x4u9o8rr57x-JDsiJlfmELWz2l3tCA4D2UhO-uZT04grJn1QA&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-sea5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=QPWuncc3xoDIbD3o6aE6MA&oh=00_AfWiI6Gt-LeyN_DhTj2Xrvatg_iqfxgfUkK_VhZUmZQpew&oe=68A914CF)

#  Unleash your Creativity
Tidy or messy? Clean or chaotic? Break everything or put it all back in place? You decide what kind of **space chef** you are!

#  Unexpected Minigames
Slice flying fruit, launch pizzas at targets, score shots in giant cups, and more!

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-sea1-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491819302_2258882724541466_1590583165959343270_n.mp4?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=vkkNNk5eO_wQ7kNvwEJaJFE&_nc_oc=Adl21ItZ6Bh6t5CtfpKJf3bPV9rkl_um5aTUUisjzMlb8fIOX3iKOD1ZMBnSEF-_ti4&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-sea1-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=QPWuncc3xoDIbD3o6aE6MA&oh=00_AfVF0b2z3WY6r2bjwtNR9nWCBFR59fgPZ60AtaNP5PmvqA&oe=68A8F6FD)

#  Quests, Recipes, a lot of work!
*100+ unique quests* to complete with dozens of recipes and items to use: are you able to satisfy all your customers?
# üö® Surprises Around Every Corner
Zero gravity, fly invasions, and a mysterious villain with a hidden agenda. Stay sharp, Space Chef!

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-sea1-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491819354_1775816272973073_100002061955271398_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=yhOUHalGyfQQ7kNvwGYGil1&_nc_oc=Adlc8eVdpLDXhylfmG_YzMHN6sC39bFWX11VdPoO2sI1DP0WB2lHT2mlue3b60UY4VA&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-sea1-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=QPWuncc3xoDIbD3o6aE6MA&oh=00_AfWWp2C-Q45QPXxNypiE9fNCPanEE1huUsB-yIQGLvFZOw&oe=68A8EC04)

# Ô∏è Meet the martians
Aliens are all over the place! Each of them with their own story and tastes. Will you be able to save them from the nefarious Fazar?

# üß¢ Steal Alien Accessories
Snatch fashion gear from aliens and mix & match styles to dress others. Create the perfect look for the little Martian locals

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-sea5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491830794_1087066250157470_2363422553177748483_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=H35r_cmyeKoQ7kNvwG24OQC&_nc_oc=Adn4ytzZbO5237aHFpv8FXs3JNb6NULIX_IvjaRBql9TI7eg0U1nOD3ECIfFQqLXlIE&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-sea5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=QPWuncc3xoDIbD3o6aE6MA&oh=00_AfUjlD0IUkcMBK93sYtJDkFPvYxuDQrLD-vwcvsGT_7k8Q&oe=68A8F9D6)

name: Maka Maka
summary: Maka Maka (Êë©Ë®∂Êë©Ë®∂) is a Japan-exclusive role-playing video game which was released in 1992. The characters were designed by Koji Aihara.

name: Mayban
summary: We've been informed of the existence of colours. This is very troubling.

name: Maui Mallard in Cold Shadow
summary: Maui Mallard in Cold Shadow is the PC port of Donald in Maui Mallard. Although it shares the same name as the SNES version, this port is actually based on the Genesis game.

name: Marmalade Boy
summary: Marmalade Boy is an otome game, developed by Kuusou Kagaku and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 1995. It is based off the anime Marmalade Boy.

name: Master RNG
summary: A simple 2d game where you roll for different items! These items you get will become rarer and rarer as you collect them.

name: Malstrum's Mansion
summary:
"Something sinister happens every night in a cursed mansion in Vienna. Some years have passed since the second plague epidemic, and you are the only descendant of the Malstrum's family who will dare enter the mansion, and discover what happened in that haunted place."

Malstrum's Mansion is a free, browser-based adventure game inspired by Shadowgate and the other "MacVenture" games by ICOM Simulations. Developed by ACE Team, it was originally drawn and designed in 1989 for a Mac Plus, but it didn't see the light until April 2009, when it was created as a free flash game. The game also serves as a bit of viral marketing for the team's first commercial game, Zeno Clash.

name: Manipulus
summary:
Manipulus is a thrilling deck-building, choose-your-own-adventure game with rogue-like mechanics and perma-death. Trapped by mysterious forces, you are made to relive your past, guiding a band of survivors through perilous times.

As a Manipuli general, form strategic defensive lines and manoeuvre your followers to activate wild abilities to defeat the oncoming monsters and lead your band to safety. Re-play your cards, re-live your actions, and fight to keep your refugees alive in this dark and captivating adventure.

It's time to FORM THE MANIPULUS!

name: Majestic Nights
summary: Majestic Nights is an episodic action-adventure-thriller set in an alternate 1980s where all conspiracy theories, past and present are True. It‚Äôs the bright and brash 1980s; a world crammed with hidden intrigue and sinister plots, government cover-ups and alien sightings, CIA experiments and the Truth.

name: Marvel: Ultimate Alliance
summary: Marvel: Ultimate Alliance is an action role playing game set within the fictional Marvel Universe. It features many of the superheroes, supervillains, and supporting characters that appear in publications by Marvel Comics.

name: Makeup ASMR: Makeover Story
summary:
Imagine transforming a rotting mermaid into an enchanting human.
How to turn a scruffy beggar into a handsome man?
Have flies or bees ever invaded your eyes?
Can you still kiss your girlfriend with cracked lips?

Don't worry, we have the answers! But we offer much more‚Äî

name: Mad Streets
summary: A physics-based couch multiplayer fighter game, casting a wide variety of characters and combat to bring a memorable beat-em-up party experience. Pick up some controllers and settle the score, in Mad Streets!

name: Major Minor 2.0: (Re)Vision
summary: Become intertwined in the fateful connection plaguing two worlds, bound together by a murder mystery, and a competition for the throne of a god. The award-winning visual novel, completely revamped! New script, new choices, and romance! Become The Savior today, and choose wisely...

name: Master of 4 Swords
summary: Master of 4 Swords is a fast-paced 2D action slasher where your weapon never leaves your side ‚Äî literally.

name: Mayhem in Monsterland
summary: An apprentice magician dinosaur living in Monsterland, Theo Saurus, made a mistake while practising a spell one day. He turned the lands Jellyland, Pipeland, Spottyland, Cherryland, and Rockland into sad places, void of color or life. Theo began living underground in a hidden cave to avoid the wrath of the other monsters until discovered one day by the hero of the story, Mayhem. Mayhem promised to bring Theo the necessary magic dust to transform Monsterland to its previous happy state.

name: Maho Shojo Pretty Sammy: Heart no Kimochi
summary: Heart no Kimochi is the second Saturn release in the Maho Shojo Pretty Sammy games.

name: Making Fiends: Pumpin Plunkin'
summary:
Pumpkin Plunkin' is a Flash game made by Amy Winfrey for the Making Fiends website. It is also available at Nicktoons' site.

At the beginning of the game, the rules are explained by both Charlotte and Vendetta. The overall objective is to throw pumpkins at Charlotte while she moves around the screen in various costumes.

name: Markus's Miasma
summary: Explore a fog-choked, twisted version of UCSC in this 2D puzzle horror game, where cryptic clues and buried memories reveal the disturbing truth behind one man's obsession...

name: MASCII Maker
summary:
MASCII Maker is a puzzle map creator with a classic retro-style of ASCII art graphics. 
 
The game is designed to make and share challenging maps with your friends. 
 
There's only a spanish version available.

name: Many Bricks Breaker
summary:
Many Bricks Breaker is a Brick Breaker game.
You need to break many bricks.

name: Maisons de repos
summary: Maison's de repos is a pure and realistic horror videogame based on true events.

name: Magical Taluluto-kun: Magic Adventure
summary: Taluluto must cross levels in five worlds to reach and defeat Raivar to save Honmaru's girlfriend Iyona. Use the many powerups and the assistance from Magical Taluluto's friends to overcome all obstacles.

name: Mage World: The Wizard's Stone
summary: "Mage World: The Wizard's Stone" offers a mystical platformer journey, on your adventure you need to beat bosses to get new spells. Be the heroine in 79+ levels and bring back the peace to the kingdom of Mage World.

name: Madoro-Mu
summary: Madoro-Mu is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Isokishi who, unlike most fangames, uses her bed to save and exits her room directly to the Nexus. Rather than having a nexus full of doors, Isokishi's nexus consists of three windows. One is nailed shut until later in the game. There is little to no sound in the game.

name: Mahjong 16 TW
summary: Enjoy the most authentic Taiwanese 16-Tile Mahjong anytime, anywhere! Multiplayer & AI Matches ‚Äì Play with friends online or challenge AI with four difficulty levels! Voice Announcements ‚Äì No need to stare at the screen, hear your opponents' moves instantly!

name: Maze Adventure
summary: level-based puzzle game. Mechanic/sprinter enter time portal, caught by savages, escape. Levels need map move, clues, signals. Sneak; rescue/steal/assassinate + escape. Tighter defenses later, test strategy.

name: Makoto Wakaido's Case Files: Executioner's Wedge
summary: Solve the mystery of decapitated bodies in a point-and-click, pixel art mystery adventure game. Discover clues and solve puzzles to progress.

name: Malignant Survivors II
summary: Enter a world consumed by nightmares, ancient ruins, forbidden magic, and mountains of loot. Battle relentless enemy hordes, grow stronger with every run, and uncover the dark secrets of a forgotten land.

name: Magic City Detective: The Carnival Begins DLC
summary: Prepare to be challenged, thrilled, and enchanted. Can you maintain your integrity when faced with the allure of forbidden knowledge and power?

name: Madoka Magica Magia Exedra
summary: Characters from the hit anime series "Puella Magi Madoka Magica" come together! Featuring an all-new story setting and characters from the original ideas of Gekidan Inu Curry (Doroinu), experience the action alongside Magical Girl memories in this battle RPG!

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: Ceramic Mosaic
summary: A huge collection of 75 puzzles uses broken ceramic shards to create vibrant and exciting mosaics that transform fragments into works of art.

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: Pixel Dreams
summary: Pixel Dreams is a whimsical journey through a world built one pixel at a time. This series of 30 puzzles brings to life fantastical creatures and magical landscapes.

name: Mario no Photopi: Illustrations - Postal Cards 1
Mario no Photopi: Characters Collection - Sylvanian Families
Mario no Photopi: Characters Collection - Himitsu no Akko-chan
Mario no Photopi: Characters Collection - Cardcaptor Sakura
Mario no Photopi: Characters Collection - Yoshi's Story
Mario no Photopi: Illustrations - Funny Accessories 1
Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: Fantastic Landscape
summary: This collection of 39 Fantasy Landscape images is a series of unique and creative environments. Each scene offers a fresh take on nature, blending reality with elements of fantasy.

name: Mario no Photopi: Characters Collection - Zelda no Densetsu: Toki no Ocarina
Mario no Photopi: Characters Collection - Hello Kitty
Mario no Photopi: Characters Collection - Medarot
Makai Prince Dorabochan
summary:
A side-scrolling 2D platformer featuring a magical demon prince. As well as his own magic, he can also depend on his loyal Moai servants to make bridges. The predecessor of The Twisted Tales of Spike McFang.

Makai Prince Dorabocchan ("Demon Prince Dorabo") is a 2D platformer for the PC Engine. The player controls the titular character who is on a quest to rescue his master and defeat the evil demons that have invaded the kingdom.

As well as his own magical powers, he can be upgraded by finding suits of armor which boost his abilities as well as temporary power-ups that provide double-jumping, a syringe weapon that stuns enemies and cleats that allow him to jump on enemies to defeat them. If he finds a bat with a bell, he can summon his burly Moai guardians who use their stone bodies to create bridges that allow Dorabo to move forward or find secret areas.

Dorabocchan would later appear in the top-down 1993 Super Nintendo action-adventure game Chou Makai Taisen! Dorabocchan, which was localized in the west as The Twisted Tales of Spike McFang, and would also headline the 1994 Super Famicom golf game Super Naxat Open: Golf de Shoubu da! Dorabocchan.

name: Mana Spark
summary: A challenging action RPG with deep souls-like combat and rogue-like elements. Explore a dreadful dungeon and fight smart enemies that will plan and collaborate between themselves to defeat you.

name: Marrow
summary:
Tchernobog lays dead, his form fading away from the world as Caleb turns his back to the smoldering corpse. Vengeance sated, he leaves the Hall of the Epiphany behind. Feeling no less disdain for the world than he did with Ophelia, and experiencing none of the joy she brought, he returns to the grave to die once more. A hopefully final resting place.

The Cabal had been scattered far and wide by the gunman's path of revenge, but in his absence they regathered, regrouped, motivated out of their own sense of vengeance. Caleb was their general, the chosen one of their dark god and he had betrayed them all twice over.

He must burn for rejecting the honor of being sacrificed, for striking at Tchernobog. This suffering is best repaid by the tongues of Cerberus. Gathering his remains, the diaspora cinders of his pit, they enacted plans to resurrect him, and sought out Caleb's newfound grave, and bring him face to face with a fiery end.

name: Maze 4D
summary: This game is a 4D maze puzzle game featuring Time Trials, standard, and other modes coming soon! Compete with yourself and friends in two categories: Time and Minimum Number of Moves!

name: Mace and Grace
summary: Protect your Grace and Kingdom. Have a blast dodging bombs and smashing enemy knights. Seize the day and go for another round. Play the most furious Medieval arcade ever!

name: Maelstrom: The Battle for Earth Begins
summary: In the space of fifty years, Earth changed from a planet on cusp of a challenging future to a world a breath away from lifelessness and plunged into an apocalyptic time of ecological disaster, global warfare and the meltdown of human civilization. This is the time of the Maelstrom. In this ravaged world, the planet's dwindling resources have divided what remains of mankind in two: the urban freedom fighting 'Remnants' and the technologically advanced 'Ascension'. Now they must wage war against a new threat, the invasion of a savage alien race, the Hai-Genti, and each other in a desperate struggle for supremacy and survival. Through the game's missions, take command from different viewpoints and employ faction-specific tactics and weaponry to achieve your objectives. Complete with the ability to terraform landscapes and transform units, Maelstrom provides gamers with the power to harness the forces of nature in the most frantic, destructive, action-packed RTS game yet.

name: Mayhem Heroes
summary: Mayhem Heroes is a frenetic beat'em up where you have to take down as many opponents as possible and, ideally, be the last one standing. Use punches, kicks, special moves and power ups to send your opponents flying out of the arena. Play with up to 4 friends and show them who's the boss!

name: Mater's Tires
summary: Variant of Hide and Seek included in Lexibook's Disney Cars Portable Game Console.

name: Madu Maths
summary: Based on a school curriculum, Madu Maths tests primary school kids in addition and subtraction as they help bees collect honey for their hive. A solo developer effort, Madu Maths boasts challenging gameplay coupled with an original score and organic graphics to make for a fulfilling experience.

name: Man of War II: Chains of Command
summary:
The sequel to Man of War adds improved 3D graphics, allowing you to walk around your ship in a first person perspective. Your task is to command the ship, dictating what your crew is doing - repair work, navigation, preparation for battle and preparation for boarding other ships have to be balanced. Different ranks change the way you play the campaigns.

Campaigns include The Wooden Walls of England (fight as the British in the Anglo-French wars in the Channel) or John Paul Jones (where you play the hero role, and lead the American Navy). There are also 20 smaller campaigns to play through. A few distinct multiplayer modes exist to to challenge your mates, and answer the age-old question "Who is the best captain?" A scenario editor completes the package.

name: Mashed: Fully Loaded
summary: An expansed release edition of the game that plays like a spiritual successor of the Micro Machines series, Mashed: Fully Loaded includes six training modes, new tournaments, improved power-ups, graphic and special effects upgrades, plus new tracks, track variations, vehicles, and single-player challenges.

name: Mahjong Safari HD
summary: Play animal matchmaker in this wild new take on mahjong. Match animal tiles with a connecting line that has two or fewer turns. The further apart the tiles, the more points you get for making a match. Make multiple matches in quick succession to score combos. The longer your combo streak, the more points you win.

name: Magic Architect: Into Disaster
summary: "Embark on a journey to master your magical build! Will you choose 3-Way, Spread, or Rapid Fire? This is a one-man army shooter! Cultivate your magic, sell it off, and rake in the profits! You can choose your character and the magic you want to grow. Get rich in the blink of an eye!"

name: Major Mayhem
summary: Arcade cover shooter inspired by Time Crisis, Metal Slug and 80's action heros! He's got an itchy trigger finger, some scratchy stubble, and a fondness for shooting dudes in the face. Run and gun your way through gorgeous 3D environments as you embark on a mission to rescue your kidnapped girlfriend from the Forces of Evil. Guns, grenades and an assortment of other tools of destruction are at your disposal, and you'll need every last one of 'em. So what are you waiting for, Major Mayhem? The future of the Free World -- and your love life -- hangs in the balance.

name: Mahjong Sanctuary
summary: Create a thriving wildlife preserve. Play through mahjong puzzles and win stars to build and upgrade your habitats. Bring your sanctuary to life with lions, elephants and more.

name: Mary-Kate and Ashley: Sweet 16 - Licensed to Drive
summary:
Mary-Kate and Ashley: Sweet 16: Licensed to Drive is a party game four up to four players. You play as Mary-Kate, Ashley or one of their friends. As they just turned sixteen, they drive around the game boards, which look like cities, in their own cars.

In each turn of the main adventure mode, a spinner determines how far each player goes. Some spaces have special actions that move the player, assess fines or grant bonus, or allow the player to purchase items to help them in the game. If two players land on the same space, there is a head-to-head competition to determine who can stay. At the end of each round, there is a four-player minigame. These minigames can involve racing racing, windsurfing, kayaking, assembling a car from pieces to match a picture, tag, reflexes or any number of other things. Coins to purchase helpful items are awarded based on performance in these games.

There is also a Bring It On mode where victory is determined by winning a set number of minigames. This can be played with or without the game board and an Arcade mode, which allows you to just play the minigames.

name: Mato Anomalies: Digital Shadows
summary:
Digital Shadows is the first expansion for Mato Anomalies giving you the opportunity to dive deeper into the game's rich narrative. But this time, from ""the other side"".
Take control of Gram's android companion SkyEye and team up with Mist to explore the virtual dimension of Mato and free it from the digital threats lurking in the dark web.

name: Makaimura Gaiden: The Demon Darkness
summary: Makaimura Gaiden: The Demon Darkness is a action platforming game released in Japan for the Game Boy in 1993. It is the second title for the handheld platform featuring the demon Red Arremer (also known outside of Japan as Firebrand, a boss from Ghosts 'n Goblin) as the player character. The game was originally set to be localized in English as Gargoyle's Quest II, but North American release plans were eventually cancelled.

name: Magic Wardrobe
summary: Design and color historical clothes while learning about famous women by reading news profiles on famous women through time and diaries and writing your own. Girls will have fun on the traveling adventure to 12 historical periods in time.

name: Masters of Puzzle
summary: Enter the ultimate jigsaw puzzle experience with Masters of Puzzle - a full 3D, physics enabled, beautiful simulation game. Invite friends for a great multi-player experience or enjoy a solo relaxed session just for you.

name: Maou ga Ochiru Hi
summary:
The final boss "Demon King" comes to defeat the main character on the promised day!
With only one year left, you must develop your hero through training and adventure, assemble the strongest party from 15 friends with strong personalities, and intercept the approaching Demon Lord!

If you go as far as you can, you can get to the ending in 5 minutes from the start, it's a
super easy RPG!

Whew! To be blunt, that's a very extreme example.

Although it is a popular genre most loved by Japan, it has evolved (?) to extend the play time. I can't do it anymore! This work, "The Day the Demon King Falls," is the antithesis of an RPG that has come to the level of RPG, or rather, it is a counter-evolutionary form that has come to the answer.

The time to play one time until the ending is about 1~2 hours, even for those who are frequent adventurers. A person who doesn't venture at all and is a recluse... Well, the shortest is about 5 minutes (laughs).

There is also the peculiarity of this game that the final boss goes out of his way to defeat the main character, so the time to play one time is extremely short, but instead you can easily play it as many times as you want. It is a game that can be played for a long time, saying that there is a new discovery every time you play.

By all means, I would like you to clear this about 40 ~ 50 times (laughs).

RPGs have evolved in a way that is quite biased (?) in response to general needs such as "volume" and "can be played for a long time". How about a game like this?

Some of the characters are also irresistibly attractive! (laughs)

name: Manos: Hands of Fate
summary:
Remember how every film had it's own platform game adaptation? When every man, woman, child, animal and inanimate object were out to get your character? When the streets were filled with bats, ghosts and Frankenstein monsters? MANOS: Director‚Äôs Cut will take you back to the absurd adaptations of the past! 
 
Lost on their vacation, Mike and his family have wandered the desert trying to find a place to stay, only to wind up in the mysterious Valley Lodge. Maintained by Torgo, an unusual man/satyr who "takes care of the place while The Master is away", the hotel is swimming with paranormal activity which Mike has to brave through to find his now missing family. Who is The Master, and what does he want with Mike's family? Armed with his trusty revolver, Mike will have to wander the haunted halls, venture out into the desert, uncover a dark temple and battle the forces of darkness to find out! 
 
-The worst movie of all time is now a video game! 
-Homages to all of your least favourite terrible movies and games! 
-Retro-style cut-scenes telling the not-so-classic story of MANOS, with art by Matt Kap, the pixel artist from The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth and Castle in the Darkness. 
-Unlockable PLAY AS TORGO mode

name: Mario Sports Mix
summary:
The games include volleyball, hockey (both field and ice), dodgeball, and basketball in the vein of the two companies' earlier collaboration, Mario Hoops 3 on 3. There are power-up items which give advantages to the team that attains them. Each game has an Exhibition mode, in which up to four human players compete in individual matches, and Tournament mode, where up to three players play matches in a tournament structure, with modes of difficulty named Mushroom, Flower and Star.

Mario Sports Mix also includes several party games based on the mechanics of each sport. Smash Skate is based on Hockey, Bob-omb Dodge is based on Dodgeball, Feed Petey is based on Basketball, and Harmony Hustle is based on Volleyball.

name: Magical Date: Doki-doki Kokuhaku Daisakusen
summary:
Magical Date is a skill game and dating sim published by Taito in 1996 for arcade and PlayStation. In this game, the player picks one of three possible girls to date and then starts off in a square as in a board game, proceeding to other squares which have different mini games. At junction points the player is asked questions about their date and has to pick the correct answer, or she will become upset.

Released in October 1996 in Japan only. The subtitle of this game translates from Japanese as 'Cruel Heartthrob Tactics'.

name: Make It Last: While You Can
summary:
Make It Last: While You Can is a visual novel that is set during the mid-2000's and is a stand alone side story that takes place in the same world as Destiny Fails Us: A New Life and Make It Last, approximately 10 years before the events of those games.
You don't need to have any knowledge from the other games to play Make It Last: While You Can.

name: M.A.D.
summary: M.A.D. (which stands for Missile Attack and Defense) is an arcade action game somewhat similar to Missile Command. You control a photon cannon at the bottom of the screen, and your goal is to protect six energy stations located to your left and right. Waves of rockets and other ships will fly by on the screen, and occasionally one will drop in an attempt to destroy one of the stations (as a warning on most levels, the enemy will turn white just before it drops). You need to make sure you shoot it before your energy station is destroyed! When all six energy stations are gone, the game is over. A two player variation is also included; one player will control the photon cannon, and the second player controls a cursor and can select when and where an enemy will drop. The players alternate between offense and defense in this version.

name: Mad Truck Challenge
summary:
Get ready to roll with Monster Trucks!
Gear up for roaring, action-packed race battles against the meanest Monster Trucks you‚Äôve ever seen! They‚Äôre waiting for you at the Mad Truck Challenge starting line. Strap up for a relentless racing simulator that will have your adrenaline pumping. Select your truck, armed with rockets, and race against the toughest off-road drivers on the planet. Crush and blast your way to victory while you perform extreme stunts and make your opponents bite the dust to earn the coveted MTC trophy.

name: Man, I Love Terraria Fishing
summary: Man, I Love Terraria Fishing is a short Terraria-themed fishing game.

name: Mayhem Maidens
summary: Ready for some chaos? Command 5 characters in this Roguelite Tower Defense! Build your dream team, crush enemies, and have a blast with adorable pixel art!

name: Mapas do Horizonte - Um jogo para conhecer BH
summary: Neste jogo infanto-juvenil gratuito que re√∫ne quebra-cabe√ßas em formatos diversos e jogos de encontrar objetos, o jogador conhece um pouco mais sobre a hist√≥ria da capital mineira ao passar por diversos desafios junto da professora Clara, da motorista Suely e da turma de alunos!

name: Maximum Fighterz: Direct Offensive Action
summary: Competitive fighting game fun, appropriate for all.

name: Mahjong Dream
summary: "Mahjong Dream" is the world's first 3D anime-style multiplayer, cross-platform mahjong and card game. It includes Riichi, Sichuan, Taiwanese, Hong Kong Mahjong, Dou Dizhu, Guandan, and more. Lead anime-style mahjong warriors to conquer the competitive mahjong world.

name: Mario Party 10
summary: Mario Party 10 has tons of fun new ways to play, challenge, and triumph over your friends, with new modes and a wealth of other exciting goodies. Strategize your way around a variety of unique boards to gather coins and stars, and best your buddies. In Bowser Party mode, you can take the role of bad guy Bowser to mess with your friends‚Äô game. Need to let off some steam? Challenge your friends to a bunch of exciting minigames, unlock bonus content, and more.

name: Magical Mysteries: Path of the Sorceress
summary: Magical Mysteries is a game of brain-teasing puzzles and fast-paced match-3 battles in a magical 3D fantasy world. Search for enchanted scrolls, make useful potions and beat your mysterious enemies! Improve your spells and unravel the story of the Sorceress.

name: Mappy-Land
summary: Mappy, who is a policeman, prepared all kinds of wonderful birthday presents for his girlfriend, Mapico. But, Nyamco and his child Mukies have hidden them in the eight towns of Mappyland. What a pity! Mappy must hurry to get the presents back before Mapico's birthday party. The problem is that there are so many mysterious towns where Mappy must search, while fighting off his enemies. Can you accept the challenge and help Mappy to succeed?

name: Mana Battle
summary: Build your ultimate hero guild, master positioning, triggers, and try to get a Gold Victory in this turn-based strategy game. Choose a powerful core crystal, unlock devastating synergies, and climb to the top with each match. Every decision matters!

name: Mahjong Haouden: Kaiser's Quest
summary:
A mahjong game with an RPG element. Players move around a map beating monsters at mahjong.

Mahjong Haouden: Kaiser's Quest ("Mahjong Overlord: Kaiser's Quest") is a mahjong game released exclusively for the PC Engine. The game features a handful of RPG heroes as they set out to remove the various monsters and villains that have taken over their kingdom. To defeat these monsters, the player must beat them in mahjong games. The player has three characters they can choose between initially, and more become available later.

The mahjong side of the game offers a standard one-vs-one mode. The player has to win a few games to obtain 100% of the points available, and more points can be earned depending on how the player won.

name: Mario Kart 8
summary: Turn your racing experience upside down! Nintendo‚Äôs Mario Kart franchise comes to the Wii U console in full HD, introducing new racing circuit designs and anti-gravity karts that will have players driving upside down. And for the first time, all of Bowser‚Äôs seven Koopalings are playable characters-- get a taste of being bad on the race track by playing as Iggy, Larry, Lemmy, Ludwig, Morton, Roy and Wendy. Players will also enjoy a variety of series-favorite features, including the return of 12-player online competitive play, hang-gliders, underwater racing and motorbikes.
developers: Nintendo EAD Software Development Group No.1

name: Mario Andretti Racing
summary:
Italian-born Mario Andretti is one of the most successful racing drivers in the US scene, and five of his relatives have also raced professionally. This game allows you to sample Indy cars, stock cars and sprint cars, all of which have been graced by Andrettis. The physics are customized to each of these, so expect sprint cars to slide around on the dirt tracks, and the slipstream effect is detectable.

There are 27 computer-controlled cars with individual profiles, and 8 cars to choose from in each race, with varying engine, grip, brakes and pit crew standards. You can view the action either from behind the car, or from the nose. In longer races you must monitor the pit strategy, with the options of a splash 'n' dash stop if your tires are still fine.

name: Marvel Pinball: Avengers Chronicles
summary:
Avengers Chronicles is a collection of DLC pinball tables for Pinball FX2 as well as Marvel Pinball. It includes four pinball tables not available separately for the platforms listed here:
-Fear Itself
-Marvel's The Avengers
-The Infinity Gauntlet
-World War Hulk

name: Manor Mania
summary: Manor Mania is a Metrovania Randomizer game nut scaled down in size with more focus on replayability. It has a handcrafted map, equippable gear/weapons, and random Powerups that help you navigate the manor. Many randomized elements ensure variety for each run.

name: Mario Golf: Advance Tour
summary: Grab your clubs and start down the road to golfing perfection in this role-playing golf adventure! Chat up the locals at golf clinics, hone your skills in challenges like Club Slots and Go-Go Gates, and try to become the champ of all the country clubs! The Mushroom Kingdom residents take on only the very best.

name: Magic Dodgeball: Homeless Edition
summary: A chaotic PvP action bullet hell where unemployed wizards battle in magical dodgeball duels. Fight with your friends, choose buffs between rounds and build absurdly powerful spell combos to survive and entertain!

name: Mario's Keep Co-op
summary: A co-op version of Mario's Keep, a Super Mario Bros. puzzle ROM hack.

name: Margin of Error
summary: Margin of Error is a Balatro-inspired roguelike deck-building game with a mathematical puzzle twist, where you play not just with numbers - but also with logic and strategy. it features a card system with numbers 0-9 and unique operators like +, -, √ó, (pi), etc.

name: Maru's Mission
summary:
The Master Traveler takes on the Monsters of the World.

Play as the ninja Maru in this action-packed side-scrolling game that will take you on a journey across the world. While Maru is out for a walk with his girlfriend Cori, an evil samurai named Muramasa suddenly appears and kidnaps her. In Maru's efforts to track her down and rescue her, he must face a number of mythological monsters while gaining new and powerful weapons in order to defeat them. Using the hints that are left behind by his enemies, Maru will follow a trail that will lead him across six different locations - including the bug-infested forests of America and the scorching deserts of Egypt. Help our hero on his mission as he fights to rescue Cori.

name: Mad Machines
summary: Mad Machines, a new indie online multiplayer PC game that puts you in control of a magnetic robot gladiator. Teams of 3 face off in a hockey-like game (only there‚Äôs a spike-ball instead of a puck) that requires precise skill and an eagerness to kick ass.

name: MazeCraft
summary: Turn based pixel art roguelike RPG for hardcore players. Procedural generation of mazes and caves. A large number of characteristics of the game world. Monsters hunt the player and fight each other. Strong boss and his minions. Each new game is unique and randomized as much as possible.

name: Math it Right 3D Adventure
summary: Play some great and exciting math challenges with Math it Right 3D Adventure, the math game for your kids aged 6 to 9. Join Pilipili the dragon on his quest to master the foundation of arithmetic and times tables, defeat the mischievous Thanatos and save your friends from Dragon City.

name: Mary's Quest
summary: Help May conquer the summit in this charming 2D adventure! Leap across platforms, avoid tricky traps, and master each chapter. Test your reflexes, explore vibrant environments, and conquer the mountain in this indie adventure.

name: Mazes and Mages
summary: In Mazes and Mages you have to find your way in random mazes and play card duels against enemies.

name: Magical Drop III: Yokubari Tokudaigou!
summary:
Magical Drop III was ported twice to the Sony PlayStation. The first PlayStation port, Magical Drop III: Yokubari Tokudaigou!, and features a mode that attempts to play similar to the arcade version alongside the Saturn's "special" rebalanced mode.

Despite the "arcade" version visually mimicking the Neo Geo AES version (down to emulating the starting menu), there are several gameplay and graphical quirks that suggest that it is an adjusted version of the "special" mode rather than a direct port.

The choice between Arcade and Special mode is given to the player immediately upon booting the game, and the system must be reset to switch.

name: Malkyrs: Les Ar√®nes de L'Eternit√©
summary: Malkyrs : les Ar√®nes de l‚Äô√âternit√© est un jeu de cartes √† jouer et √† collectionner connect√© et √©volutif. Comme tout jeu de cartes, vous aurez besoin de ces derni√®res pour jouer, le tout accompagn√© de nombreuses r√®gles sp√©cifiques aux Ar√®nes de l‚Äô√âternit√©.

name: Mario Golf
summary: The Game Boy Color version of Mario Golf, differing from the Nintendo 64 counterpart, includes RPG elements and has an isometric view with sprite-based graphics.

name: Mana Khemia 2: Fall of Alchemy
summary: The 10th core Atelier game and the second game in the Mana Khemia series.

name: Mahjong Sex & Girls
summary: „ÄäMahjong, Sex & Girls„Äã is a lighthearted adult mahjong game. You are the part-time worker at the mahjong parlor. Besides getting entangled in various heart-pounding interactions with the female characters, even the boss lady has her eyes on your body...

name: Mario Golf: World Tour
summary: Luigi and his Mushroom Kingdom neighbors are teeing up once again in Mario Golf: World Tour. The Nintendo 3DS game includes both simple controls and a deeper experience for golf fans, plus courses that range from traditional to those inspired by the Mushroom Kingdom

name: MapleStory: Unmei no Shoujo
summary:
MapleStory: Unmei no Shoujo is the first title from the franchise to be released on the 3DS and represents a big step forward for the series. It sees you take control of a young girl who has a mysterious spirit trapped inside her and the only way for her to be rid of it is to head out on an adventure!

The game will retain its simplistic look and playing style, with characters drawn up as sprites and everything being controlled by a single button. In keeping with the RPG genre you'll be able to customise your character by selecting her weapon speciality and giving her a specific skill set.

name: Mario & Sonic at the Rio 2016 Olympic Games
summary: A new 3DS game sees Mario and Sonic team up to compete in a whole range of different Olympic games. You can download to three other 3DS‚Äôs and play four players in each of the different events. There‚Äôs also a Pocket Marathon mode than uses the motion sensor in the 3DS to act like a pedometer and challenge people to get outside and get active.

name: Marsupilami: Hoobadventure - Collector's Edition
summary:
Marsupilami: Hoobadventure - Collector's Edition includes:
- Game: Marsupilami: Hoobadventure
- 2 sticker sheets
- 1 Double-sided Door Hanger
- 14cm Marsupilami figurine

name: Mario Land: Minigame Mayhem
summary:
Mario Land: Minigame Mayhem is a fan made game based on Mario Party minigames.

Features:

- Over 80 Minigames to discover and complete to test your wits, timing and skill!
- Playing Minigames costs coins. Earn coins by completing Minigame and spend them on other games or cosmetic items!
- Dozens of Achievements to unlock by completing various challenges!
- Compete with other players for online high scores!
- Buy outfits to style yourself in both Minigames and The Overworld!
- Spend coins on over 60 different figurines!
- Play Mario-styled versions of classic Arcade games such as Frogger, Space Invaders or even Tetris!
- Listen to dozens of classic, Super Nintendo tunes from various Mario games!
- Keep up to date with the Updater that will let you know when new content is available!

name: Maze Mayhem
summary: Welcome to the mazes of mayhem. A current work in progress that in now ready for public input. The goal of the game is as simple as simple can be. Traverse your way through maze like levels and collect the star at the end. Do you have what it takes to make it to the end?

name: Massive Assault
summary: Take the command of Free Nations Union forces and defeat the Phantom League on one of six distant planets. The rebels decided to seize the power on Earth by first conquering the space colonies, which provide vital energy resources to AOG. The war for global domination unrolls on continents, at sea, and in the air. With secret allies, you can disclose and provide troops at any moment, surprisingly shifting the power balance in a particular region. Lead your divisions, fleets, and air squadrons against those who dared threaten our freedom and democracy.

name: Mario Teaches Typing
summary: Mario Teaches Typing is one of the few licensed Mario computer titles. As the title suggests, Mario Teaches Typing was designed for improving a computer user's typing skills. Kids with no typing experience will get the most from the program, while enjoying cute antics of Nintendo's popular Mario brothers. All of the game's music was sampled from Super Mario World.

name: Mars Tactics
summary: Classic turn-based tactical combat with some modern twists. Use stress to manage RNG. Master advanced suppression mechanics. Grow troops who develop abilities, personalities & relationships based on what happens in battle. Procedural, destructible maps. Realistic bullet physics.

name: Mario vs. Donkey Kong: Tipping Stars
summary: In this puzzle/platformer hybrid, players guide Mario Minis to the exit door using touch control. As with previous games in the series, players can create their own levels and share them with other players online. In this game, players can ‚Äútip‚Äù the creators of the user-generated puzzles with stars, which can be used to buy new parts in the robust level creator.

name: Marienbad
summary:
Marienbad is an adaptation of the strategy game Nim, originally written in Poland for the Odra 1003 mainframe. The game did not originally have a specific title; in later literature the name Marienbad was applied retroactively. It is one of the earliest Polish computer games. It was inspired by a variant of Nim seen in the 1961 movie Last Year at Marienbad and described under the name "Marienbad" in the magazine Przekr√≥j.

There are several rows (four by default) of matchsticks, with a different number of matchsticks in each row. Both players (the human and the computer) take turns, in each move taking away at least one matchstick from a single row. The player left with the final matchstick loses.

name: Maverick Hunters: Dawn of Sorrow
summary: Play as X, Zero or Vile from Mega Man X in this Julius Mode hack. All Content from the original game is pre-unlocked, allowing Maverick Hunter Mode to be played immediately. New music tracks and more were imported for this romhack.

name: Mad Mix 2: El Castillo de los Fantasmas
summary: Second Part of Mad Mix Game 2, a pac man style game

name: Magna Carta: The Phantom of Avalanche
summary: While it was never localized for western audiences, Magna Carta: The Phantom of Avalanche is notable for being the first entry in the Magna Carta series, developed and published by Softmax in Korea for Windows in 2001.

name: Mana Runner
summary: Mana Runner is a 2D retro-cyberpunk RPG featuring a real-time action battle system. Traverse the dystopian streets of an alternate 1997 New Orleans. Hire Hackers, Enforcers, Mana Priests, and other specialists as you fight back against the corruption of the mega-corps.

name: Mandrake
summary: You are the last of the Mandrakes, a sorcerous line of gardeners. At long last, you‚Äôve returned to your family's abandoned home. Make friends, tend your gardens, and put down roots. Fish, gather and delve in the wilds. Make a place for yourself, and uncover the mysteries your family left behind.

name: Man Simulator 2025
summary: Escape contemporary manhood as you gamble, vape, and consume your way to the light. Discover unique paths to unravel the secrets that lie within the simulation.

name: Mahjong Solitaire Pro
summary: Mahjong Solitaire Pro offers a relaxing yet engaging experience, where every match brings a sense of satisfaction and focus. With each cleared board, you'll feel a mix of calm and accomplishment, making it the perfect way to unwind after a hard day at work.

name: Mad Games Tycoon
summary: Form your own game studio set in the early 1980s in a small garage. Develop your own game ideas, create a team and develop megahit video games. Research new technologies, train your staff and upgrade your office space, going from a lowly garage to a huge building.

name: Machine Mind
summary:
What to do if your consciousness is trapped in a metal shell, and all around you is a post-apocalyptic world inhabited by enemies? There is only one task left - to survive at any cost!
Machine Mind is an action game with survival and RTS elements, where you will have to build your own transportation, manage resources, build bases and blow up crazy raiders!
Collect crafts, explore locations and fight to escape and discover all the secrets of this ruined world

name: Machine Knight
summary:
Through the excesses of science, a ‚Äúblack sun‚Äù was created, leading to energy shortages. The world faced a certain doom.
After tremendous effort, scientists discovered a chance to save their world by acquiring an unknown energy source in another world beyond the ‚Äúgate."
The mission to research the new world fell to a young scientist named Frain, in Schutzheim. He threw his body into the ‚Äúgate‚Äù alone.
The other world was filled with nature and mystery, things he had never seen.
But what really awaited him was treachery and betrayal, by his own world.
People were trampled by machine soldiers, chasers were everywhere, and monsters stood in every avenue of escape‚Ä¶
Despite these hardships, though, he found new companions who trusted and supported him.
Another-world adventure fantasy RPG on an overwhelming scale!

name: Magic Mouse
summary: Magic Mouse is an action-adventure top-down dungeon crawl set in a fantasy world where the player makes their way to fight dangerous enemies, overcome powerful bosses and survive perilous traps all while honing magical powers and gaining money to progress in stats and unique new powers in the five elements.

name: Maze of Bears
summary: World-wrapping, block-sliding, bear-avoiding, non-euclidean, cat-collecting puzzle, with crazy number of power-ups and block interactions.

name: M.A.C.E. Space Shooter
summary: MACE is a classic space shoot ‚Äôem up, inspired by the legendary Amiga games of this genre. Handdrawn 2D graphics in HD resolutions, parallax scrolling, explosion effects and optimized games mechanics, combined with the proven gameplay are transporting the ‚ÄúSpirit of Amiga‚Äù in today‚Äôs Age.

name: Mahjong Adventure
summary:
Mahjong Adventure is a mahjong game based on a classic Chinese game.
Great fit for players who love games like brain puzzles, crossword, chess, mahjong, word search, solitaire, match-3 and other smart games and puzzle brain games. Develop your mind and patience and strategy skills.

name: Max Cyber Shooter
summary: One city. One detective. No mercy.

name: Masked Shooters
summary: Masked Shooters features covert operational soldiers who are armed with advanced weaponry.

name: Marquis Cut
summary:
"The ring is marquis cut, and perfectly sized to fit my hand, five years on."

a test of bitsy and a piece of vent art.

name: Master Boy
summary: "Master Boy" is a happy-paced cartoon casual role-playing game with Chinese cuisine as the theme. Players can accept tasks in charming urban areas, help friends defend farm and beach, exterminate invaders and collect ingredients to get rewards and improve their own attributes. Just enjoy it.

name: Maimaimaigoen: Episode 7 - The Lost Path
summary:
The children search for clues about the missing Okada and arrive at an attraction that suddenly appears in Uropia called "Okada Castle". There, they find themselves re-experiencing attractions they had previously beaten!

As the story reaches its climax, will the children and Okada be able to escape "together"...!?

name: Magic Touch
summary: Draw the symbols to pop the balloons and stop the beetleknights from landing.

name: Make it! Sushi
summary: Make delicious sushi and become a sushi chef! Work quickly and accurately to fill as many sushi orders as possible!

name: MagiCats Builder: Infinite Pack
summary: Your power can‚Äôt wait. Buy the infinite pack and let your imagination be THE only limit.

name: May Sky
summary: Mizoguchi Haruki, a newly-minted salaryman who doesn't care for those around him, and Kamiake Minori, a world-weary young shrine maiden who isn't interested in her peers. However, one chance enoucnter brings them together...

name: Madou Gakuin R
summary:
The kingdom of Digal was the only peaceful country amidst chaos, ruled by the benevolent king Deneos and his wisest advisor, the High Priest. But the time of peace has come to an end when something strange happened to the king: seemingly controlled by an evil power, he banished the High Priest from the country. Digal plunged into chaos, crime began to flourish, bandits roamed the countryside uncontrolled. 
 
At this tough time, a young man named Rezas joined the Magic School, where the most beautiful and skillful female magicians were training at that time. But the next day, the school was attacked by a gang of criminals, and most of the people there killed. Rezas and his pretty schoolmates swear to avenge this crime and bring peace back to the kingdom.

name: Magic Sword
summary: Magic Sword is a 2D action side-scroller with a fantasy theme. The hero and his chosen accomplice must battle their way through a wizard's tower in a lust for monster slaying and loot.

name: Mahjong Garden HD
summary: Immerse yourself in a relaxing Chinese garden and journey through the seasons. Match traditional mahjong tiles to complete zodiac-inspired puzzles and grow Drake the Dragon.

name: Magical Literary Heroine Natsuki Saves The Literature Club!
summary:
Magical Literary Heroine Natsuki Saves The Literature Club! is a mod for Doki Doki Literature Club! that transforms the original experience into a magical, action-packed adventure, with Natsuki as the main protagonist.

In this mod, the literature club is on the verge of collapse due to mysterious forces that threaten the reality of the game. However, Natsuki awakens magical powers and takes on the role of a heroine determined to save her friends and restore order. The storyline combines magical girl elements with visual novel style, bringing exciting battles, new sprites and dialogues that mix humor, drama and action.

name: Mad Carnival
summary: Rogue AI mascots have taken over a once-happy theme park. Blast through deadly attractions, rescue your girlfriend, and survive the chaos in this weirdly fun top-down shooter ‚Äî now with a playable demo!

name: Mage Tower, A Tower Defense Card Game
summary: Draft a deck of cards against an AI opponent then battle them in tower defense-inspired card combat. A 2013 adaptation of the card game, released the same year.

name: Maya: Ek Pishachini
summary: A story-rich Indian themed horror. Fully voiced in Hindi with English subtitles. Explore a haunted haveli, solve sinister puzzles, and fight to rescue your friends trapped there.

name: Magical Drop V
summary:
Magical Drop Is Back!!! Yes, the cult-classic returns with all the fast-paced action you expect from the franchise, mixed with modern visuals and multi-player online experiences.

The sixth Magical Drop game was developed by French independent studio Golgoth and published by UTV Ignition for Steam in 2012. Xbox Live Arcade and PlayStation Network ports were announced, but ultimately never materialized. The game features a much smaller selection of characters, omits items, and removes Puzzle Mode; however, it adds new online gameplay modes. Characters from the cancelled Data East puzzle game Ghostlop are introduced; these three characters use Ghostlop gameplay instead of traditional Magical Drop mechanics.

name: Major Minor's Majestic March
summary: In a town where marching bands are prevalent and everyone is looking to be the best, Major Mike Minor is fairly ambivalent towards marches despite hailing from a long line of illustrious Drum Majors.

name: Make a Good 24 Hour Mega Man Level
summary:
Make a Good 24 Hour Mega Man Level (MaG24HMML, or just 24H) was a private contest held by a small group of people from the MaGMML community. Contestants were given 24 hours to create a level based around the contents of a virtual mystery box, filled with a random selection of 2 enemies and 2 gimmicks from the official Mega Man games. There was no guarantee that any of these assets would make sense or work well together, so it was up to the contestants to make the most of what they had been given.

Despite some rough edges owing to the time constraint, the levels are on par with anything you'd find in any other MaGMML game. However, the game itself is very short and extremely light on bonus features; there's no hub world to explore or extensive postgame content to delve into. 24H is less a traditional MaGMML and more a proof of concept for Make a Good 48 Hour Mega Man Level, so please set your expectations accordingly for maximum enjoyment.

24H has no story or cutscenes of any kind, but the game technically takes place at the same time as Episode Zero, with the premise being that Mega Man is testing the simulation technology used in MaGMML2.

name: Make the Empire Great Again
summary: A simulation + turn-based auto-battle game. The "Dusk Apocalypse" nears; the empire teeters! Your people need food, work, maybe some thrilling fun. But monsters seize Your lands, plunder Your fields & mines! Fight, reclaim lost! Build, forge grandest! Fear not the "Dusk", for a new "Sun" has risen!

name: Mario Kart 64: Amped Up - Version 3
summary:
Mario Kart 64: Amped Up is a ROM hack/mod of Mario Kart 64 developed by Litronom.

The mod includes:
-16 brand new courses
-5 additional game modes,
-fully animated 3D racers
-modern visuals
-groovy music
-customization settings
-unlockables
and much, much more!

It can be played on any modern emulator and even on original hardware.

name: Mavi's Journey
summary:
Mavi the half-beast Witch lives as a fortune teller in a town near the royal capital.
One day, Mavi recieves word that the legendary medicinal herb "MoriMori" has been discovered.
This is an RPG where you explore the world without any battles to hinder you.

name: MannaRites Gold
summary: Gold edition of the warmly received fantasy 2.5D hack-n-slash / RPG - MannaRites! Cut your way through enemy troops, explore open map, find and equip legendary weapons, armor and artifacts, level up your hero! Defend your lands from invaders!

name: Machi Knights: Blood Bagos
summary: Thwart the villain Kenos‚Äô plans to resurrect Bagos, a gargantuan weapon from ancient times! Pilot the Machi Knights, giant weapons that make up the legacy of an ancient kingdom that fell to ruin, and take down enemies to surge forward in this new action RPG.

name: Martian Secrets
summary: Martian Secrets is a 3D free-view meditation hidden object game where you have to fly around the map and look for the required items. But be careful, if you choose the wrong item, you will have to start all over again!

name: Maze Gobbler
summary:
"Maze Gobbler" is a simple yet addictive puzzle game.
Draw the way with your fingertip for the cute caterpillar to follow to escape the Maze.
Avoid Monsters. A Monster cuts the body of your cute caterpillar.
A Monster changes to a Fruit every few seconds, and seconds later the Fruit changes back to the Monster.
If your caterpillar eats a Fruit, one block of tail is added to the caterpillar (and Game Money too)!
Don't spend too much time, as more Monsters will appear as time goes on!
Click the Buttons at the bottom of the Screen: "AddSpeed"(Speed Booster, X2, X4) and "AddTail"(add one block of tail to the body). These are very useful!
Strive to make the body of your caterpillar longer. The longer the body, the higher the Score!

name: Masters of Anima
summary: Go to the aid of your future bride, using the powers of Anima to summon an army of magical Guardians in your quest to defeat Zahr's dreaded Golems. Learn to control new types of Guardians on your adventure, each with their own unique talents and abilities useful to explore the vast world of Spark and reveal its secrets, as well as to take down the formidable bosses that stand in your way. As your victories rack up, acquire new powers and abilities for both yourself and your Guardians to become a true Master of Anima.

name: Marimoth
summary: Marimoth is a short shoot 'em up that puts in control of a moth whose shots bounce off the walls. Calculate your aim, evade enemy attacks by learning their patterns and collect coins to power up.

name: Make 'Em Pay
summary:
Make them pay is a party game featuring different ways to have fun with your friends with one thing at hearth: Winning aint easy.
Amongst a giant crowd or as a stealthy vampire. Who cares about friendship when you just can make em pay !

name: Mangaka Dream
summary:
Mangaka Dream is a Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 5.

Instead of vast looping worlds typically seen in fangames, the dream world mainly comprises of maze rooms, with the goal being to get to reach a room with a treasure chest containing a key item. Once obtained, the player must wake up and repeat the process to obtain all the items and unlock the ending.

You play as an aspiring manga artist who is trying to finish a manga and get it published.

name: Magic Maho: Dream Runner
summary: Magic Maho: Dream Runner, a cute endless-style runner game about platforming and fighting monsters. Play as Maho, a magical girl stuck in an endless dream where she runs atop rooftops and is chased by monsters. Collect and use her magical staff to feed and defeat the monsters with pokies.

name: Marvel 5DX Legacy
summary: Iconic Marvel Cinematic Universe characters come to life in stunning Augmented Reality! Collect Marvel Cinematic Universe heroes and villains like Iron Man, Witness Captain America, Captain Marvel, Spider-man, Thanos and more. Improve your heroes‚Äô stats and unlock special characters & moves as you expand your card collection. Now it‚Äôs time to enter the real-time online battles and experience never-before-seen action!

name: Manaballs
summary: Manaballs is an online survival game with roguelike, extraction and farming elements. Venture into the woods, gather resources, build bases, and engage with players through voice chat. Team up to conquer dungeons, craft weapons, and raid enemy bases for that sweet loot.

name: Maximus
summary:
Maximus brings you high tempo ARPG action, inspired by the golden hack 'n slash era of arcade gaming.

An evil entity known as 'Mr.B' threatens to take over the world. Four heroes set out for justice: Julius Maximus the swashbuckler, whose mum got stomped by Bruticus the dragon. Bishop the archer, whose twin brother Raven was killed. Alyssa the spellsword, whose house got burned just after she paid off the mortgage... and Frank the destroyer, who fell into a cauldron of magic potion when he was a boy to become a beefcake of a warrior.

name: Marvel vs. Capcom 2: New Age of Heroes
summary: The iOS port of Marvel vs. Capcom 2 introduces a new feature called Variable System that allows the player to tag in other team members at any time.

name: Marvel Vs Capcom 2 X-Men '97 Edition Deluxe Arcade
summary: Marvel Vs Capcom 2 X-Men '97 Edition Deluxe Arcade is an arcade machine produced by Arcade1Up which bundles in the games Marvel vs Capcom, Marvel vs Capcom 2, Marvel Super Heroes vs Street Fighter, X-Men vs Street Fighter, Marvel Super Heroes, X-Men: Children of the Atom, X-Men: Mutant Apocalypse and Marvel Superheroes in War of the Gems.

name: Marine Sharpshooter II: Jungle Warfare
summary: In this follow-up to the hit Marine Sharpshooter, you'll be a lone operative fighting to restore democracy in an African country. The President of Burundi has been taken hostage by rebels and mercenaries. The brutal civil war that would ensue from this will threaten American interests - so you'll use your elite military training and advanced weapons to take the rebels down!

name: Master Knight
summary: Player controls Master Knight in this 3rd person rpg adventure. His mission is to kill Werewolf and collect skulls in different areas

name: Mario's Peregrination: Kingdom Elementum Phantasia
summary:
Mario embarks on phantasmagorical peregrination through multifarious realms, possessing symbolic elementum. To hopefully bring glorious cessation by defeating devilish lordific presences in they're looming chateau's.

This hack was made by Vamperumbra and has 48 exits

name: Master Arena
summary: Master Arena closes a chapter of old-school arena shooters to open a new one with a more strategic and fun gameplay. Accessible to everyone, Master Arena is easy to handle and satisfying to play.Duel, death match, free-for-all, capture the flag, and more, Master Arena invites you to join arenas from 2 to 30 players.

name: Magicat
summary: Become the mysterious Sleepy Cat and embark on a thrilling adventure through the magical world of Septora ‚Äî explore the unknown, battle fierce enemies, and awaken your hidden power.

name: Mark of the Ninja: Special Edition DLC
summary:
This DLC adds a new level, to be played as Dosan, as a prequel to the main game as well as 2 new items/tools and adding Dosan's playstyle to the main game.
It also adds an option for developer commentary to been seen throughout the game explaining design choices and giving information about the development of the game in general.

name: Math in Space
summary: Are your kids tired of the daily grind of school classes? Hold on‚Äîdon‚Äôt rush to dismiss the value of learning just yet.

name: Mario Bros.
summary: Mario Bros. is the Atari 5200 port of the homonymous arcade game.

name: Maze Ablaze
summary: Maze Ablaze is a fast-paced strategy game where you move the walls of a maze to defend an explosive barrel from an oncoming flame! Move fast and think faster as you work with limited resources to survive as long as possible.

name: Magical Drop DX
summary:
Magical Drop DX is a mobile game released exclusively for Japanese mobile phones by G-Mode. It is based on Magical Drop II with elements from Magical Drop, more particularly, their Super Famicom ports (most notably the title screen and the background used for the 1P vs. CPU mode).

As part of G-Mode's initiative to preserve their feature phone games from the 2000s, the original version of Magical Drop DX was ported to the Nintendo Switch as the 19th game in their G-Mode Archive series.

name: Man and Dog: Small Game Hunt
summary: Man & Dog is a hunting simulation game situated in Finland. Together with your companion dog, use real Nordic hunting methods to seek grouse bird hiding in the trees, or get into a thrilling chase with a fox or rabbit. Immerse yourself in authentic Finnish wilderness in autumm or winter.

name: Magicka 2: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Exclusive Deluxe Edition content:
- Warlord Robe Set
- Magicka Orchestra Soundtrack
- Digital Interactive Map
- Cultist Robe Set

name: Magicka: Holiday Spirit Item Pack
summary: Christmas comes early this year so get into the right holiday spirit. Spread some love, cook some food, get those presents in time this year and make sure you share with your friends.

name: Magicka: Lonely Island Cruise
summary: Has the constant casting of Rain and Blizzard made you weary? Perhaps it‚Äôs time to set out on a sunny vacation on the four and a half seas. This solidly (goblin) made sea vessel offers travelers plenty of living quarters, restaurants, luxurious lounges and one big sunny duel deck.

name: Mario & Luigi: Bowser's Inside Story
summary: The remaster of Mario & Luigi: Bowser's Inside Story released in Mario & Luigi: Bowser's Inside Story + Bowser Jr.'s Journey.

name: Mario Kart Tour: Los Angeles Tour
Marvel: Ultimate Alliance Bundle
summary: This Ultimate Alliance Bundle contains both games from the historic franchise! Marvel: Ultimate AllianceCreate an ultimate team from the largest Super Hero alliance ever as you engage in an epic quest to determine the fate of the Marvel Universe.

name: Make a Good 48 Hour Mega Man Level
summary:
After all the work he's been doing for so many years, Mega Man is finally taking a well-deserved vacation. The Light family has set sail on a luxury cruise ship, the SS Elroy! Unfortunately, it seems an up-and-coming group of ne'er-do-wells has set their sights on the same cruise. Before long, it's up to Mega Man to blast through the cruise's Simulation Fair in an effort to gather enough Energy Elements to save the day!

Make a Good 48 Hour Mega Man Level (MaG48HMML, or just 48H) was held to test and refine the Megamix Engine in preparation for MaGMML3. Participants had 48 hours to create a level using randomly selected enemies and gimmicks from across the entire Classic Mega Man series. Levels were evaluated and ranked by a panel of 4 judges, and an elaborate game was built around the results. Unlike the main MaGMMLs, participants were not allowed to program custom objects for their levels - but that doesn't mean this game isn't just as wacky and innovative as previous ones.

48H is a spiritual successor to Make a Good 24 Hour Mega Man Level that takes place between MaGMML2 and MaGMML3, but no previous MaGMML knowledge is necessary to enjoy the story.

name: Mariposa
summary: Mariposa is a 2D puzzle-platformer game that harnesses the butterfly effect, shaping the past to change the future. Every interaction with Mariposa, an automatonsmith from a utopian past, will billow out into time itself‚Äîand guiding a ghost from a forgotten era might be enough to change your fate.

name: Master System 3
summary:
The Master System 3 is a console released by Tectoy exclusively in Brazil in 2008. It is a continuation of the long-running Sega Master System line seen in the country, succeeding the line of "Master System 3 Collection" consoles (which in turn followed the "Master System III Compact"). Like the last two models of its predecessor, this Master System 3 lacks a cartridge slot, relying solely on built-in games. It has a shorter name and also opts for a radically changed design over previous consoles, presumed to be unique to Tectoy products.

Internally, it is likely the same as the Master System 3 Collection with 131 games, since they have the same menu saying "Master System 3 Collection 131 Super Jogos" and share the same list of games.

The Master System 3 comes with 131 built-in games (or so it claims), the same number as the last Master System 3 Collection console to be released. It also comes with two Sega Mega Drive-style six button control pads which plug into two DE-9 ports, although most of the buttons on the pads are redundant as the console has no built-in Mega Drive games.

In order to count 131 games, Pense Bem counts as 10 and 20 em 1 counts as 20 games.

name: Madness Accelerant
