Races take place on small courses with pits and hills, and drivers are encouraged to send their opponents off course. Courses can have hazards and obstacles, and the "figure 8" shaped course is a staple of the race. No matter whether it's Banger races or demolition derbys, the fact is that everyone love to see the everyman take it to the mat and come out a victor, and that's what Mayhem is all about.

name: Mask City: Chapter Zero
summary: MASK CITY: CHAPTER ZERO is a detective visual novel that lets you be a superhero, investigating a string of murders. Talk to witnesses, meet allies and fight bad guys. It‚Äôs a small-town story with big city spice written by bestselling author Aaron Crash

name: Mark-I: Mission Pilot
summary: Arcade top-down shooter with coop for 2 players. Play as Pilot of „ÄåMARK-I„Äç ‚Äì new prototype of intelligent combat unit. Complete short intense action mission by shooting enemies, avoiding threats and upgrading shell with different battle configurations.

name: Marisa and Alice
summary: A doujin game by Desunoya based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Madden NFL 18
summary: Madden NFL 18 takes a significant visual leap with the power of the Frostbite engine. See stunning new stadium exteriors surrounded by vast cityscapes and watch the spectacle of NFL gameday come to life in the most photorealistic game to date. Play each matchup to your specifications by selecting from three new Play Styles or play the best real world match ups each week in Play Now Live! With the introduction of even more ways to play, coupled with your favorite modes, Madden Ultimate Team and Franchise, this is Madden like you‚Äôve never seen before.

name: Mad Experiments 2: Escape Room
summary: Mad Experiments 2: Escape Room is a multiplayer narrative escape game. Alone or with teammates, follow the story of Hildegarde and the Professor Cheshire, explore, think, and escape!

name: Maitetsu: Pure Station
summary:
Sotetsu had lost his entire family in a rail accident and was adopted into the Migita household, which runs a shochu brewery in the city of Ohitoyo.

He returned to his hometown to save it from the potential water pollution that would occur if they accepted the proposal to build an aerocraft factory nearby.

He woke up the RailRoad Hachiroku by accident and became her owner. For different purposes, they agreed to help find her lost locomotive, with the help of his stepsister Hibiki, the town's mayor and local railway chief, Paulette and others.

Feature:
Vivid Japanese voices and animated sprites for every characters.
A Gallery for enjoying CGs, scenes and music experienced in the game.
Tips for professional knowledge about trains in details.

name: Mario Adventure
summary:
This Super Mario Bros. 3 hack changes the game right down to the core by tweaking the actual game engine itself!

Aside from the ‚Äòtypical‚Äô graphics and text changes, this hack alters musical melodies, a full line up of all new levels, new power ups, new abilities for Mario, and even new enemies! When I say new, I‚Äôm not talking about changed graphics; I‚Äôm talking about completely new power ups and monsters. Money mushrooms, invisible Mario, time stopping potions, Kuribo shoes in any level that don‚Äôt disappear, shy guys that create projectiles, heat seeking bullet bills, and others are just the beginning of the changes made to this game.

On top of that, you have random weather patterns on every stage, boss battles on every stage, and infinite lives, so your coins go to more useful purposes. They will be used to buy items from Toad‚Äôs house and get some level exits to appear. Let‚Äôs not forget stored, and switchable, power ups such as those found in Super Mario World!

name: Mario In Mushroom Rix Land
summary: Mario goes to this land. Called Mushroom Rix Land. For his vacation. However, Bowser has taken over this island! Mario must stop him!

name: Mars Troopers
summary: Mars Troopers must defeat the enemy to save the universe. Super exciting shooting game, waiting for you to challenge! Action games, Arcade games, Crime games, fight games and for those fans of guns weapon games.20+ Alien Monsters Boss, 9 different alien stars, Waiting for you to conquer.

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - A Bite of You
summary: A Bite of You is based off the novel, Come Here, Eat It. You play as Bora, a newcomer at the gaming company Enfort. She's been looking forward to live a comfortable, cushy life at her new job, but... who are these mysterious men, and what do they want with her? And more importantly, who, or what is the King of Gumiho? Will she ever be able to live a happy corporate life?

name: Mayday Trials
summary: A short psychological thriller visual novel where you guide Sora through twisted interrogations, moral dilemmas, and unraveling memories. Shape his fate through choices that lead to three unique endings.

name: Marbella Vice
summary:
Marbella Vice is a Full Motion Video arcade game, the filming of which was directed by √Ålex de la Iglesia and which also featured actors such as Santiago Segura and √Ålex Angulo.

It is a light gun shooter, parody of the series Miami Vice. The action will follow in the footsteps of two policemen (the player and √Ålex Angulo) who arrive in Marbella to catch a drug trafficker named Amin Shala. As in other games of this genre, we must shoot the enemies as soon as they appear on the screen and avoid shooting civilians.

name: Mario Party 4 Deluxe
summary: Mario Party 4 Deluxe is a mod of Mario Party 4 that expands the game by changing its item roster to one of a whopping 36 items. Does the Mini-Mega system get tiresome pretty quickly? Well, here's more items to play with to spice up the Mario Party 4 experience! Returning, important staples from the Mario Party series that were absent in vanilla Mario Party 4, include Mushrooms, Golden Mushrooms, Skeleton Keys and Plunder Chests! The items from Mario Party 3 are back, too; the Reverse Mushroom, Cellular Shopper, and Bowser Phone are now at your disposal. Items from newer Mario Parties and the Mario Party 1 dice blocks have also made their way into this mod, as well as 5 rare items that you can get if you're lucky enough (including the dreaded Wacky Watch)!

name: Man of the House
summary: Man of the House is an adult game, in which you play a young man living in a city full of beautiful women. Experience around 30-40 hours of content, in this sandbox VN, filled with steamy sex scenes, amusing dialogs and some very unexpected plot twists.

name: Master Leaf Blower
summary: Master Leaf Blower is a physics-based arcade game with a comic book twist. Become a leaf-blowing hero and save the city! Navigate unique districts, tackle fun challenges, and test your skills in this crazy simulator.

name: Madden NFL 17
summary: Take your team all the way in Madden NFL 17 with new and immersive features in the deepest Franchise mode to-date, putting you at the center of your team‚Äôs Championship run. Arm your team for gridiron glory on both sides of the ball with innovative ball carrier feedback cues, defender fake out mechanics and a new, authentic defensive AI system. Driven by the most balanced gameplay yet, along with fun and fresh ways to play modes such as Ultimate Team and Draft Champions, Madden NFL 17 is the most complete Madden‚Ä¶ever.

name: Magical Bakery: Deluxe Edition
summary: Welcome to a magical, flour-filled world!

name: Maimai Green Plus
summary: An update to maimai GreeN cabinets, maimai GreeN PLUS released on February 26th, 2014 in Japan, following short location tests on January 31st, 2014.

name: Magia Story
summary: Magia Story is a single-player monster taming RPG game. Play in a fun, vibrant world filled with powerful creatures with their own personalty and habits. Learn to be friends or rivals with energetic characters. Battle with creatures and go new places with your pets while exploring lands and towns.

name: Max Payne Bundle
summary: Includes 2 items: Max Payne, Max Payne 2: The Fall of Max Payne

name: Master of Piece
summary: Recruit mercenaries, combine their traits, and forge endless synergies. Venture through the mysterious medieval realm, facing powerful foes and mighty bosses. Simple turn-based rules hide deep strategic depth‚Äîbuild your ultimate team, master the pieces, and uncover the secrets of the Dragon Orb.

name: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha A's Portable: The Gears of Destiny
summary: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha A's Portable: The Gears of Destiny is the sequel to Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha A's Portable: The Battle of Aces.

name: Mary Skelter 2
summary:
What must you sacrifice to escape fate? Find out in this nightmarish dungeon-crawling RPG!
The Nightmare continues in Mary Skelter 2! In this first-person dungeon crawler, play as fairy tale-inspired characters called Blood Maidens, each with deeply customizable character-specific classes. Balance between power and madness in turn-based battles with a blood-fueled transformation system, and escape a living prison while indestructible Nightmares give chase in real time.

This game includes a full remake of the original Mary Skelter: Nightmares with additional story content as a free DLC.
It is recommended that players finish Mary Skelter 2 before playing through the remake.
The gameplay system revisions made in Mary Skelter 2 are also reflected in the remake of Mary Skelter: Nightmares.

name: Mahjong Sword: Princess Quest
summary: Mahjong Sword: Princess Quest is a video game published in 1995 on PC-98 by Naxat Soft. It's a strategy game, with adult, anime / manga, cards and fantasy themes.

name: Mario Kart World
summary: Put the pedal to the metal in a vast interconnected environment. Race seamlessly across connected courses like never before. Participate in the new knockout tour elimination mode, where you‚Äôll barrel through back-to-back courses and checkpoints. And in free roam, it‚Äôs possible to go off the racetrack and drive in any direction you wish, explore areas that pique your interest and take some photos at scenic spots with a group of friends.

name: Make Up Human
summary:
Make up a person by combining body parts!

"Make Up Human" is a 3D puzzle game.
Drop human body parts such as eyes and ears into a box.

When the same parts come into contact with each other, they will change into the next level part.

Parts will age over time and will never be able to change again.
Be careful, as in rare cases they may not age and become cancerous!

If you're lucky, you might find a special part that can change any part.

If even one part falls outside the box, it's game over.

name: Magic Heroes: Save Our Park
summary:
Save the city park from demolition!

A mysterious but well-loved old lady everyone just calls "Granny" has been living in the park for longer than anyone can remember. Now, the park has fallen into disarray and the city has decided to sell the land off to a greedy real estate developer to be turned into condos. Poor Granny is going to lose her home, and the neighborhood is going to lose its park... unless you can help.

name: Magia y Demonios
summary:
Old-school isometric RPG game with some more modern concepts.

You must challenge the forces of evil by eliminating monsters in a world where evil expands. As evil increases, the difficulty of the game also increases.

name: Magnitude: Gamma
summary:
Radiation is accelerating the rogue electron incursion.

The core must remain protected in order to prevent a nuclear disaster.

name: Magic Scavenger
summary: „ÄäMagic Scavenger„Äã is a light Rogue-like spell-building looting and extraction game. To earn money, you embark on an adventure‚Äîscavenging valuable items, crafting your spells, and fending off waves of enemies before extracting with your haul. How much treasure can you escape with?

name: Manic Pixie Dreamgirld
summary: Four students have a dark secret‚Äîthey are mystic fae, who can enter people‚Äôs dreams and influence their feelings. What could possibly go wrong?

name: Mario Eisouoku: Illusionary Blossom of Cranium Prayer
summary: What happens when five fans of Super Mario World and Touhou Project come together to make a hack? Super Mario World with Touhou elements mixed in, of course! Aside from the usual platforming and exploration of strange lands, Mario now has to focus and dodge bullets fired by familiar foes as the Mushroom Kingdom gets dragged into a new incident.

name: Maths Pals
summary: Embark on an exciting math adventure with six lovable animal friends, each a master of their own math skill! From counting and addition to multiplication and division, explore 20 levels per topic, starting with simple visuals like fingers and dice, and working up to complex challenges with numbers up to 25x25. Earn stars for every correct answer, improve your score, and choose your own path to learning success. Visit each pal at their cozy home and let them guide you through fun, interactive quizzes designed to make math magical!

name: Marrakech
summary: There is a doctor possessed by demons inside Marrakech hospital, he is invoking evil creatures. Pacientes inside need your help. Use a blessed Ak and defeat the creatures that comes your way.

name: Marvin's Marvellous Adventure
summary:
One of the most console-style platformers ever seen on the Amiga, Marvin has approximately 60 levels to battle through. There are stars to collect, extra lives on offer, slides, tubes, ladders, caterpillars to move across, and bonus fruit to collect. The levels are inhabited by typical enemies, some of which are killed by jumping on their heads, while others must be kicked or shot (once you collect a weapon).

Many of the annoyances which plague platform games, such as blind jumps and spikes appearing at random, are deliberately absent from this. The graphics are intentionally cute, using the AGA chip-set for 256 colours.

name: Makai Wars
summary:
Originally planned as a PlayStation Portable game in 2004, it was changed to a PS3 game a year later with no solid news on it's release since.
It is now being released as a mobile game in Japan but very little information has been given and no release date was announced.

name: Malzbie's Pinball Collection
summary: Malzbie‚Äôs Pinball Collection presents pinball tables in the style of the 1990s. Completely physically calculated gaming features, realistic graphics, stunning sounds and the animated dot matrix display give the feeling of the good old days back to you!

name: Max Steel: Covert Missions
summary: Mattel Interactive continues their Dreamcast assault with Max Steel, an action/adventure title based on the hit-rendered TV program of the same name. You control Max, a superhero with the ability to turn invisible and punch through walls, as he valiantly halts the plans of the diabolical John Dread. Gameplay is similar to Fighting Force 2, as you lead Max through expansive levels pummeling your foes with bare fists. The game also features voice-overs by the cast of the television show, adding dramatic flair to the proceedings.

name: Magical Girl Konoha
summary: To aid the King, Priestess Konoha plunges into "Grimoire"! The world inside "Grimoire" is formed by another world called Grimoire Land in which Konoha becomes a magical girl, and has come to save the world!

name: Madden NFL 10
summary: Madden NFL 10 also lets you take your fight online with an all-new Online Franchise mode, complete with 32 teams, NFL-style drafts and a custom league webpage. Add to that the most immersive broadcast presentation to date, and Madden NFL 10 gives you everything you see on Sundays, minus the grass.

name: Mai and the Legendary Treasure
summary: Mai finds a hidden map that brings her to another world. With some newfound friends, Mai sets off to hunt for the legendary treasure! But with rivals in her way, will she finally get her hands on the legendary treasure...?

name: M.A.D.
summary: M.A.D. (which stands for Missile Attack and Defense) is an arcade action game somewhat similar to Missile Command. You control a photon cannon at the bottom of the screen, and your goal is to protect six energy stations located to your left and right. Waves of rockets and other ships will fly by on the screen, and occasionally one will drop in an attempt to destroy one of the stations (as a warning on most levels, the enemy will turn white just before it drops). You need to make sure you shoot it before your energy station is destroyed! When all six energy stations are gone, the game is over. A two player variation is also included; one player will control the photon cannon, and the second player controls a cursor and can select when and where an enemy will drop. The players alternate between offense and defense in this version.

name: Madden NFL 25
summary: In EA SPORTS Madden NFL 25, discover the next level of FieldSENSE. This includes a re-engineered physics system, updated features across franchise and other modes as well as brand-new commentary and presentation.

name: Mahjong Towers
summary: Mahjong Towers comes to the iPad in this beautiful sequel to the most popular mahjong solitaire game of all time,

name: Mario Teaches Typing 2
summary: Mario Teaches Typing 2 is the sequel to Mario Teaches Typing. It includes several new features, including a certificate of achievement, a keyboard that is color-coded for easy reference, an on-screen keyboard, specially customizable lesson plans, and new levels. Additionally, Mario's face also makes small talk with the player throughout the levels. Many of Mario's face's antics in this game are cultural references. This is also the last educational Mario game to be released.

name: Maze Mania
summary:
Flippo must travel through the Mazes of the Upper Plane turning the tiles as he goes.
Avoiding the gliding aliens that appear to hinder his quest.
Collect icons to gain extra power and bound over the starspangled black holes to avoid
being suspended, lost in inner space.

name: Marle: The Labyrinth of the Black Sea
summary: The discovery of ruins near the Island of Isola has caught the attention of many adventurers, including Grand Magician Marle. However, what she finds there is unlike anything she has seen before. A labyrinth which seals away the strength of any who may enter it...

name: Man Made
summary: Man Made is an massive open world simulator that will challenge your skills in all aspects. Build, hunt, fish, plant and do various jobs for the residents.It's up to you how you earn and spend your money.

name: Malfunction FPS
summary: In Malfunction FPS, your job is to defeat the robots and escape the robots to get to a door at the end of each level.

name: Mawang: Dark Lord Defense
summary: Mawang: Dark Lord Defense is a real-time tactical tower defense game. As Princess Lua, defend the demon realm against the hero alliance. Build unique towers, manage unit morale, and use tactical pauses to repel invasions. Your strategy decides the demon realm's fate.

name: Majin Tensei: Blind Thinker II
summary: Despite the title, while the mechanics of Blind Thinker II remain the same as they were in Majin Tensei: Blind Thinker, the setting, story, and characters have all changed. The protagonist of this chapter is called Takeru and much of the story centers around an artificially created demon called Zora. Player choices in the game lead to multiple potential endings.

name: Magical Mic Duel: Senpai, Hear My Spell
summary: Embrace your destiny in Magical Mic Duel: Senpai, Hear My Spell! Your voice commands the forces of fabulousness. Chant spells with conviction, and witness dazzling displays of magical might! The world needs your power. Step up and claim your place as the ultimate magical girl!

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: Chinese New Year
summary: The Chinese New Year Collection is a series of 39 puzzles that embody the beauty, hope, and renewal inherent in the celebration of Chinese New Year.

name: Marvel Comics: X-Men - Tiger Barcodzz
summary: A handheld video game based on Marvel's superheroes X-Men.

name: Math Genius: Addition Edition
summary: Math Genius: Addition Edition is a fun and educational game that challenges players with randomly generated addition problems. Players fill in the missing number in the equation by choosing one of three possible answers. Keep track of your progress with on-screen counters displaying your correct and incorrect answers. Perfect for sharpening math skills in a quick, engaging format!

name: Max Mix Game
summary:
El juego es un Pac-Man cl√°sico con muchos nuevos mapas, personajes, items y situaciones. El personaje principal MAD tiene que ir comi√©ndose todos los cocos (bolitas) que aparecen en el mapeado a lo largo de 15 pantallas laber√≠nticas distintas, intentando no ser alcanzado por los siguientes personajes: 
 
Pelmazoide: Son los cl√°sicos fantasmas de un Pac-Man, mortales al contacto. 
Maricoco: Es una mariquita que no hace da√±o a MAD, pero que va reponiendo los cocos que se come, complicando el juego. 
Repugnantoso: Es una criatura, como su propio nombre indica, de aspecto repugnante, que es invulnerable a MAD mosqueado y que va pisando los cocos hundi√©ndolos en el suelo e impidiendo comerlos. S√≥lo Hipodoso o un disparo de la coconave o el cocotanque pueden destruirle. 
MAD se encontrar√° a lo largo del juego con distintos objetos: 
 
Mosqueado: Hace que MAD pueda comerse a los fantasmas y maricocos, haci√©ndolo invulnerable a repugnantoso. 
Hipopodoso: Convierte a MAD en un hipop√≥tamo que no podr√° comer los cocos, pero podr√° destruir a todos los enemigos. 
Excav√≥fono: Dota a MAD de una excavadora para levantar los cocos hundidos por Repugnantoso. Con ella no podr√° usar los dem√°s objetos hasta que la deje en el punto donde la cogi√≥, donde aparecer√° un icono con la cara de MAD. 
Coconave: Al entrar en una pista horizontal, se convertir√° en una nave espacial que puede moverse a voluntad a izquierda o derecha, y que puede disparar, pero s√≥lo hacia arriba. 
Cocotanque: Al entrar en una pista vertical por la parte superior, se convertir√° en un tanque que podr√° disparar hacia la izquierda o la derecha a voluntad, pero que no puede controlar el movimiento, que se producir√° de arriba a abajo autom√°ticamente hasta salir de la pista por la parte inferior. 
Trampillas: Son puertas giratorias que al pasar a trav√©s de ellas por el lado abierto, cierran el camino a posibles persecuciones de enemigos al girar y cerrarse por el lado que abandonamos, pero que si las encontramos por el lado cerrado son muros infranqueables que pueden convertirse en una trampa mortal. 
Autococos: Son unos cocos especiales marcados con una flecha que al comerlos nos obligar√°n a movernos en la direcci√≥n que marca la flecha. Suelen estar dispuestos formando caminos predefinidos en los que al entrar nos obliga a recorrer hasta que salgamos del rastro de autococos. Pueden ser mortales si un enemigo se cruza por el camino mientras estamos sigui√©ndolo.

name: Maze: Path of Light - Wild Edition
Maquisard
summary: Maquisard is a charming game of snooping and investigation. As the lobby boy at a fancy hotel, the player receives clues from the resistance about the identity of a government agent and tries to figure out their identity by snooping on the guests over the course of three days. Players must listen in on conversations, peek into rooms, and observe the guests' habits in order to figure out which guests has all the traits of their target. Maquisard is a single-player puzzle game that has an unique non-linear investigation gameplay and draws on the visual aesthetics of Wes Anderson's film The Grand Budapest Hotel.

name: Mass Effect: Genesis
summary: Mass Effect: Genesis is a downloadable "interactive backstory comic". Genesis fills the role of Mass Effect for new players by introducing them to the story of the original game and allowing them to make six of the major plot decisions that players could make. If downloaded, the comic appears between the opening level and character customization. There are two versions of the comic, one each for a male and female Commander Shepard.

name: Maken X
summary:
Maken X is a game for the Dreamcast video game console that fits into an subgenre of "first-person slashers". The game is mainly regarded as a first-person action game because of the realistic elements in gameplay. It is unique in that the main character is the weapon (Maken), rather than a person.

The word "Maken" literally translates as "demonic sword". On the title screen, the "X" is shown to stand for deus ex machina (Latin for "god out of the machine").

The player can control a number of characters via "brainjacking", which leaves the person a vegetable. The woman displayed on the boxart is the first person controlled when the facility that Maken was created at comes under attack.

name: Mass Effect: Genesis 2
summary: Mass Effect: Genesis 2 is an "interactive backstory comic". It is an updated version of Mass Effect: Genesis, which was originally created for Mass Effect 2. Genesis 2 fills the role of Mass Effect and Mass Effect 2 for new players to the series, introducing them to the story of the first two games in the Mass Effect trilogy and allowing them to make some of the major plot decisions that players could make by playing through the previous games. The player is prompted to begin Genesis 2 after character creation, but using it is optional. There are two versions of the comic, one each for a male and female Commander Shepard.

name: Magitech Requiem
summary: Equip various magitech, perks, and weaponry to fight against hordes of creatures beckoned to remind humanity of their hubris. Fight either alone or alongside up to two friends, and employ advanced tactics to defy the forces of fate.

name: Mafia Takedown
summary: Murder Mafia is a fun, one-button casual game that will keep you entertained for hours. Your mission? Take down the notorious mafia boss, the Don‚Äîbut beware of sneaky traitors lurking in the shadows! Explore unpredictable scenarios and unlock them all as you hone your skills in the art of deception.

name: Mad Shark
summary: Mad Shark is an Action game, developed and published by Allumer, which was released in 1993.

name: Match! The 12 CZ Wars
summary: Match! The 12 CZ Wars is a roguelike strategy game blending match-3 and buff-building. Partner with 12 Zodiac Maidens to repel ancient primordial beasts. Navigate random events, battles, and upgrades. Carefully choose paths, manage resources, and empower your Maidens to secure victory.

name: Mario Kart Tour: Baby Rosalina Tour
Magatch
summary: Sultan is very fond of precious stones, he adores and collects them, but his time is limited for collecting stones, but driven by passion and greed, he will never stop

name: Marvel's Avengers: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Marvel‚Äôs Avengers is an action-adventure game developed by Crystal Dynamics and published by Square Enix in 2020. It features both a single-player campaign and multiplayer missions, combining narrative-driven gameplay with cooperative online play. The story follows Kamala Khan as she reunites the Avengers after a catastrophic event. Players can control multiple heroes, each with unique abilities and skill trees.

Marvel's Avengers: Deluxe Edition includes the exclusive Obsidian Outfit pack for the Avengers, including Captain America, Iron Man, Black Widow, Thor, Hulk, and Ms. Marvel, along with six exclusive Obsidian-themed nameplates to further customize the gameplay cosmetics. This edition also includes 72-hour early access.

name: Magical Warrior Diamond Heart
summary: Magical Warrior Diamond Heart is an in-progress otome visual novel created by Dreamy Pyon. This game is inspired by magical girl anime. Play as Valerie Amaranth and decide the fate of the world, eat delicious donuts, and even smooch lots of cuties! Will Val defeat the Nightmares, make new friends, and perhaps find the love of her life along the way? Or will she meet her tragic end? Your choices decide her fate and the fate of humanity in this magical visual novel! The game features a diverse cast of characters from varying racial/ethnic backgrounds and LGBT+ dating options.

name: Mall of Mayhem
summary: What is Mall of Mayhem? Mall of Mayhem is an open world action game about an assassin with an exo suit stuck in a time loop. It's like Groundhog Day, but you cause more mayhem.

name: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy + Marvel's Avengers
summary: A bundle including Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy and Marvel's Avengers.

name: Mario & Luigi: Bowser's Inside Story
summary: Mario & Luigi: Bowser's Inside Story is the third game in the Mario & Luigi series of games. Players control Mario and Luigi simultaneously in the side-scrolling platform environment of Bowser's body, while also controlling the Koopa King himself in the top-down world of the Mushroom Kingdom. Similar to games like Earthbound, enemy encounters are seen as actual enemies that players can avoid or attempt to strike early. The actual battles are a combination of turn-based menu attacks, and timed reactions to enemies during battle. By watching the way an enemy reacts, you can anticipate their attack and avoid it or counterattack.

name: Maccha's World
summary:
You find yourself cut off from your family in desperate need of a new liver to save your life. With 100,000 gold coins needed, you enter "The Pit", a cave full of money, monsters and alcohol. Can you make it out in one piece?

Maccha's World is a short but very challenging NES-styled game inspired by the likes of Spelunky and Kero Blaster.

name: Mass Effect: Andromeda - Super Deluxe Edition
summary: Mass Effect Andromeda‚Äôs Super Deluxe Edition sets you up with all the incredible extra gear and additional benefits of the Deluxe Edition, but piles on even more Multiplayer Booster Packs. Dominate your co-op play with a Premium Pack coming your way every week, for 20 weeks.

name: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy: The Telltale Series - Episode 4: Who Needs You
summary:
With the fate of the Eternity Forge decided, the Guardians are left more bitterly divided than ever. But this growing tension is temporarily sidelined by a more pressing problem: escaping a dark and treacherous cavern before they all get eaten alive. As the cave‚Äôs hidden threats creep closer, Star-Lord must hold his crew together if he hopes to keep everyone safe. Safety, however, may ultimately come at a terrible cost...

Episode four of a five part episodic game series.

name: Martha Madison: Optics
summary: Imagine transforming your room into an ancient temple full of optical wonder. With Martha Madison: Optics, students solve challenges based on topics such as reflection, refraction, and concave & convex lenses. Explore the free-play optics playground and create new playable levels in the game. Just like real-life scientists, you can work alone or collaboratively to experiment with different approaches. Players are free to make mistakes and try different paths. Martha Madison: Optics is part of a series of physical science games developed to enhance middle school science curriculum and improve outcomes by captivating students and making complex concepts meaningful. Every unit is aligned to standards, backed by research, incorporates best practices in teaching, and leverages innovative game design.

name: MasterChef: Learn to Cook! - Christmas Special
summary: Christmas is here! Roll up your sleeves and cook up a holiday feast worthy of a number one chef!

name: Mato Fragments
summary: You are a photo shop owner moonlighting as an informant in the vibrant, but dangerous streets of Neo City. After harboring a strange fugitive, your skills as an informant are put to the test, as the fate of the entire city rests in your hands.

name: Marathon: Rubicon X
summary:
Marathon: Rubicon X is considered by some the unofficial fourth chapter in the Marathon series.

Rubicon X features all new high-resolution artwork, new and updated maps, and enough surprises to feel like a whole new game.

name: Matchpoint: Tennis Championships - Legends DLC
summary: Play two of the biggest Tennis legends in history!

name: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy: The Telltale Series - Episode 5: Don't Stop Believin
summary:
In the aftermath of an unbearable sacrifice, the Guardians finally fracture. With her opposition in shambles, Hala renews her campaign of death and devastation, carving a path of indiscriminate destruction en route to Knowhere. If he hopes to avoid catastrophe (and save his own skin), Star-Lord must search his feelings, reunite his team, and mount one final mission to save the galaxy...again.

Episode five of a five part episodic game series.

name: Mallory and the Marble Sanctum
summary: Explore a mysterious labyrinth on the edge of nowhere and find out if you're really as alone in it as you appear to be. An early pre-alpha demo for Mallory, a story-driven adventure game currently in solo development as a pet project.

name: Magiterra
summary: Magiterra is a farming simulator game with RTS controls. With a little bit of added fantasy elements, create your crop fields, produce hundreds of resources, fulfill many different missions, help your kingdom prosper and live in wealth!

name: Master Detective Archives: Rain Code - Mysteriful Limited Edition
summary:
A brand new dark fantasy detective action game from the minds behind the Danganronpa series! Yuma, an amnesiac detective-in-training, and Shinigami, the spirit haunting him, tackle unsolved mysteries in a strange city caged by unending rain.

The Mysteriful Limited Edition contains:

The Book of Death: Art Book featuring commentary from Kazutaka Kodaka, Rui Komatsuzaki and Shimadoriru
Limited Edition exclusive Spirited 6.5‚Ä≥ Shinigami plush
Outerbox with exclusive art from Rui Komatsuzaki
Noise of Neon: Official Soundtrack composed by Masafumi Takada
Nintendo Switch SteelBook
Master Detective Archives: RAIN CODE physical game

name: Mario vs. Donkey Kong-e: Later Gator
Mad Way
summary: Mad Way is a game where you have to climb a strange universe without falling to find your love!

name: Mario & Sonic at the London 2012 Olympic Games
summary: The 3DS version of Mario & Sonic at the London 2012 Olympic Games has some key differences from the Wii version. While it shares many events, it has more. It also features an exclusive Story Mode. The protagonists from the Mario and Sonic series team up to defeat Bowser and Dr. Eggman, who, along with their underlings, have taken over London. There are different parts to the story, depending on the character played. The player must win events against the antagonists. Playable characters consist of all 20 playable characters from the previous installment's Nintendo DS version, and are split into five groups of four.

name: Maze Estate Escape
summary: Collect D.O.T.S. across the many maze-like floors of a mysterious estate while finding new items to upgrade your abilities in Maze Estate Escape, a co-op rougelite for 1-3 players!

name: Maribato!
summary:
Maribato! is a fanmade Fighting Game developed in 2004 for the PC by DK Software, and has the most popular characters of Maria-sama ga Miteru as playable characters. Gameplay is similar to that found in other games such as Street Fighter, The King Of Fighters, Guilty Gear, among others, and the characters sport quirky yet very funny and lovely moves and styles that can be traced to those games; It also includes in-jokes and references to the Light Novel. The stages are based in actual locations at Lillian Academy, and the characters are presented using a Super Deformed style for their sprites. The game consists in matches of 2 best out of 3 rounds between two teams of two soeurs each, and follows a Tag Team structure, similar to games like Marvel Vs. Capcom, and allows to switch characters at any time, useful to extend combos, or to escape an enemy combo. However, if one character's life meter is depleted, the team automatically loses one round.

A second version of the game, called Maribato! Version 2.0 was released in Comiket 70 in 2005, and a third one, called Maribato! Plus, was released one year later, both presented as standalone discs. Both version add new characters and stages, and rebalance the existing ones.

name: Maimai DX Circle
summary: This brand new upgrade lets you join Circles and compete in Circle Festas.

name: Mall Simulator
summary: Turn your building from a small shopping center into a huge city mall! To avoid going bankrupt, you‚Äôll need to build new stores and restaurants, set smart prices, and keep up with trends. 15+ stores, dozens of machines & services, and hundreds of famous brands waiting for you...

name: Macro golf
summary: Macro golf is a game consisting of courses which each have 8 holes. With each hole, you need to hit the ball through it so that it sinks in the hole. You need to navigate the ball around the course, to sink it in the hole to move onto the next one. This game also includes local multiplayer.

name: Mata Yume no Naka de
summary: A doujin game by Nuu based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Mardek
summary: Mardek is a fantasy/sci-fi/retro Flash RPG from 2007-2010, which blends parody with a deeper story. It offers solid turn-based RPG combat and dozens of hours of gameplay.

name: Matchstone
summary: Matchstone reinvents the classic memory game from your childhood. Match strange stones to gain an ever increasing score and push your memory to its limits. Leave no stone unturned!

name: Manchester United Championship Soccer
summary: The game was released at the time when Manchester United was starting to dominate the English football scene. All the teams from the 1994‚Äì95 FA Premier League are represented. All-star teams and various European clubs that participated in the European competitions from the 1994/95 season are also included. During the gameplay the player can choose two type of views: top down and isometric view of the pitch.

name: Marion Surgical Robot Game
summary: A Compact Surgical Experience: Designed to be completed in under an hour, this game provides a focused, high-intensity introduction to robotic surgery in a sci-fi setting.

name: Marvel Nemesis: Rise of the Imperfects
summary: Marvel Nemesis: Rise of the Imperfects pits fierce Marvel superheroes against each other in a 3D fighting game. You can assume control of heroes such as the Punisher, Spider-Man, and Captain America, and duel with them in interactive and destructible environments. A new team of superheroes called the Imperfects joins the mayhem. You can play in single-player story mode to unlock collectible awards, or you can play against other gamers in multiplayer modes.

name: Mask of Dead II: Shadow Of Pelagius
summary: Mask of Dead 2: Shadow of Pelagius is a JRPG with an active combat system. A lot of time has passed since the first Adamant War the reapers were able to recover from the damage they received and restore Purgatory, but not for long... Riom Ruri, the son of the High Reaper, has just finished training and has already received his first task - to scout the surrounding area with a small squad of other reapers. But everything does not go according to plan and Riom is forced to face the mistakes of his brothers in the past and save Purgatory from complete destruction.

name: Mars After Midnight
summary: Mars After Midnight is an entrant-screening, mess-tidying, session-planning, martian-filled game for Playdate.

name: Majestic Majolical vol. 2
summary: The second volume of Majestic Majolical.

name: Manny's Week
summary: Manny's Week is a project taken on by a couple close friends using the engine Construct 2. It's intended to be a surreal experience through a particularly turbulent week of an increasingly unstable life.

name: Map Map: A Game About Maps
summary: Embark on a cozy treasure hunt as cartographer of an adventure crew. Use your sense of direction to make maps, help your companions and explore idyllic islands.

name: Mayoi Shopping Street
summary: ‚ÄúMayoi Shoutengai‚Äù is a first-person horror game where you must escape from a terrifying shopping district. You are the protagonist. Once you start, there's no turning back.

name: Maximus Mouse's Manic Mayhem
summary: Maximus Mouse is back! Experience Manic Mayhem across Story, Arcade & Trial modes. Or grab some friends for party mode!

name: Majestic Majolical vol. 3
summary: The third volume of Majestic Majolical.

name: Mad Father
summary: Mad Father is a horror-puzzle game that follows the experiences of a young German girl by the name of Aya Drevis.

name: Marvel's Midnight Suns: Redemption
summary:
Marvel's Midnight Suns: Redemption is the third DLC expansion for Marvel's Midnight Suns. This expansion introduces new story content centred around the character Venom, who becomes a playable hero. The DLC follows Venom's redemption arc after being corrupted by Lilith in the base game.

The expansion adds new missions where players can explore Venom's unique abilities and combat style, which includes powerful symbiote-based attacks. It also includes new enemies and challenges that fit into the overarching narrative of battling Lilith's demonic forces. As with other DLCs in Midnight Suns, "Redemption" further expands the roster of Marvel heroes and deepens the tactical options available to players.

name: Manaftory
summary: Collect resources, build machines, and automate everything. Explore magical lands, face hostile creatures, and turn their loot into part of your factory system. This is your Manaftory ‚Äî a magical factory powered by mana.

name: Mass Effect
summary: A remaster of the original Mass Effect included in the Mass Effect: Legendary Edition bundle.

name: Magix Music Maker
summary:
Magix Music Maker is a commercial digital music editor, which was designed by the company Magix for the consumer sector. In its present form, its program attributes originate from Magix's professional digital audio workstation, Samplitude. The first version of Music Maker was published in 1994. With more than a million copies sold, Music Maker has become one of Europe's most successful music editing programs.[3] Magix Music Maker is user friendly and someone without experience in music production is able to make songs in various genres.

A CD version for PlayStation 2 was released in 2003,[4] followed by a Deluxe Edition on DVD in 2005.[5] In 2013, Music Maker Jam was released for download in the Windows 8 store.[6] A version for Android followed later that year.[7]

name: Mass Effect 2: Collector's Edition
summary:
Two years after Commander Shepard repelled invading Reapers bent on the destruction of organic life, a mysterious new enemy has emerged. On the fringes of known space, something is silently abducting entire human colonies. Now Shepard must work with Cerberus, a ruthless organization devoted to human survival at any cost, to stop the most terrifying threat mankind has ever faced. To even attempt this perilous mission, Shepard must assemble the galaxy‚Äôs most elite team and command the most powerful ship ever built. Even then, they say it would be suicide.

The Collector‚Äôs Edition includes:
The full version of Mass Effect 2
48-page hardcover art book
Limited edition Mass Effect Redemption #1 comic book
Exclusive in-game Collectors‚Äô Edition weapon and armor
Bonus DVD with behind-the-scenes and making-of videos
Limited edition Cerberus Network card granting access to bonus content

name: Machine of the Wasteland
summary: High-octane vehicular combat action game set in a chaotic, post-apocalyptic world where survival hinges on your ability to outmaneuver and outgun your enemies.

name: Mars Era
summary: Mars Era is a turn-based strategy game about Mars colonization. Build your base, welcome settlers, gather resources, research technologies, and overcome the harsh conditions of the Red Planet. Manage your settlers, develop infrastructure, and turn Mars into a new home for humanity! üöÄ

name: Maze: Path of Light - Forest Edition
Mahjong Magic Journey 3
summary: An unforgettable journey through a magical world! Go in search of magical artifacts! Complete 120 unique levels of Mahjong!

name: Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree - Dark Ale Quest
summary: Embark on an exciting new quest within the world of Faelduum.

name: Mainu
summary: Mainu is a fast-paced action adventure set inside a mysterious 13-floor mall consumed by energy. When Tonu meets a girl named Venera, he learns that a powerful being named Ormatsu has unknowingly infused his excess magic into ordinary capsule toys‚Äîcreating living creatures called Mainus. Drawn to the mall‚Äôs endless flow of light, food, and movement, Ormatsu spreads through the building like a black hole, splitting himself into thirteen extensions that drain the life of each floor. Tonu‚Äôs own force energy allows him to control the awakened Mainus and fight back. Guided by Venera, he must collect, master, and unleash their power to stop Ormatsu before the entire mall‚Äîand reality itself‚Äîis consumed.

name: Make it! Choco Banana
summary:
It's time for a cute choco banana-making challenge!
Make as many as you can, and watch your food cart prosper!

name: Mass Mayhem 4
summary: In this 4th edition action series you get to create total havoc! With more weapons to use, bigger upgrades and badder costumes. There's 40 awesome objectives to complete, including underground passages, a busy freeway and even a nuclear plant! Go on crazy killing sprees and destroy everything on your path.

name: Maze in Your Mind
summary: Maze In Your Mind is a game about a three-layer maze connected by static portals where the player must find the right portal to unlock the final portal. Avoid enemies and explore the maze, but not the maze you see, but the maze you don't see, the maze in your mind.

name: Malevolence: The Sword of Ahkranox
summary:
Enter the world of Ahkranox - the first ever genuinely infinite first person roguelike. Become the incarnate form of a magical, sentient Sword, protecting a realm of dreams from the shadows of its own tormented soul, and stand as an eternal guardian against the infinite darkness that threatens to consume all.

In development since 2010 and meticulously inspired by the classic RPG experiences of the early 90s, this turn-based roguelike drops you into the infinite realm of Ahkranox, a dream-world in the mind of a sentient sword. The world is infinite, the loot is infinite, the quests are infinite and the possibilities are infinite. Relive the classic adventure experience of the past in this modern day salute to the pioneers of modern role playing.

name: Magic Realm: Online
summary: Magic Realm: Online is wave-based objective defense game featuring unique playable characters and a beautiful large map that allows strategic positioning. Play on your own or online with up to 4 people that can join anytime during the match and defend the Source Crystal from power-hungry invaders from another world

name: Maestro: La Cr√®me de la Cr√®me
summary: Slip into your brand-new tailcoat and get ready to charm the crowd with La Cr√®me de la Cr√®me, a free Content Update for Maestro!

name: MazeSlug
summary: This is an immersive first-person single-player horror game. Players will take on the role of an ordinary person returning home late at night, who inexplicably steps into a special space on a familiar path. You must explore and move forward in this space filled with unknown fears.

name: Madoris R
summary: "Madori" means house layout in Japanese. This is simple puzzle game and It has no time limit. -Rule- When you align the "Madori" blocks vertically or horizontally, those blocks change their own color. If you dye a whole of a block, the block is disappeared and you can get the point. Let's get a high score!

name: Marchen Veil I
summary:
People inhabiting a world called Felix communicate with gods to divine their future. The king of the Forest Country is looking for a husband for his daughter and organizes a tournament for noble young men from different countries. The prince from the Lake Country is victorious, but an evil magician turns him into a strange-looking creature and banishes him to faraway lands. The prince has to travel back and find a way to remove the curse.

M√§rchen Veil I is an overhead action game with light role-playing elements. The game consists of maze-like stages heavily populated by enemies. The prince has to fight his way through by using ranged magic, which effectively turns the game into a shooter. The magic attack can have different properties depending on the special items picked up by the prince. Throughout the game the player will also find items that restore or permanently increase the protagonist's health. Still-screen scenes (called "visual stages") advance the story between levels.

name: Masky
summary: Dance to the mystic sounds and invite as many dancers as you can.

name: Magical Capture
summary: A cosy, relaxing escape into a world of wonder‚ÄîMagical Capture wraps you in warmth and quiet charm.

name: Made in Nightmare
summary: Made in Nightmare is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The goal of the game is to explore Nemu's dream world and collect effects.

name: Maken Shao: Demon Sword
summary:
Maken is a man-made life form created to delve into the human soul and cure mental disease. Take control of this creature in an adventure that takes you across the globe in a battle against a terrorist organization led by a Chinese god.

A 3D action adventure - Maken Shao lets you possess the bodies of key game characters, unlocking their memories and special attacks as you struggle to uncover who is behind a sinister conspiracy to change the fate of humankind forever.

name: MagFighter
summary: Dive into the chaotic world of MagFighter! A top-down multiplayer brawler featuring 50+ spells for epic magical battles. Witness dynamic spell collisions, strategically customize your loadout, and enjoy GBA-era pixel art visuals. Unleash the magic and become the ultimate MagFighter!

name: Magnifico
summary: Magnifico is a popular region-based board game where the ultimate goal is to dominate 16th century Europe and is now available for PC! Play hard or play clever, Europe‚Äôs dominance is just one Victory Point away.

name: Mais qui est le vrai Roro?
summary:
Enter the wacky and crazy world of "Mais qui est le vrai Roro?" - an exciting game of hide-and-seek that will keep you on the edge of your seat until the very last second! But beware, this time you're facing off against your Twitch community in a fierce battle to uncover the true Roro.

Take on the role of the famous streamer and podcaster Roro, who must complete his daily tasks in his apartment invaded by fake Roros. Among them, you'll find racing Roros, an adorable cat named Fluffy, and even the expert in decoration, Marc-Emmanuel!

At the end of each round, your audience must vote to determine who the real Roro is. Each completed or failed task will eliminate fake Roros or unlock powers to muddy the waters!

So, are you ready to take on the challenge and prove to your community that you're the master of the game? Play "Mais qui est le vrai Roro?" now and find out if you're the best Twitch detective!

name: Mailbound
summary: The dead linger in the CRT glow, their wails rippling through the screen like disembodied echoes. And now‚Ä¶ you‚Äôre drifting with them...

name: Magical Princess
summary: Raise your daughter while she attends a magical academy. Choose which classes she attends, jobs she does, training she undergoes, and more in a character raising sim packed full of story and over 50 endings to reach. How she grows up to be the world's cutest princess depends on you!

name: Mathle
summary: Guess the exact addition or subtraction in five tries. The form of the equation is "a + b = c" or "a - b = c", where c is positive

name: Marble's Marbles
summary: A love letter to the classic marble games. Help Marble find his lost marbles and roll through physics-powered worlds packed with wild challenges and quirky contraptions.

name: Magic Frame
summary: Go on a journey in Magic Frame - classics inspired Action-platformer. Explore levels and caves, fight bosses, upgrade equipment and enjoy the ambient.

name: Magical Taluluto-kun
summary:
Magical Taluluto-kun is a 1992 action game for the Sega Mega Drive by Sega and Game Freak to tie into Tatsuya Egawa's/Shueisha's Magical Taruruuto-kun manga, which had been recently turned into an anime by Toei Animation.

C jumps; C in mid-air lunges forward. By default, B attacks. When standing next to an object, B will grab that object; B again throws it at enemies. Objects can only be used in the area they are found. You get a new magic power after every stage; hit Start to bring up a menu to choose one and A to use.

name: Mach Rider
summary: Mach Rider is a futuristic driving video game created by Nintendo. It was first released on November 21, 1985 for the Nintendo Family Computer in Japan. The game received a North American release in mid-1986 as part of the second wave of NES releases by Nintendo. On March 15, 1987 it was released in Europe and Australia. In July 2007 a modified version was released on the Wii's Virtual Console, which allowed designed tracks to be saved.

name: Mad Survivor: Arid Warfire
summary: Mad Survivor: Arid Warfire is one of the newest post-apocalypse survival city-builder RPG that sees you surviving the harsh and arid region created around you after nuclear warfare between countries around the world happened.

name: Marriage Royale: Prism Story
summary: Marriage Royale's story revolves around the male protagonist, a high school student named Hinomoto Tsukasa, who is told one day by his parents that he was adopted. Furthermore, they tell him that his real father is a manager of a large company, meaning he is very rich and holds a lot of power. Tsukasa's real father wants his son to marry a good woman, so he sets up an event known as Marriage Royale where beautiful girls from all over Japan will come together at a school built especially for the event and vie to become Tsukasa's fianc√©. The school is located on an isolated island near Japan, and Tsukasa himself is taken there to live in a mansion in the care of two twin maids: Miku, the elder sister, and Miu, the younger sister. There are various paths the player can take in the game beyond the main marriage path provided that the player fulfills the correct requirements to open those paths up. These paths are designated by different colors and include a red route which involves investigating dangerous ruins and a yellow route which involves the girls aiming to be idols.

name: Mass Effect 3: Citadel
summary: When a sinister conspiracy targets Commander Shepard, you and your team must uncover the truth, through battles and intrigue that range from the glamour of the Citadel's Wards to the top-secret Council Archives. Uncover the truth and fight alongside your squad ‚Äì as well as the cast from the original Mass Effect and Mass Effect 2, including Urdnot Wrex!

name: Magic Click
summary: Jagshemash! You like sexy time? I like sexy time too! I show you something. Here is magic click. You use this click, girls show shes vazheen and dance for you. Click-click-click! Very nice, very nice! You click often - the line of romance explosion go up! Wawaweewa! You buy this clicker, you get 10 animated girls with big plastic chests and shave down below in sexy poses. Click-click-click! Elf girl, nun girl, slave-raccoon girl, honey rabbit girl and many others are await to meeting you!! Greatest achievement of all of the glorious Kazakhstani's game dev! You can play this game even if your brother bit your hands off - you need no hands to play! Make girl happy, give her money or give her nice ring and she will take her cloth for you, you don‚Äôt press nothing! Chenquieh. High five! Great success!

name: Mason and Strings
summary: Mason needs Strings' help to learn how to play guitar so she can perform at the Castle Concert. Travel around Hub City to collect music sheets, solve puzzles, and interact with the many inhabitants! With Strings, you can grapple between platforms and play different chords using the Chord Wheel! Enjoy exploring a lively world and becoming a master musician!

name: Mario & Luigi: Superstar Saga + Bowser's Minions
summary:
"The game that launched the Mario & Luigi series returns looking better than ever before.

In this renewed classic, Mario and Luigi journey to the Beanbean Kingdom with Bowser to restore Princess Peach‚Äôs voice. Control Mario and Luigi simultaneously, making use of their unique Bros. Moves to solve puzzles and emerge victorious in action-packed battles. Pay heed to the enemy‚Äôs patterns and time your reactions right to land satisfying counterblows.

Included in this remake is the Minion Quest: The Search for Bowser mode, which tells the story of the game from the perspective of Bowser‚Äôs minions. Recruit characters to grow your own Minion army as you fight to locate your missing leader!"

name: Magic: The Gathering 7th Edition Starter
summary:
Introductory game to help new players learn how to play Magic the Gathering.
This game was developed by Coresoft Inc. and published by Wizards of the Coast.

It was included in the 2-Player Duel Sets of the 7th Edition Core Set of Magic the Gathering in 2001.

name: Maxi Trucks Racing
summary: Big trucks. High speed. Pure asphalt.

name: Matchsticks: Coffee Break Club
summary: We‚Äôve been taught not to play with fire, but the matches of this game aren‚Äôt going to burn you! Challenge your mind moving, adding and removing matchsticks until you find the correct solution. How many tries do you need to solve each level?

name: Marble Merger
summary: A "Suika Game" clone for PICO-8. Drop marbles into the container - if two marbles of the same size touch each other, then they merge together to form a single larger marble, and you get some points (larger merges have larger value). If a marble comes to rest while going past the top of the container, you lose!

name: Marble Merger
summary: A "Suika Game" clone for PICO-8. Drop marbles into the container - if two marbles of the same size touch each other, then they merge together to form a single larger marble, and you get some points (larger merges have larger value). If a marble comes to rest while going past the top of the container, you lose!

name: Mawthorne 2
summary: A new metroidvania adventure for the NES!

name: Mana Khemia: Alchemists of Al-Revis - Premium Edition
Marble World: Winter Pack
summary: Expand your marble worlds with the winter pack! Introducing new props, effects, skins, paints and featuring a winter wonderland world to build your coolest track in.

name: Marble Mayhem
summary:
A labyrinth game where players must use motion controls to navigate to the exit of the maze. Harder difficulties include limited lives and pitfalls to be avoided.

Preinstalled on Motorola Razr+ smartphones and designed to be played on the device's outer screen.

name: Mage Wars
summary:
Shout ‚Äî and Cast!
In Mage Wars, you control magic with your voice. Your real voice.

Want to blow up your enemies? Just say ‚ÄúFireball!‚Äù
Want to disappear? Say ‚ÄúInvisible!‚Äù ‚Äî and vanish into the shadows.

Yes, your voice is your weapon. Experience magic like never before!

name: Mall Craze
summary: Build, Customize, and Manage your very own mall! Construct shops, restaurants, fitness center, or movie theater. Hire staff, fulfill customer‚Äòs needs, advertise your mall, research new products, and set better prices to grow your mall. Master these and become a tycoon giant!

name: Mama Possum
summary: Two sisters, a truck driver and a housewife, fend off a Kaiju apocalypse in the Great Smoky Mountains with their mech Mama Possum.

name: Magic Triangles
summary: Hexiamond puzzle game and mosaic painting with equilateral triangles.

name: Mana Khemia: Student Alliance
summary: The 4th entry in the RPG series, Mana Khemia is different from the previous Atelier Iris games. Mana Khemia is a campus sim style RPG, where you can interact with classmates and professors to complete academic quests. You play as Vayne Aurelius, a novice alchemist who was invited to attend Al - Revis Academy. At the academy, Vayne will meet human and not so human alchemists, and together you will solve the mysteries of alchemy.

name: Majestia
summary: Majestia

name: Magic LightHouse
summary: Magic LightHouse - A top-down game where you play the role of an old wizard, whose skills in dealing with fire are only needed to set fire to signal lights, with each level it becomes more and more difficult not to set yourself on fire, so be careful, wizard!

name: Mallows
summary:
This is the game where the Mallows are.
A challenging game about tapping marshmallows to save them from a campfire.
You'll have 3 lifes, so it won't be easy.
A casual game for the moments in which you have to be patient and wait for something important.

name: Mario Bros. Classic Serie
summary: Mario Bros. Classic Serie is an European exclusive version of Mario Bros., released in 1993. It is very faithful to the arcade original, but is built upon the changes made in Kaettekita Mario Bros., removing the extra mode it had.

name: Maze Hunter 3-D
summary:
You are trapped in a twenty-level creature filled maze. Your job is to make your way to the bottom and get out alive. Pick up the iron bar and use it to destroy enemies that get in your way. Find the silver key to open the locked warp portal leading to the next level.

Requires 3-D glasses to play.

name: Manual Intervention
summary: Manual Intervention is a planetary defence game, where the core game mechanic is to orbit around 3D planets and defend the ground colonies by destroying the incoming bombs.

name: Math Quest VR : The Search for the Crown of Calculation
summary: Turn math into an adventure! Blast through interactive worlds of Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, and Division. Play Story Mode to grow your skills or Arcade Mode for a fast-paced challenge!

name: Mario vs. Airman
summary: A single-stage Super Mario Bros. romhack which allows Mario to take on Air Man's stage from Mega Man 2, set to an 8-bit arrangement of the popular doujin song "Air Man ga Taosenai" ("Can't Beat Air Man").

name: Mary Jane
summary: Start as a small producer, produce and distribute. Fight rival gangs and become the baron of two cities.

name: Mario Kart Live: Home Circuit
summary:
Turn your home into a race track with Mario Kart Live: Home Circuit, a brand new way to experience Mario Kart on Nintendo Switch!

Drive a kart in the real world using familiar Mario Kart controls and see the action from your kart‚Äôs on-board camera displayed on your Nintendo Switch or TV screen. Watch as your home is transformed into ocean depths, a sandy desert and more from the world of Mario Kart!

name: Mars Accident
summary: Mars Accident is a 2d shooter where the player dodges a falling and flying saucer. The only thing that raises it is the laser energy bunches that the hero releases and which destroy the aliens. The goal of the game is to fight off the alien attack and protect your spaceship from the attack.

name: Mahjong VR
summary: This is a game playing mahjong in a virtual reality environment
developers: Shanghai YiJun Network Info Technologies Inc.
publishers: Shanghai YiJun Network Info Technologies Inc.

name: Math Seeker
summary: Push the boxes and solve the math puzzles! Here, you will enjoy the charm of math seamlessly woven into the gameplay. A variety of boxes and mechanisms infused with mathematical elements await your discovery. Unleash your wit, unravel the game's secrets, and claim the crown of math!

name: Mandela Invasion II: Disorder
summary: Sequel to Mandela Invasion from Broken Arrow Games

name: Maboroshi Tsukiyo
summary: Maboroshi Tsukiyo is a visual novel adventure game that originated on Dreamcast and was ported to PlayStation platform half a year later. The game features fullscreen presentation with dialogue and description text displayed over dimmed background rather than utilizing dialogue windows. The story progresses one day at the time and takes place between June and September. The protagonists whose name can be entered by the player or left the default one, is a high-school student who one day meets Ayame, a ghost girl, who starts living with him. Ayame cannot do much in her ghost form, but she can possess someone else's body. Suddenly, our protagonist's peaceful life turns to mystery and adventure filled one. Based on player's actions as well as events in the past intertwined with present story, the game will branch in a certain direction and lead to one of several different endings.

name: Mario & Sonic at The Olympic Winter Games Pyeongchang 2018
summary: Play as Mario or Sonic in 20 different dream events!

name: Majuu-ou: King of Demons
summary: Majuu-ou is a side-scrolling platformer for the Super Nintendo, taking influences from Castlevania and Contra. You play as Abel, intent on rescuing his daughter from the depths of Hell. As you defeat certain bosses, they will drop large, color changing gems. Pick up the gem, and you'll transform into either a red Harpy, a blue Dragon, or a green Lizard, depending on what color it is when you pick it up. Each demon type has its own special attacks.

name: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: You are Star-Lord. The fate of the galaxy and the Guardians is in your hands. Time to show the universe what you‚Äôre made of. You got this. Probably.

name: Mayhem 2018: Purple Edition
summary:
MAYhem 2018 is a pair of megawads for Boom-compatible source ports, totaling 42 levels created in May 2018 by members of the Doomworld forums. It is the seventh installment of the MAYhem series, and was led by James Caldwell (Obsidian) for the first time in the series, who took over from Michael Fraize (Marcaek).
Series founder TheMionicDonut proposed that as a reference to the Pok√©mon series of video games, MAYhem 2018 would feature two megawads, run as separate projects at the same time. The orange edition features 22 levels, whilst the purple edition has 20. Each edition contains its own roster of custom monsters through the use of DeHackEd and custom palettes to bring out the colour themes better.

name: Magicbook AutoBattler: Contract
summary: This is a brand - new strategic auto - chess game that integrates RPG and roguelike elements. In the world of the Grimoire, players can freely create combinations and indulge in endless battles.

name: MAOUISHO:~ La Dolce Vita with Another World's Demon Lord~
summary: One day, you encounter a wounded woman, unable to communicate verbally and emitting an aura of suspicion. Despite the mysterious circumstances, and burdened by the physical and mental toll of a harsh corporate environment, you decide to welcome her into your life.

name: Magin: The Rat Project Stories
summary: Magin is a combination of a narrative-driven adventure RPG with a deck-building card game. The nonlinear plot, comic book esthetics, full voiceover and game mechanics are all tightly attached to the represented world in a unique fantasy setting.

name: Madeline: European Adventures
summary: Children join author Ludwig Bemelmans' brave little Parisian schoolgirl as she and her eleven roommates travel the continent, in Madeline European Adventures. This educational game, intended for children ages five and up, is designed to help players develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills, as well as an awareness of foreign languages. As they travel with Madeline from Paris to Switzerland, Italy, and Turkey, players will help the girls solve four main mysteries -- one in each country. Children can also become familiar with the locations, capitals, and flags of 19 European nations, and the game encourages players to learn over 100 words in Spanish and French.

name: Malum
summary: Malum is a co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. Hell has come to Earth and only our most fearless warriors can hold back the tide. Unfortunately for us, that means you guys.

name: Mario Goes to the Store & Buys a Gallon of Milk
summary: Oh no! Mario and Luigi are all out of milk! Now they need to go the store and buy more!

name: Mario no Photopi
summary: Japan only creativity game. Allowed players to import digital photos and other images and transfer between cards.

name: Make It Stop!
summary: A 3D shooter that places the player in the cockpit of a ship traveling through the bloodstream, fighting off viruses.

name: Magic Farm 3: The Ice Danger
summary: "Magic Farm 3: The Ice Danger" is a farming simulator game, with a simple-RPG system and quests. This is a continuation of the Magic Farm series for PC and Mac. You'll play as an Iris, a girl with an ability to grow magical plants who need to take care of her new farms.

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories
summary: Maybe: Interactive Stories is a visual novel app full of originally-written novels, as well as beloved classics from NAVER such as Remarried Empress, Lady in Armour, A Good Day To Be A Dog, as well as so much more! Collect outfits, special interactions with your favourite characters, and look at a collection of fantastic illustrations created by numerous illustrators in every chapter! Romance, drama, fantasy, thriller‚Äîa variety of visual novels that are updated weekly are waiting for you!

name: Manalia Notes: A Memory of Innocence
summary: 2D Shooting Game √ó A Brick Breaker! Embark on an adventure with the wizards Phurl, Eire, and Till!

name: Mahjick: The Realm Taker
summary: "Mahjick - The Realm Taker" is a turn-based strategy game combining Roguelike and Mahjong Elements. Embark into this epic journey of taking the throne and to become the Keeper by defeating enemies for Enchantments and Skills, and Ronning your tiles for Attribute and Talent skills.

name: Mad Metal
summary: Mad Metal is a vehicle combat roguelite set in a dying America. Customize your vehicle, master precision car-to-car combat, and fight through dynamic arenas as a broken cop races to rescue his daughter and stop an AI-driven apocalypse.

name: M.A.D. Cows and D.U.M.B. Ducks Bundle
summary:
Better together!

M.A.D. Cows is an exciting, retro, action platform game. Mow down aliens. Buy better guns. Rescue cows, dogs, raccoons, and more.

D.U.M.B. Ducks is an action-filled, retro platform game. Slaughter giant snails. Battle gigantic beasts. Buy better guns. Blow up walls. Collect fat stacks of cash.

name: MaguSphere: Magical Cannon Girls
summary: Take on the role of a cute girl armed with a stupidly powerful "Magical Cannon" and destroy your enemies and the city in this Musou-style TPS game. Total destruction ("Full Break") of not only enemies but the surrounding city is key here. Get destroyin' and bring peace (?!) back to the city!

name: Massive Chalice
summary: Massive Chalice is a single player turn-based tactics game within a multi-generational strategy campaign where you must unite your kingdom under a powerful dynasty as an immortal King or Queen to eliminate the demonic threat, and reforge the Massive Chalice.

name: Mayhem Brawler II: Best of Both Worlds
summary: A perfect fuse of '90s arcade vibe and modern rogue-lite / RPG mechanics in a time transition-themed beat 'em up. Play solo or online with friends and shape the story through your choices. Be amazed by the hand-drawn comics-inspired art, frame-by-frame animated characters, and kick-ass soundtracks.

name: Mate in Eleven
summary: Auto-chess. Position your units, and the engine plays for you. Last player standing wins.

name: Magnum Opus
summary: Join Magnum Opus the online social multiplayer game and hang out with friends from all around the world! Play multiplayer minigames, meet new people or explore several planets in the vast universe of the metaverse.

name: Match & Mastery
summary: Match & Mastery is a Turn-Based Tactics game with a Match-3 twist. Master your Magic, unleash powerful spells, and face challenging foes to free the land from a deadly magical blight.

name: Mario Paint BS Ban: Yuushou Sakuhin Naizou Version
summary: Mario Paint BS Ban - Yuushou Sakuhin Naizou Version (also known as Mario Paint Yuushou Naizou Ban is a Downloadable Game for the Satellaview that ran between December 28, 1997 and January 31, 1998. It is a modified version of the original Mario Paint BS Ban that includes the winning design from the associated "Mario Paint Contest". The winning picture was designed by a Tokyo-based gamer named Hiroko Mizota, and it is entitled "Dreaming of the Moon.

name: Math Genius: Subtraction
summary: Math Genius: Subtraction is a fun and educational game that challenges players with randomly generated multiplication problems. Players fill in the missing number in the equation by choosing one of three possible answers. Keep track of your progress with on-screen counters displaying your correct and incorrect answers. Perfect for sharpening math skills in a quick, engaging format!

name: Magicka: Horror Props Item Pack
summary: An item pack filled with nasty things you would find at any ordinary horror movie set. Whether you prefer slashers or mad stories from the 1920s, this pack contains something for you.

name: Mass Effect 2: Kasumi - Stolen Memory
summary: "Stolen Memory" introduces two new missions where the player assumes the role of Commander Shepard, an elite human soldier who must recruit a new squad member named Kasumi Goto and help her steal a graybox that contains important information and memories of her partner.

name: Magical Manifest
summary: Even wizards need to take a break from‚Ä¶ Whatever they do. So, they made a card game! Enchant the deck in your favor while sabotaging your friends. Magical Manifest is as mystical as you make it in this rogue-like take on Crazy 8s.

name: Mass Effect 2: Zaeed - The Price of Revenge
summary: Zaeed - The Price of Revenge is a DLC pack for Mass Effect 2.

name: Mahjong Realms
summary: Dive into a world of mystical, alien realms in this unique take on mahjong solitaire. Unlock new themes as you advance and design your own layouts to share with the community.

name: Mass Effect 2: Lair of the Shadow Broker
summary: Liara T'Soni is tracking down the mysterious Shadow Broker, and no one is safe. She'll do anything to recover the man the Broker kidnapped... and the Shadow Broker's agents will do anything to stop her. Team up with Liara and chase clues from the luxurious heights of Illium to the Shadow Broker's own secret lair. This DLC adds the Shadow Broker intel center, new research, and five new achievements ‚Äì and the chance to continue a relationship with Liara.

name: Master Magistrate
summary: Solve crimes and pass judgment with a colorful cast of samurai, detectives, inventors, and brigands in a Japan on the edge of modernization. A visual novel detective game set in a town where the cherry trees bloom all year round.

name: March of War
summary:
The year is 1947. The world lies ravaged by war. Align yourself with one of six warring factions and fight for global domination in a world where borders rapidly shift as battles are won and lost.

This is March of War. An online turn-based strategy game set in a dieselpunk world where strategy and firepower rule the day. Take command and lead your army into 3D battlefields that allow you to assess the war-zone from every angle. Deploy a wide range of vehicles, infantry and artillery where their specific weapons can be most effective.

Destroy your enemies and capture their territory to advance through the ranks of your faction. Rise high enough and you‚Äôll have the honour of joining your faction‚Äôs High Command, or perhaps even be voted Faction Leader. Achieving High Command or Faction Leader status expands the game into an intricate web of political allegiances and betrayals, where your decisions directly influence the course of the war as you strive to lead your faction to global domination.

name: Mage Gauntlet
summary:
Mage Gauntlet is a classic-style action-RPG, designed from the ground up for mobile. It's inspired primarily by 90's action RPGs for the Super Nintendo, such as Legend of Zelda: LTTP and Secret of Mana. We wanted to make a fast-paced RPG that doesn't waste your time with fetch quests.

Fight and explore your way through a humorous storyline about eccentric wizards, powerful artifacts, and dangerous monsters. Find items to customize your character's strengths and weaknesses. Enjoy smooth, responsive controls and fast, satisfying combat. When you beat the game, unlock a remixed Master Mode with overwhelming enemy numbers and new secrets to uncover.

name: Marrow
summary: Marrow is a 2D, Cosmic-Horror themed, action-adventure game emphasizing challenge, puzzles, platforming, combat and navigation. Leap, crawl, slash and blast your way through the cavernous bowels of a menacing mountain in a quest to find your lost friends.

name: Matrix Bro
summary: Matrix Bro is an arcade-style rougelite battle game where you control a team made up of multiple brothers to defeat all enemies that block their continuous evolution. Of course, this is only possible if your team can survive the relentless onslaught of enemies that keep appearing...

name: Machick 2: Journey to the East
summary: A new journey to the east begins with 4 new chickens, 30 new accessories, 4 new stages in this upcoming free update to Machick 2.

name: Maneater: Truth Quest
summary: Maneater: Truth Quest DLC takes players to a brand-new island off the coast of Port Clovis ‚Äì and comes packed with new evolutions, challenges, wildlife, and more! Players will once again take control of the apex predator of the sea to Eat, Explore and Evolve their way to the top of the food chain.

name: Margo
summary: Margo is a short (30-60 min), point-and-click style slice-of-life adventure/art game. It follows the character of Margo, who has just awoken from an accidental nap. The player must complete various tasks to guide Margo through her evening, while putting up with her habit of overthinking.

name: Mass Effect: Andromeda
summary:
A new adventure awaits in the Mass Effect universe. With stunning visuals and a new galaxy to discover, BioWare delivers the next generation of space exploration.

Commander Shepard's story may be over, but there are many more stories to tell in the Mass Effect universe. Mass Effect Andromeda will be set in a new galaxy, with new characters, new quests and a whole load of new consequence-laden decisions to make.

Mass Effect: Andromeda takes you to the Andromeda galaxy, far beyond the Milky Way. There, you'll lead our fight for a new home in hostile territory - where WE are the aliens.

Play as the Pathfinder - a leader of a squad of military-trained explorers - with deep progression and customisation systems. This is the story of humanity‚Äôs next chapter, and your choices throughout the game will ultimately determine our survival in the Andromeda Galaxy.

As you unfold the mysteries of the Andromeda Galaxy and the hope for humanity lies on your shoulders ‚Äì You must ask yourself‚Ä¶ How far will you go?

Key Features:

Return to the Mass Effect universe. Lead the first humans in Andromeda on a desperate search for our new home. In this new chapter of Mass Effect, meet and recruit all-new, interesting characters caught up in an epic space saga filled with mystery and galactic conflict.

Fight for survival. Battle with your Pathfinder team against terrifying enemies and creatures. New additions like destructible environments, boosted jumps for added verticality, and all-new weapons and Biotics make combat more thrilling than ever.
