summary: In pursuit of your missing colleague your car breaks down. You enter the only house for miles to use the phone. What follows next can only be described as an intense, action-driven fight for survival. What horrors lay within the house? Only one thing is certain: you need to get out.

name: Market Simulator
summary: Build, manage, and dominate the retail world ‚Äî from a humble shop to a thriving supermarket empire in Market Simulator.

name: Madness Below
summary: Madness Below is a RPG dark fantasy horror game developed by Sif Kamira that began development in November 2024.

name: Matchuie
summary: Matchuie is a fun and flexible match-three game with hundreds of levels and unique themes to explore. Play at your own pace, then get creative by turning any image into your own match-three masterpiece. Share your designs and discover what others have made!

name: Mario in the Dreamscape
summary: Mario follows Bowser into a hectic realm where everyone is being watched...

name: Magical Nut Ikuno
summary: This is an action game where you will defeat the stage by collecting Crysnuts that are on the map without bumping into any enemies. Will radiant Fighters Ikuno Hinata and Anami Tsukine be able to destroy the ambitions of the evil empress Hamester!?

name: Marginal #4 Road to Galaxy
summary: The story begins two years after Kataoka Yue joined the talent production company ‚ÄúPythagoras Productions‚Äù. She‚Äôs worked her way up and now helps manage two of the company‚Äôs most popular groups ‚Äì Marginal#4 & Lagrange Point. One day, Yue and the group members are all called into the company president‚Äôs office and introduced to a new group called ‚ÄúUnicorn Jr.‚Äù who will have their d√©but at this year‚Äôs ‚ÄúUniverse Fes‚Äù. Once the introductions are over with and everyone leaves the office, the president holds Yue back and tells her that she will be in charge of organizing a huge event called ‚ÄúPythagoras ‚ú∞ All Star Fes‚Äù featuring all three groups. As she only has 6 months to prepare, the president tells her that she can only be in charge of one group at the moment and asks her to choose between the three. Which will she choose?

name: Majyo Crush
summary: This is a Japanese-style beautiful girl elimination game, where you can meet and conquer various witches with different personalities. How will you, as a gentleman, make decisions when facing their problems and challenges? Hurry up and take action before dawn!

name: Mandela Invasion
summary: FNAF like game inspired by Mandela Catalogue

name: Magna Carta: Tears of Blood - Deluxe Box Set
summary:
An RPG that combines Western-styled history and graphic design with Japanese-styled RPG gameplay, from Korean developer Softmax (one of the first games for the launch of PS2 in Korea.) The sarcastic hero Calintz Jerevinan sets out for adventure after returning home ho his home land of Shudelmir and finds the place overrun with disaster. Along the way, he will meet the mysterious girl Adora, the frosty Princess Juclesia, and other characters in a gigantic game world powered by the ASURA engine. The game uses a FF-style Active Battle system, with Time Points for movement and attach manuever planning, and each character can use one of seven kinds of Carta for tremendous special techniques.

Bonus materials include a poster, a mini strategy guide and art book...Revenge is the only thing that can erase this hatred...In the land of Efferia, humans and native-Efferians uneasily co-exist in the throes of an endless war. A young man out for revenge against the natives finds a girl who's lost her memories...Where will destiny lead them...?

name: Mademoiselle Kshatriya
summary: A young shrine maiden and her friend got lost in her dreaming world on Brahmanism. According to Manusmriti, no woman is permitted into four Varnas. A woman is born to be in the same class as the untouchable class. But her destiny helps her with trying to deny the irrational black magic.

name: Madman's Dice
summary: An RPG Maker Horror game with a focus on exploration and puzzles where the player completes stories to win a prize from a Game Master.

name: Mark My Words
summary: The word-building roguelike. 'Mark My Words' is an addictive deckbuilder where you assemble high-scoring words, discover fancy Stickers, and utilize Glyphs to unleash intriguing combinations. Master the Art of Wordplay in several different Game modes!

name: M.A.Z.E
summary: You wake up disoriented in a labyrinth, armed with nothing but a flashlight and a video camera... Solve puzzles, uncover secrets, and find a way out, but you'll have to hurry because time is running, and each day in the labyrinth brings you closer to the end... you are not alone in this place.

name: Marshmallow Marvin: Greenwood
summary: Marshmallow Marvin on a sweet new adventure in Greenwood! Explore a magical forest full of vibrant mysteries, quirky creatures, and hidden secrets, where every corner holds a new challenge for our squishy hero!

name: Master Lander
summary: Master Lander is a hard-to-beat 2d physics driven landing game with a centric gravity. You take on a role of remote lander pilot. Your task is to bring the lander from the orbit down to the surface of each of 27 different exoplanets. In order to achieve high score award you need to hover close to alien artifacts scattered on the planets before landing precisely in designated zone. By controlling the thrust of two rocket engines you need to adjust your velocity in order to descend from the orbit and land softly on the landing pad. Watch your fuel, altitude and attitude to land like a pro!

name: Mazzle Christmas
summary: Mazzle Christmas is a straightforward yet surprisingly challenging celebration of the simple beauty of mazes and jigsaw puzzles in a Christmas style.

name: Master's Fury
summary: Master's Fury is an arcade fighting game from Unico, and is a sequel of sorts to Dragon Master.

name: Maggot Face
summary: Your sister and a lot of other people are missing, solve the mystery and find your sister Kirsty!

name: Mario Tennis
summary: Spin, Lob, Drop, Smash -- It's time for some Mario Tennis! Take your game to the next level in Mario Tennis with 3 fun-packed modes! Practice control on your swings and shots in Exhibition Mode. In Mario Tour, create your own tennis player on three different save slots. Begin your tennis career as a rookie at the Royal Tennis Academy, where coaches share their sage advice and the students are all about winning. Gain experience by training and playing matches, then divide those points across stats for spin, power, control and speed. As your performance improves, you will be able to face tougher adversaries‚Äîand maybe even get to encounter some familiar faces! Need a break? Then try your luck on some Mario Mini-games. It‚Äôs time to pick up your racquet, and start playing!

name: Mario Party-e: Free Challenge - Cast Away Mario!
summary:
As part of the Free Challenge Cards from Mario Party-e, these cards are supposed to be played to help the player gain an advantage during the analog board game by winning them through tasks.

Cast Away Mario has Princess Peach ask Mario for a fish to catch in a crane game style.

name: Mario Super Sluggers Cards
summary: To coincide with the North American release of Mario Super Sluggers in August 2008, an online card game was created on . The cards to collect for it were found on kid-friendly sites like 4KidsTV and Nick.com and even YouTube (mainly to promote the Mario Super Sluggers game itself).

name: MarbleGP
summary: Welcome to the World of Marbles. The marbles are a peacful species. They know no greed, envy or anger. All they care about is to put fun in their lifes, some like to unveil the secrets of the universe, some prefer to discuss about the meaning of liff, some others like to race.

name: Mario Party-e: Duel Challenge - Bolt from Boo
Marvel Future Revolution
summary: Marvel Future Revolution is Marvel‚Äôs first Open World RPG mobile game, featuring an original storyline with fan-favorite Marvel Super Heroes and Super Villains. Written by veteran comics writer Marc Sumerak (Avengers, Thor, Iron Man, Fantastic Four, Black Panther, Captain Marvel, etc.), Marvel Future Revolution begins with numerous Earths converging across multi-dimensions to form an entirely new ‚ÄòPrimary Earth.‚Äô As agents of the newly formed ‚ÄòOmega Flight‚Äô Super Hero team, players will work together to battle an onslaught of Super Villains, confront their nefarious behaviors and defend the universe.

name: Mario Party-e: Free Challenge - Fast Feed Yoshi!
Mapped by Our Ancestors
summary: A game about crawling in the dark, one death after another. Nothing you do will be saved, everything will eventually be forgotten. Go as far as you can until you feel you've reached a correct ending.

name: Mario Party-e: Wonder Challenge - Spinister Bowser
Mario Party-e: Duel Challenge - Wario's Bluff
Martian Routine
summary: Martian Routine is casual 3D walk simulator game about astronaut on Mars with puzzles. You will embark on a journey across the Red Planet and walk through the Martian desert landscapes, repairing vehicles and solar panels to survive and move forward.

name: Maimai DX Universe
summary: maimai Deluxe Universe is the third entry of the maimai Deluxe series, successor of the Maimai series. The game is played using touch screen or buttons on a large cabinet with a circular screen.

name: Mall Control
summary: Start broke in a hideout and build your mall empire. Buy shops, attract customers, and hack rivals at night all while avoiding guards. Play solo or co-op in this chaotic sim-stealth game!

name: MagiDes Kai: Mahou Shoujo Magical Destroyers Kai
summary: Magical Destroyers Kai was a mobile gacha action role-playing game created alongside the anime series Mahou Shoujo Magical Destroyers.

name: Mameshiba: Puzzle Festival
summary:
Mameshiba's puzzle festival is held!

Participating in over 500 puzzle festivals,
Become a PuzzleShiba with the best knowledge!

name: Mario Party-e: Free Challenge - Daisy's Rodeo!
summary:
As part of the Free Challenge Cards from Mario Party-e, these cards are supposed to be played to help the player gain an advantage during the analog board game by winning them through tasks.

Daisy's Rodeo is a game in which Daisy needs to stay on the Bowser bull bot as long as possible. Use B, L, and R triggers to help stay on!

name: Mario vs. Donkey Kong Card e+: Osarete Susume!
Mary King's Riding Star
summary: Riding Star is an equestrian simulation where the player has to take care of a horse and ride it in competitions. For the riding the game is shown from a top-down view and in preparation of events the horse needs to be groomed, fed and saddled. There are three different types of events to participate in: dressage, show jumping and cross country. There is also a three-day event. In the championship mode horse and rider compete in multiple championships and the player's care of the horse influences the performance. During the maintenance part everything is controlled with the mouse. In races the horse is controlled through the arrow keys with the space bar to jump. Next to the AI opponents it is also possible to compete with up to four friends on a single computer in the multiplayer event.

name: Mario Party 64
summary:
Mario Party 64 is a hack made by MrComit and released February 16, 2020. It contains 70 stars.

Its levels are all heavily based off Mario Party for the Nintendo 64, recreating all 8 boards. The music is also styled after Mario Party, along with several stars obtainable in unique mini-game scenarios.

name: Mad Rat
summary:
Mad Rat is a 1-player arcade game for the Apple II.

Three blind field mice named Masecy, Karson, and Marshall have been trapped in the Zacks 6th Avenue department store. Numerous dangers lurk there, and the Mad Merchandiser of Zacks takes perverse pleasure from throwing cheese at them for food, but then making it downright dangerous for them to get it.

The player controls a single mouse on a series of platforms moving in alternating directions. The player can move left or right, and can also jump to higher platforms, or fall down below. Numerous pieces of cheese recurrently appear on the screen, and every time the player collects 10 pieces, the conveyor belts move faster. A cat on the bottom of the screen will pace back and forth, and randomly jump to different platforms, and if it catches the mouse, it's a lost life It's also a lost life from falling through the hole in the bottom of the screen. If the player collects the green power-up at the top of the screen, they become a Mad Rat, whom can destroy the cat if they come in contact.

The player has a total of 3 mice, and when all are lost, it's game over.

name: Magic Survivors
summary: Magic Survivors is a casual game that combines elements of survival, roguelike survival, and role - playing. Players will control their characters to embark on a survival adventure in a world full of monsters.

name: Mahjong Senjutsu: Ando Mitsuru Pro no Akuukan Sappou
summary: Mahjong Senjutsu: Andou Mitsuru Pro no Akuukan Satsuhou is a Miscellaneous game, published by Warashi, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: Mass Effect 2: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: Includes Mass Effect 2 game, digital soundtrack, The Making of Mass Effect 2 videos, digital art book, Cerberus Network code, digital Mass Effect Redemption #1 comic, Collector Armor and Assault Rifle, and Incisor Rifle.

name: Magical MILFs
summary: 10 years after the defeat of the Nega-Force the Pure Maidens are back, and sexier than ever! These Magical Girls have grown up to become Magical MILFs! They might not be as slender and tight as they used to be, but their busty mature bodies spilling out of their skimpy uniforms are ripe for the picking.

name: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy: Cosmic Deluxe Edition
summary:
Fire up a wild ride across the cosmos with a fresh take on Marvel‚Äôs Guardians of the Galaxy. In this action-adventure game, you are Star-Lord leading the unpredictable Guardians from one explosion of chaos to the next. You got this. Probably.

The Cosmic Deluxe Edition includes:
- Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy
- SteelBook Case
- Sun-Lord Outfit for Star-Lord (Early Unlock)
- City-Lord Outfit for Star-Lord (Early Unlock)
- Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy: The Hits - Original Video Game Soundtrack (Digital Download)
- Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy: The Art of the Game Mini Artbook (Hardback)

name: Marvel's Midnight Suns: Legendary Edition
summary:
Marvel's Midnight Suns: Legendary Edition is a special edition of the game Marvel's Midnight Suns, developed by Firaxis Games and published by 2K Games. Released alongside the base game in December 2022, this edition includes the full game and the Season Pass.

Additionally, the Legendary Edition includes 23 Premium Skins available at launch.

name: Marvel's Midnight Suns: Season Pass
summary: The Season Pass for Marvel's Midnight Suns includes four post-launch DLC packs, each introducing a new fully playable hero, along with new missions, new enemies, and additional content. In addition to these expansions, the Season Pass also offers 23 Premium Skins available at launch, allowing players to customise the appearance of the Midnight Suns team.

name: Marauder Knight
summary: In the "Marauder Knight" game, you try to become the most skilled thief by stealing legendary ore. With each ore you steal, the number of knights and the risk of getting caught increases. Use your skills to evade them and discover new missions. Are you ready?

name: Madden NFL 13
summary: Play and manage football matches between real NFL teams, featuring the latest player lineups of 2013!

name: Marvel's Midnight Suns: The Hunger
summary:
Marvel's Midnight Suns: The Hunger is the second DLC expansion for Marvel's Midnight Suns, released in January 2023. This DLC introduces the character Morbius, the Living Vampire, as a fully playable hero. Morbius brings a unique set of vampire-themed abilities to the game, focusing on life-stealing attacks, supernatural speed, and other vampiric powers.

The expansion includes new story missions that delve into Morbius's battle against Lilith's forces and his struggles with his vampiric nature.

name: Major Party Racing
summary: Meet Major Party Racing‚Äîyour new party game! MPR is a wild mix of unpredictable racing and deep idle mechanics. Pick a pilot, set your goal, and brace yourself for surprises

name: Makeruna! Makendo 2: Kimero Yokai Souri
summary: Makenko used to be a normal boy‚Äîuntil he was kidnapped by the brain monster Dr. Mud and transformed into a cyborg capable of destroying both the monster and human worlds! On his quest for vengeance, he is inadvertently joined by Makendo, a fellow monster hunter who would prefer not to be, and her little sister Hikari who would like nothing better! Dastardly demons and wacky monsters abound as the trio fight the bad guys to kick some monster butt, and get Makenko's body back!

name: Maze: Path of Light - Dusk Constellations
summary:
With this DLC, you'll unlock 5 new constellations:
- Meerkat Constellation: 6 mazes
- Cheetah Constellation: 8 mazes
- Bat Constellation: 6 mazes
- Fire Constellation: 7 mazes
- Jelly Fish Constellation: 9 mazes

name: Madness of the Science
summary: Survive the explosion in the laboratory, prevent the spread of artificial intelligence robots that see us as enemies to the outside world. Get power from past scientists by making improvements from the skill tree. Enjoy science!

name: Mafia III: Sign of the Times
summary: "At Father James‚Äô request, hunt down a mysterious cult responsible for a string of ritualistic killings from the dark heart of the bayou through the drug-ridden counterculture of the inner city."

name: Mafia Romania
summary: MAFIA ROMANIA is a Free-to-Play multiplayer shooter with Romanian-Inspired locations, parkour/freerunning elements, and both first person/third person perspectives.

name: Madden NFL 99
summary: This is all-Madden football! Legendary gameplay. One-button simplicity. The ultimate NFL experience. New super hi-res polygon graphics. Monster hits - feel and hear the impact! 250 new motion captured NFL moves. New Arcade Mode - huge hits, more fun! Over 120 past and present NFL teams. Draft, trade, create, sign, and release players.

name: Marvel vs. Capcom 2: New Age of Heroes
summary: The Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 versions of Marvel vs. Capcom 2 features Online Multiplayer as well as widescreen support with optional graphics filter for smoother or crisper visuals.

name: Madden NFL 22
summary:
Madden NFL 22 is where gameday happens.

All-new features in Franchise include staff management, an enhanced scenario engine, and weekly strategy. Share avatar progress and player class between Face of The Franchise and The Yard with unified progression. And for the first time ever in Ultimate Team, adjust Superstar X-Factors at halftime.

name: Malediction
summary: Malediction is a third-person puzzle/platformer that gives the player the ability to control space and time! Use your magic to solve puzzles, navigate through a cursed city, and fight magic clones to reclaim your powers.

name: Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree - Digital Deluxe Edition contains:

- Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree - Digital Deluxe Edition
- Curious Ottling (Pet Follower)
- Nimble Doeling (Pet Follower)
- Shadowpyre Armor Transmog Set
- Gildcrest Armor Transmog Set
- Dark Ale Quest
- Original Soundtrack
- Digital Artbook

name: Mars Survivor: Complete Edition
summary: Conquer Mars, fend off alien threats, and secure your path to survival!

name: Manika
summary: "Manika" is a psychological horror game played in the first-person perspective. Solve puzzles to escape from a mental hospital where you don't know why you are there and try to regain your memories. Good luck, because you are not alone...

name: Mardori
summary: Mardori is a spaceshooter game with aspects of ARPG's. Upgrade your ship with various materials from missions, craft your equipment with damage or defense mods., create new weapons using blueprints, unlock new missions with Stargate.

name: Marrowbound
summary: First-person hack-and-slasher with a heavy emphasis on exploration and player expression. You are an instrument of divine retribution.

name: Masked Forces: Zombie Survival
summary: What will you do when the zombie apocalypse comes, are you ready to tackle it right now and stay face to face with all the horrors that will appear?

name: Marvel's Iron Man VR
summary: In Marvel's Iron Man VR the player, who plays as the genius inventor Tony Stark, confronts ghosts from his past‚Äîpowerful forces who seek to ruin him and everything he stands for. By fully embracing the magic of PlayStation VR, players will come face-to-face with iconic allies and Super Villains as they jet around the globe on a heroic mission to save not only Stark Industries, but the world itself.

name: Makai Kingdom: Chronicles of the Sacred Tome
summary:
Makai Kingdom is the fourth Nippon Ichi-developed tactical RPG on PlayStation 2 and it follows closely in the footsteps of the previous games of the same style, which are Disgaea: Hour of Darkness, La Pucelle: Tactics and Phantom Brave.

Lord Zetta, the king of Netherworld, tried to rewrite the history of the land but didn't succeed, and in the process brought demise onto himself. Three evil Overlords appeared before Zetta and promised to help him in his quest to take over the land once more. The player takes control of Zetta and his army to return Netherworld to its rightful owner.

The game mechanics consist of several stages in which the player must defeat the enemy or fulfill other tasks to advance to the next level. Fighting is done in turns, meaning that once the player has moved and attacked, it's the enemy's turn to move his troops one by one. When the battle is won, the next level becomes selectable. Between fights, you can improve your squad of fighters by buying better weapons, recruiting more soldiers and so on.

name: Mahluk: Dark demon
summary: Mahluk is a hack and slash platformer game with pixel-art style graphics and retro style addicting gameplay.

name: Mario Kart Arcade GP DX
summary: Mario Kart Arcade GP DX is a Mario Kart game for arcade systems, developed by Namco Bandai Games in partnership with Nintendo. It is the tenth installment in the Mario Kart franchise and the third title in the Arcade series following Mario Kart Arcade GP 2, which was a follow-up to Mario Kart Arcade GP. The game was released in Japan on July 25, 2013 and in the United States during 2014. Just like the previous two Arcade GP games, it is possible to do multiplayer play by linking up to four cabinets.

name: Marvel's Midnight Suns: The Good, The Bad, and The Undead
summary:
Marvel's Midnight Suns: The Good, The Bad, and The Undead is the first DLC expansion for Marvel's Midnight Suns, released in January 2023. This expansion introduces Deadpool as a fully playable hero, bringing his trademark humour, unpredictability, and unique combat abilities to the game.

The DLC adds new story missions focused on Deadpool's involvement in the battle against Lilith and her demonic forces. These missions are designed to showcase Deadpool's quirky personality and chaotic fighting style, which includes regenerative healing and a mix of melee and ranged attacks.

name: Mal√≥n
summary: From the plains in the Pampas to the most hostile places in the untamed Patagonia: Manage your own frontier outpost, build new structures, train soldiers, and survive relentless attacks from the enemy.

name: Mato Anomalies: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Mato Anomalies Digital Deluxe Edition includes:

Base Game
Pioneer's Badge
Treasure from Heaven (Mind Hack Card)
Early Spring (Mind Hack Card)
Witness of Truth
Special Weapon's Pack
Special Gears Pack
Soundtrack Jukebox
Digital Art Book

name: M.A.U.S
summary:
With his children away on the moon, there is no time to relax for Dr. Cavor. Once again, Victoria is under attack. The aging but brilliant scientist begins research on a new means of defense. After much work, he finds success with Mechanized Assault Unity 19 -- M.A.U.S.

There's no time to spare as MAUS must defeat a mysterious robotic horde that lurks on the outskirts of town. With a blaster gun on her arm and the ability to upgrade on the fly, MAUS will travel to outer space, ancient ruins, and an old forest to defeat her enemies.

name: M.A.R.S.
summary: MARS is a Third Person Shooter brimming with creativity and unique features long forgotten in this day of modern AAA games. From the hilarious Headhunter mode, to Huge Mecha vs Mecha battles, to fully customizable loadouts; MARS is a gem to behold amongst the TPS genre.

name: Map of Materials
summary: Vincent's epic adventure awaits you! In Map Of Materials, you'll find him stranded on a mysterious island, where he'll use all his skills and knowledge to escape and return to his old life. Will he make it out alive?

name: Magnus Imago
summary: Magnus Imago is an atmospheric journey through a mysterious world of characters, traces and symbols. The task of the player is to solve the puzzles, using proper combinations of objects, finding them in the environment around him.

name: Match-3: Matchington Mansion
summary:
Do you have a knack for home decor & matching puzzles? Match pillows for a house makeover in this fun match-3 adventure! 
 
Hone your interior design skills and protect your new house from a mischievous cousin. Follow the adventure story, unlock new rooms and discover hidden secrets ‚Äì all with a cast of quirky characters in tow. You can even spy on your neighbors and see how their design choices stack up. Are you ready to navigate this challenging match-3 puzzle? 
 
Decorate your mansion and deck out your garden in style. 
Unlock hidden areas & makeover each room with interesting decor. 
Puzzle out the adventure story, aided by your friend Tiffany, quirky characters and a house cat or pet dog along for the ride!

name: Mahjongg Investigations: Under Suspicion
summary: Organized crime is taking over Metro City. As a detective in the 83rd precinct you must use your Mahjongg skills to unearth clues and bring the criminals to justice. Don Diamante, the city's undisputed godfather, must be located and brought in. Collect and match evidence tiles to pinpoint perpetrators. Special clue tiles reveal hidden information and mini-games throughout allow you to interrogate, analyze, and close the case! Build your career as you make the streets safe for the good people of Metro City.

name: Maximum Apocalypse: The Video Game
summary: Scavenge, battle, survive! Choose your survivor and face diverse apocalyptic scenarios in this cooperative digital adaptation of the hit board game Maximum Apocalypse. Grab your friends or make new ones with 1-6 player apocalyptic roguelike gameplay.

name: Mari and Bayu: The Road Home
summary: Go on a grand voyage in this co-op platform-adventure game. Play as Mari the ant and Bayu the firefly to solve puzzles, surf the wind on a feather or even ride a friendly grasshopper!

name: Mary-Kate & Ashley: Crush Course
summary: Some totally cute boys have invited Mary-Kate and Ashley to a beach party but the directions have met a terrible fate! Someone has torn up the map that the twins were going to use to get to the shindig, and now they must pool their resources and find all of the pieces before the party starts without them. Some of the map is split up between the classrooms at school, some of them are in the hands of some weird girl that won't give them back, and others have completely disappeared. There are tons of mini-games to keep young gamers busy here, including a mini-golf outing, a cheerleading challenge, and many others. One of the game's best features is a creative music-making program that allows kids to punch in their own cool beats and tunes. You'll start out the game in the freshman class, but piecing together the map and completing a few of the side games will earn you a pass to the higher grades. Get good marks and chase after good-looking boys in this fabulous adventure.

name: Magna Carta Portable
summary:
This is a handheld port of the Playstation 2 game named Magna Carta: Tears of Blood. However unlike it's PS2 main version, this PSP port was only released in Japan.

Magna Carta: Tears of Blood is a Korean-made RPG in Japanese style, and a sequel to Phantom of Avalanche; it is set in the same world and has the same protagonist. The game's combat system is turn-based at core, but requires the player to press buttons in a rapid succession and with precise timing to execute attacks. The characters can store up energy to unleash a stronger attack later. Using the technique named Carta, they can also perform various special moves which are based on elemental affinities.

name: Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales - Ultimate Launch Edition
summary: In the latest adventure in the Marvel‚Äôs Spider-Man universe, teenager Miles Morales is adjusting to his new home while following in the footsteps of his mentor, Peter Parker, as a new Spider-Man. But when a fierce power struggle threatens to destroy his new home, the aspiring hero realizes that with great power, there must also come great responsibility. To save all of Marvel‚Äôs New York, Miles must take up the mantle of Spider-Man and own it.

name: Mario Kart Tour: Peach vs. Bowser Tour
Machineers
summary:
Equipped with a tool box full of gears, belts, and electric wires, you build and repair crazy contraptions. 
Each machine you fix brings you closer to becoming a true Machineer, and prepares you for your next challenge: the Vehicle Workshop, where you can design, drive, and refine your own car!

name: Malmyr
summary: Malmyr is a hybrid of city building and automation games. In contrast to other well known games of these genres the player is not meant to build the biggest city or largest factory. Malmyr's gameplay is focused on logic and creativity to accomplish the game's challenges. Each of the 12 missions of Malmyr's storyline have their own look & feel and compel the player to learn something new. Especially the quite unique resource transport mechanics stand out.

name: Marenian Tavern Story: Patty and the Hungry God
summary: Patty's brother has been possessed by the God of Poverty and the whole family has become poor, with huge debts... This is the beginning of Patty's struggle! To pay back the debts, let's open a tavern in Marenia, gather ingredients, and start cooking!

name: Magic Knight Rayearth
summary: Magic Knight Rayearth is a Role-playing game released by Tomy; released in 1995 in Japan for the Super Famicom (SNES), based on the 1994 anime by Clamp of the same name, Magic Knight Rayearth.

name: Mahou no Tenshi Creamy Mami: Futatsu no Sekai no Monogatari
summary: Game based on the anime Creamy Mami, the Magic Angel.

name: Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite
summary: Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite will feature a variety of exciting and accessible single player modes and rich multi-player content for new players and longtime fans alike. In addition to single player Arcade, Training and Mission modes, a visually stunning and immersive cinematic Story Mode will put players at the center of both universes as they battle for survival against a sinister new threat. Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite is being built to highlight a combination of iconic locations and fan favorite characters from both universes, including Captain Marvel and Iron Man from the Marvel side, and Ryu and Mega Man X from Capcom.

name: Masters Of Conquest
summary:
In traditional MOBA games, players play on flat surface map.
This game takes the concept further and places all gameplay on surfaces of planets.

Such feature gives the gamer very high level of immersion and a ‚Äúcosmological‚Äù vibe.
This also opens up a greater range of PvP dynamics impossible for traditional battlefields.

All action in this game happens in tug of war style supremacy between three well-balanced factions.
These factions are tasked with capturing enemy structures, acquiring units and wealth.

Players control champions and compete against others using skill, arms and magic.

Finally, players have the META goal.
Throughout gameplay, everyone contributes cumulatively to the development of their faction‚Äôs position in the world.
As factions get stronger, they acquire abilities to explore and to settle new planets. The goal is to conquer all of them.

name: Magical Otoge Iris
summary: Iris works as a Purifier, a person who helps spirits move onto the afterlife. This is a story that hopefully has comedy, romance, and heart. At the very least, it will have a lot of puns and glasses jokes.

name: Mad Digger
summary:
The treasure lies at a depth of more than 100 yards. That's a job for the Mad Digger!

Your task is to dig deeper and deeper until you find the treasure. It's not as simple as it seems. The oxygen runs out with every descent, you need to extract minerals to improve your equipment and tools as well as to buy grenades and dynamite to make the descent faster.

name: Master of Alchemy
summary:
Master of Alchemy is an original and engaging puzzle game based on the manipulation and combination of solid, liquid and gaseous elements. A real physics engine grants the elements a credible behavior, as they stream through the Alchemist‚Äôs mysterious instruments and machines. Thanks to these tools, you will blend, fuse, sublimate, condense or break up elements. You'll discover more and more instruments as you delve deeper into the game -and there are lots of puzzles to be solved. Will you be able to attain the utter domination over matter itself?

Master of Alchemy ‚Äì Rise of the Mechanologists will make you part of the war between two powerful factions ‚Äìthe alchemists and the mechanologists, who are tech-oriented, ruthless scientists. At the beginning of the story, you‚Äôll choose your character among a group of six, following their evolution as the game unfolds.

Master of Alchemy - Rise of the Mechanologists is the PC/ Mac version of the acclaimed iPad/iPhone game, developed by Darkwave Games and published by Forge Reply. Enjoy this fully reworked, rebranded experience and test your wits against the ancient art of alchemy!

name: Makis Adventure
summary: Makis Adventure is an Action- Platformer with shark demons. Fight, dash, swim and bite your way through 3 different dungeons. Let the inner shark out! Face many different opponents and defeat powerful bosses.

name: Mayjasmine Episode 01: What is God?
summary:
Ho Yu-Chen received his friend Wan Zi-Jin's invitation, and set on to leave the familiar Taiwan to start a new life with Wan's daughter, Wan Yu-Qing, as an accountant, in Indonesia. Yet with the addition of the mysterious girl, Cocoa, what kinds of events shall turn out to be?

MayJasmine takes place during Indonesia's 1998 riot, where the riots were triggered by economic problems, leading to violence towards ethnic Chinese, resulting in a lot of deaths, both Indonesian and Chinese. These riots led to the resignation of the second president Suharto and the independence of East Timor.

name: Massive Defense
summary: A Science-Fantasy tower defense game. Challenging bosses are waiting for you. If you lose a tower you also lose ring and place for a tower. Strategize your way to victory with the ultimate tower and placement composition.

name: Maytroid
summary: Maytroid is an action platformer with Metroidvania-like map system and ecchi gallery.

name: Mage Outbreak
summary: Solve puzzles, overcome challenges, and uncover ancient secrets in a pixel art adventure through the mysterious Tower of the Ancients.

name: Marisa no Kagi +Plus!
summary: A doujin game by -NRF- based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Major League Baseball
summary: The second baseball game from Nelsonic, licensed by MLB.

name: Marvel Rivals: Season 5 - Love is a Battlefield
summary: Before the Timestream Entanglement tore their world apart, Gambit and Rogue were ready to say "I do" on Krakoa. But destiny intervened. Now, Gambit sets out on a daring cosmic heist to steal the universe's rarest ring - and win back the moment time itself stole from them.

name: Mage Blast
summary: Forge arcane might in this semi-idle deckbuilder! Craft spells layer by layer‚Äîturn a simple fireball into a barrage of flaming meteors. Build a deck of modifiers to trigger explosive combos, explore ancient realms for rare resources, and stitch together magic unlike anything the world has seen.

name: Magic Garden
summary: Magic Garden is a cozy gardening game where players can design their garden, collect rare pets, and play with friends in the same room. The game spans several genres, including idle games, simulation/resource management, and has lightweight MMO aspects including chat, a worldwide weather and shopkeeping system, and decoration outfits.

name: Math Blaster: Episode Two - Secret of the Lost City
summary:
Math Blaster Episode II: Secret of the Lost City is an educational game for learning math in 4th grade.

Re-released in 1997 as Math Blaster: Ages 9‚Äì12 and 1999 as Math Blaster for 4th Grade respectively.

name: Mario Party 3
summary: Mario Party 3 is the third and final Mario Party title for the Nintendo 64. A total of eight characters are available to choose from: Mario, Luigi, Princess Peach, Yoshi, Wario, Donkey Kong, and newcomers Waluigi and Princess Daisy. Mario Party 3 features duel maps, in which two players try to lower each other's stamina to zero using non-playable characters such as Chain Chomps. It is the first Mario Party game to feature Luigi's main voice and also it is last Mario game where Princess Daisy appears in a yellow and white dress, and with long hair, as well as the last Mario game (until New Super Mario Bros. Wii) in which Yoshi's "record-scratching" voice is used. It is also the first Mario Party game to have multiple save slots.

name: Maple and Aluna
summary: Fight together as Maple and Aluna in this action-adventure roguelike. Slaughter foes, capture altars, and augment yourself with powerful mystics to survive the eternal winter.

name: Master of Monsters
summary:
The Genesis/Mega Drive port of "Master of Monsters".

Master of Monsters is a turn-based strategy game developed by SystemSoft for the MSX and NEC PC8801. It was ported to a variety of consoles and PCs including the PC Engine CD, NEC PC9801, and Sega Genesis/Mega Drive. While it never had the same success as its SystemSoft stablemate Daisenryaku, the game garnered a loyal following. Its success in the North American market on the Sega Genesis proved sufficient for a sequel on the Sega Saturn, and an anime art-style enhanced Sony PlayStation version.

A European release for Mega Drive was planned by Ubisoft but it did not materialise.

name: Manos: The Hands of Fate
summary: Retro platforming action in this adaptation of a terrible movie.

name: Maid of the Dead
summary:
Zombies left, right and center!!
Will the maids be able to bring peace back to Akiba?!

name: Mars Attracts
summary: Mars Attracts is a park management sim set in the iconic universe of Mars Attacks. Build rides, hire staff, manage guest needs, and abduct humans to serve as the star attractions. You'll face demanding visitors, environmental hazards, and the ever-looming threat of human escapes!

name: Magical Backpack
summary: Lara found a magical backpack that allows her to fly and collect Light stars in an enchanted kingdoms. Help her overcome challenges, capture stars, and advance through the levels in this adventure!

name: Marvel vs. Capcom: Clash of Super Heroes
summary: Marvel vs. Capcom: Clash of Super Heroes is the fifth Marvel Comics-licensed fighting game by Capcom and the third game in the Marvel vs. Capcom series. In contrast to X-Men vs. Street Fighter and Marvel Super Heroes vs. Street Fighter, the game features characters from numerous Capcom franchises such as Mega Man and Strider, rather than just Street Fighter characters. The game takes place within the Marvel comic continuity, as Professor Charles Xavier calls out for heroes to stop him before he merges with the consciousness of Magneto and becomes the being known as Onslaught, the final boss.

name: Marry Me - Perfect Wedding Day
summary:
She said "YES!" Coco‚Äôs big day is coming up and she can‚Äôt wait to celebrate with you! 
But first - Coco needs your professional styling help to get ready for her dream wedding! 
Dance the night away with Coco, the groom and her friends! Show off your best moves before a panel of professional judges and see who wins the wedding dancing contest! 
 
Express your unique sense of style with this magnificent, 3D wedding app! Personalize Coco the bride and choose from over 200 of the most stunning wedding outfits and accessories! You can even choose Coco's hair color, hair style and skin tone! Head to the spa, apply professional makeup, and show off your new wedding look! (Just don‚Äôt cry too much, your makeup will come off!)

name: Mariole
summary: MARIOLE is a narrative management game inspired by the traditional culture of the south of France. Take on the role of a young travelling merchant named Mariole, as she journeys through medieval/post-collapse landscapes in search of her friend, a missing ‚ÄòTrobairitz‚Äô (a troubadour woman).

name: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
summary: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa is a video game based on the film of the same name. It was released on the Xbox 360, PlayStation 3, Wii, PlayStation 2, Microsoft Windows, and Nintendo DS in November 4, 2008 in North America. The video game's gameplay is similar to the first movie's video game with the same characters and moves, although the environment is in Africa. The Nintendo Channel released a playable demo of this game on the week of November 7, which shows one of the side-scrolling, Lemmings-esque levels in which the penguins of the series are the main characters. It was supposed to be released on PSP but it was cancelled.

name: Master of Monsters
summary:
Port of "Master of Monsters" for the TurboGrafx-16/PC Engine.

Master of Monsters is a turn-based strategy game in which you choose one of five different wizards and fight the other wizards for domination of the land that stands without a ruler after the master wizard's death. You can play in two campaigns against the computer which requires you to defeat the enemy wizards on all maps and allows you to take all units that have survived a battle into the next one. You can also play all maps individually with up two four human players. In battles, you can summon different monsters and cast spells. Which monsters you can summon and which spells you can use depends on which wizard you have chosen.

name: Marvelous: Mouhitotsu no Takarajima
summary:
The great Captain Maverick was a pirate of legend who kept his treasure called "Marvelous" hidden that could only be found by those who were willing to solve puzzles that many deemed unsolvable. A group of children, however, will use their wits to prove them wrong when they go to the island where the treasure is said to be held. A group of pirates, however, have similar intentions.

The game was referred as a spirit in Super Smash Bros. Ultimate, with the official romanization of "Marvelous: Mouhitotsu no Takarajima".

name: Max Traffic
summary:
Max Traffic is a minimalistic traffic simulator where the player controls the flow of cars by managing the traffic lights. It is a mini casual game to relax to, but also excel at, by trying to achieve the highest score.

Each level represents a flag, while the cars hold a minimalistic style. The sounds follow the same pattern by being abstract in their manner.

name: Mario Goes Skateboarding 64
summary:
Take Mario skateboarding and explore levels based on real-life skateparks!

- 5 Levels inspired by real-life skate spots
- 14 Stars with unique skate-related missions!
- Street Art based on real-life Graffiti!
- Meet a cast of charming characters from other corners of the Mario Universe!
- Learn more about skateboarding, and its scene in Bogota, Colombia!

name: Marauders
summary: Become a space pirate and work solo, or in a squad of up to 3 other players to navigate a hostile battleground, survive intense combat encounters with other teams and AI opponents for invaluable loot, craft new weapons and gear, and salvage what you‚Äôll need to survive.

name: Master of Monsters
summary:
PC-98 port of "Masters of Monsters".

Master of Monsters is a turn-based strategy game in which you choose one of five different wizards and fight the other wizards for domination of the land that stands without a ruler after the master wizard's death. You can play in two campaigns against the computer which requires you to defeat the enemy wizards on all maps and allows you to take all units that have survived a battle into the next one. You can also play all maps individually with up two four human players. In battles, you can summon different monsters and cast spells. Which monsters you can summon and which spells you can use depends on which wizard you have chosen.

name: Master of Monsters
summary:
MSX2 port of "Master of Monsters".

Master of Monsters is a turn-based strategy game in which you choose one of five different wizards and fight the other wizards for domination of the land that stands without a ruler after the master wizard's death. You can play in two campaigns against the computer which requires you to defeat the enemy wizards on all maps and allows you to take all units that have survived a battle into the next one. You can also play all maps individually with up two four human players. In battles, you can summon different monsters and cast spells. Which monsters you can summon and which spells you can use depends on which wizard you have chosen.

name: Marvel: Ultimate Alliance - Special Edition
summary: Marvel: Ultimate Alliance is an action role-playing video game developed for PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3, Xbox and Xbox 360 by Raven Software and published by Activision.

name: Madcus Show
summary: Discover the mystery behind Marcus Circus, the world's first circus with infinite energy generated by a mysterious crystal. You will have to try to survive by hiding, exploring, and solving puzzles.

name: Manor Madness
summary: In Manor Madness you take on the role of the ghost Ghustav and unleash mayhem. Ghustav has been accepted to the most prestigious school of Polter High where they will study how to possess objects and fling them across the room. Of course, traditional haunting can't be missed. Turn on any electrical appliances, flick the light switch, or play a spooky tune.

name: Mario Combat
summary: Your Super Mario! What does that mean? It means you gotta go kick Bowsers ass! And thats exactly what your going to do!

name: Malavision: The Origin
summary: A politician runs away upon sued corruption acts against him were proved. He gets in a private property located in the Paraguayan Chaco. As his assistant disappears, he decides to go into his quest. What is awaiting him to live has existed only in the imagination, myth and superstition. He must overcome any kind of obstacles as a way to survive in a hostile environment, disturbed in time and space.

name: Maze: Path of Light - Oasis Constellations
summary:
With this DLC, you'll unlock 5 new constellations:
Peacock Constellation: 6 mazes
Horse Constellation: 8 mazes
Gazelle Constellation: 6 mazes
Water Constellation: 7 mazes
Octopus Constellation: 8 mazes

name: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy: Cloud Version
summary: Fire up a wild ride across the cosmos with a fresh take on Marvel‚Äôs Guardians of the Galaxy. In this action-adventure game, you are Star-Lord leading the unpredictable Guardians from one explosion of chaos to the next. You got this. Probably.

name: Magnetic By Nature
summary: Magnetic By Nature explores platforming without platforms. Experience a fast-paced, single-player adventure mixing fluid motion, split-second decision making, stylized machine-age visuals, and a dynamic soundscape. As the last remaining robot, journey through the forgotten ruins to reactivate your friends. Successfully funded on Kickstarter and winner of both the Best Developed Game and Audience Choice awards at the 2013 Utah Game Wars competition, MBN is the debut title from Team Tripleslash.

name: Marshmallow Marvin: Grimvault
summary: Embark on a perilous adventure in Marshmallow Marvin: GrimVault, where haunted tombs, deadly traps, and ancient secrets await. Test your wits and agility and uncover the dark mysteries of the cursed vault!

name: Math Blaster Jr.
summary: The game sees the Blaster Pal characters head to the Plusto galaxy in outer space to solve math problems. By solving addition and subtraction problems, they earn printable certificates. The game contains several activities, puzzles, and songs. The game is intended to encourage "math readiness"

name: Madou Monogatari A: Doki-doki Vacation
summary: Madou Monogatari A: Doki-doki Vacation is a Sega Game Gear RPG released as part of Compile's Madou Monogatari series.

name: Magic Research
summary: Magic Research is a text-based incremental game about Magic. You are the headmaster of a newly-created institution of Magic. Will you be able to lead your school to win the prestigious Tournament of Magic?

name: May I Open My Eyes to the Night!?
summary: This app will bring a unique and fun twist to choose your own adventure stories. You‚Äôll love making choices in this interactive story game!

name: Magic Venue
summary: Defeat waves of enemies drawn to your powers! Grow stronger and travel between worlds and dimensions! Magic Venue is an action roguelike game where you battle enemies, build your skill deck, devise strategies, get defeated, but always come back stronger!

name: Maybe I Can
summary: Welcome, we're putting you in the brain of Tyler Lee who wants to destroy the world. But it won't be easy. Tyler is going to get in a lot of trouble. Let's see if you can get Tyler Lee to achieve his goal.

name: Maze of Memories
summary: A mildly challenging maze puzzle game. Discover some of the most memorable landmarks around the world by finding a path from the start to the finish spot.

name: Mambo Wave
summary: Mambo Wave ‚Äî a 2D Platform Shooter which takes place somewhere in Spain in the 90's. Your mission is simple: to advance behind enemy lines, destroying them all with the help of a cool and varied arsenal.

name: Madrid Noir
summary: Madrid Noir is a 45 minute mystery adventure that unfolds across two acts in this VR film. With her uncle declared dead, a disenchanted young woman must delve into her memories to pick up his shadowy trail. Solving the puzzles of the past ain't gonna be easy!

name: Mau Squared
summary: Mau¬≤ is a deck builder Roguelite based on classic games such as Mau-Mau and Uno. Get as many points as possible to guarantee your victory even if you don't clear your hand, and upgrade your deck to make sure you always stay on top.

name: Master of War: Rule of Power
summary: Dynamic turn-based strategy game inspired by the hyper hardcore genre, where the player as a chief man of his tribe, will lead it to the glory, watch out for food and lurking predators!

name: Maria the Witch
summary:
Zaki&Mia stole all the mails and spread them all over the worlds !
Help Maria to bring them back to their owners !

name: Magical Drop
summary:
The Game Boy Color Magical Drop is heavily based on Magical Drop III.

One notable omission from previous Magical Drop titles is the lack of a Story mode. This leaves the standard Endless mode as the only single-player mode.

It is the only Magical Drop game that has never been released in Japan.

name: Matadouro: Grindhouse
summary: A rogue detective infiltrates a cult compound to save a kidnapped woman and discovers a dark labyrinth of inhumane experiments and manmade flesh monsters. A tense and unnerving first-person survival horror game, with limited resources, exploration, and puzzle-solving.

name: Marbies Party
summary: Marbies Party is a chaotic local party game playable up to 4, in which you play as silly little rounded characters running around mazes. Get in your opponents' way as you play a variety of game modes all the way to victory!

name: Mario Party-e: Duel Challenge - Waluigi's Reign
Machina of the Planet Tree -Planet Ruler-
summary: Machina of the Planet Tree -Planet Ruler- is the first in a series of several games by the group Denneko Yuugi. The game is a combo-based RPG that focuses on action and flashy attacks.

name: ManaCollect 2
summary: Use the numbers as a clue to collect Mana! ManaCollect 2 is an online enabled, real-time competitive minesweeper!

name: Magic: The Gathering - Duels of the Planeswalkers 2015: Garruk's Revenge
Magic Soldier
summary:
Embark on an epic journey in Magic Soldier, a 2D open-world MMORPG.
Explore vast landscapes, fight powerful foes, craft unique items, and team up with players worldwide. Adventure awaits, shape your destiny today !

name: Maktala: Slime Lootfest
summary: An incremental adventure where every battle unlocks new ways to slay hordes of monsters, collect powerful loot, master skills, and uncover tons of content.

name: Madou Monogatari
summary:
Madou Monogatari is a first-person dungeon-crawler developed by AIKY that released on December 14, 2005 for DoCoMo's i-mode branded mobile phones and was available through G-mode's R.P.G-mode service, which required a monthly fee of 300 yen to access various RPG games. It is the last Madou Monogatari entry to feature the original cast of characters created by Compile. The game was only available to download for six months before being delisted sometime in June 2006, and as of November 30, 2021, the game can no longer be launched due to G-mode's service through i-mode being discontinued.

Unlike Madou Monogatari (Saturn), Madou Monogatari returns to the classic first-person dungeon crawling style. A new spell, Stone, is introduced that attacks enemies with falling stones, and after clearing the game you'll be presented with a report card that changes depending on the amount of steps Arle takes, the amount of damage done to enemies, and the number of times that curry is eaten.

name: Mayhem Intergalactic
summary: Wage war on your friends and enemies in this simple and engaging strategy game. Easy to learn and quick to play, Mayhem Intergalactic is  surprisingly strategic. Play against the computer, or duke it out with friends over the internet. The universe shall be yours.

name: Mahjong Journey: Quest for Tikal
summary:
Nine adventurous game modes, including Classic and Adventure.
Play one of the most popular casual game genres, now on the most popular casual game platform.
More than 300 puzzle layouts to solve.
Five tile sets to unlock.
Three difficulty levels.

name: Mario Party: The Top 100
summary: The "best" of Mario Party arrives on 3DS.

name: Max's Big Bust 2 - Max's Bigger Bust
summary: Max is back! After Max's partner Brad is transformed in a car bomb explosion and Max is turned into an even bustier babe, Max must team up with a bunch of new and returning weirdos in order to save Axon City from a terrifyingly sexy threat. It's not going to be easy though, Max is going to have to cope with issues like her succubus sister Heather moving back in and refusing to leave despite clearly breaking the terms of Max's lease by holding orgies in the living room. Or the coven of mysterious witches that live in a compound on the outskirts of the city that claim they are definitely not a cult, and Max is turned into a dog at one point. We probably should have mentioned earlier that things are going to get weird.

name: Magic Trickery
summary: Mrs. Jones has woken up in the fantastic world of magic... Magic Trickery is a shorter-but-sweeter casual RPG for all skill levels with a cozy pixelled overworld and traditional turn-based stylized cartoon battles, with a focus on exploration, collectibles and finding secrets at your own pace.

name: Master of Magic: Rise of the Soultrapped
summary: Master of Magic: Rise of the Soultrapped is a large expansion to a 2022 4X turn-based strategy game, Master of Magic. Rise of the Soultrapped introduces a new kingdom - Techmagic - where magic merges with technology.

name: Maid for Loving You
summary: Average guy Yuuma suddenly finds his boring life becoming way more exciting when he encounters a mysterious woman named Eve. Join him as he discovers the joys of having a live-in maid in this heartwarming visual novel.

name: Mario's Game Gallery
summary: Mario's Game Gallery is a collection of board games, in which you play with Mario. He talks to you, playing Checkers, Go Fish, Dominoes, Backgammon and Yacht. The games all play similarly to their real world counterparts, featuring pieces based on the Mario universe. Mario's Game Gallery is the first game in the series to feature Charles Martinet as Mario's voice actor, who has since gone on to act as Mario's voice actor in all games that give Mario a voice since.

name: MachineGunner2: Bullet Transcending
summary: MachineGunner 2 is a 2d top-down shooter game that Player controls four characters to clear stages and complete them as fast as possible. One hit will take you to the start line of the stage. So push it at your own pace.

name: Magical Battle Arena Next
summary: Magical Battle Arena: Complete Form is a 3D air combat crossover fighting game starring Touhou characters and magical girl anime characters.

name: Main Sequence
summary: Main Sequence is a space-sim factory builder where your goal is to build an interstellar industrial empire. Collect resources, automate production, and expand your fleet of ships in order to survive and leave your mark on the galaxy.

name: Maxwell's World
summary:
Located just a few miles from Boston, Maxwell‚Äôs World was once a place of joy. The biggest amusement park in the country, Mister Maxwell dedicated his fortunes and life to making everyone‚Äôs time at Maxwell‚Äôs World as happy as possible. Then the bombs fell and it all went to shit.

Now, the park lies open, shrouded in legend and danger. A thousand myths say that Maxwell hid a treasure, deep inside the control center of the park, just waiting to be reclaimed by some wasteland.

Unfortunately, a thousand more myths say that something happened to Maxwell‚Äôs World. They tell tales of shambling skeletons in the park that attack anything in sight, robots that find you and force-feed you hot dogs, of the rides coming to life and devouring those inside. There are some that say that Maxwell traded his soul to keep the park running, and not even the apocalypse stopped that.

All anyone knows, is that whoever enters Maxwell‚Äôs World, never leaves. Because the park isn‚Äôt just open. It‚Äôs alive.

name: Ma-suru Joshou
summary: This is a story-driven RPG that combines turn-based combat with simple mathematical puzzles and a visual novel-style story progression. Beginning with this prologue, it is being developed as a series.

name: Marshmallow Marvin: Templestone
summary: In Marshmallow Marvin: Templestone, players guide a living marshmallow through a trap-filled temple, solving puzzles and avoiding dangers in a thrilling platforming adventure.

name: Mario Kart Tour: Piranha Plant Tour
Malicious Rebirth
summary: Battle boss after boss in this PS Vita port of the downloadable PS3 game Malicious.

name: Mass Effect: Bring Down the Sky
summary: Bring Down the Sky is the first DLC for Mass Effect. The DLC takes place in the Asgard system, where an asteroid has been hijacked and sent on a collision course with the human colony of Terra Nova.

name: Magic and Machines
summary: A retro fantasy RPG with turn-based battles, puzzles, and six unique characters. It's perfect for players who grew up with turn-based RPGs and are looking for a new adventure, and also accessible for new players as it doesn't take itself too seriously.

name: Madball
summary: A game of controlling a constantly rolling ball through a series of unpredictable and exciting obstacles.

name: Maze: Path of Light - Wild Constellations
summary:
With this DLC, you'll unlock 5 new constellations:
- Otter Constellation: 6 mazes
- Beatle Constellation: 8 mazes
- Frog Constellation: 6 mazes
- Meadow Flower Constellation: 7 mazes
- Ram Constellation: 9 mazes

name: Magic: The Gathering - Duels of the Planeswalkers 2013: Deck Pack 3
Mascot Mayhem
summary: Mascot Mayhem is a 4-player local multiplayer brawling game with zany fighters and ultra powerful Mayhem attacks. Fill the screen with Mayhem and have a party! Easy to learn with simple controls, meaning anyone can join in on the fun.

name: Maumau and the Labyrinth
summary: Maumau, an adventurer, found a huge treasure chest in an ancient ruin. However, she was taken into the other dimension by the girl who appeared from the treasure chest. Maumau's unique adventure to survive begins.

name: Make Your Move
summary: Make your Move is a roguelike game where you control the map like a rubik's cube. Create combinations to improve your stats, discover new cubes, get equipment, and battle for resources to protect your world from the void.

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: Mirroring 2
summary: There are reflections in water, glass, and metal. The most beautiful 36 reflections have been collected in the "Mirroring 2" package, allowing you to admire them while enjoying the puzzle-solving experience.

name: Mashup Bros. Super Marionette Brawl
summary:
Get ready for the ultimate online brawl in "Mashup Bros."!
Use weapons and jumps to defeat rivals and snatch their coins! Various characters, diverse weapons, and items. Join unpredictable real-time online battles!

name: Madden NFL 26
summary: Dominate the league in EA SPORTS Madden NFL 26.

name: Madou Monogatari I: Honoo no Sotsuenji
summary:
Sorcery Kindergarten has very strict requirements for graduation. Indeed, this year, only one person even qualified to take the final exam at all: six-year-old Arle Nadja, who now faces the daunting task of climbing the monster-infested Magic Tower and retrieving the three Magic Orbs hidden within in order to graduate. What trials await Arle inside the Tower? Can she pass the test, or will she be doomed to another year of kindergarten?

Madou Monogatari I: Honoo no Sotsuenji (Sorcery Saga I: The Fiery Kindergarten Graduation) is a 1996 dungeon crawler for the PC-Engine Super CD-ROM¬≤ system. It's a remake of the first game in the Madou Monogatari series, originally developed by Compile for the MSX2 computer and subsequently ported to several other platforms. The various ports differ wildly from each other, sometimes to the point of being almost completely different games; though the PC-Engine version is based on the original home computer editions, it adds high-quality cutscenes, CD audio, near-full voice acting, and many extra events, monsters, and items.

name: Maroxyn Drarea
summary: Wield limited spells in a dead, dreamlike realm. Explore vast ruins, echoing caves, and hostile terrain. Every death resets your place in the world. No combat - just survival, exploration, and the creeping sense you're being watched.

name: Magical Girls Second Magic
summary: " Magical Girls Second Magic" features cute girl characters ranging from magical girls to girls with furry cat ears.This is a unique block-busting game in which you destroy all the blocks placed on the stage to evolve the illustrations of cute girl characters.

name: Maze Mice
summary: Maze Mice is a bullet heaven roguelite where time only moves when you move. Collect dots, level up, choose upgrades, and avoid cats. All at your own pace.

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: The Bold Accent
summary: The Bold Accent puzzle collection features 39 expressive images where shades of gray form a serene backdrop, allowing a bold and vibrant hue to take center stage.

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: Flowers of Life
summary: 42 magnificent puzzles demonstrate a harmonious combination of the most pleasant elements of life. "Flowers of Life" refers to all the most beautiful and tender things in this world‚Äîcharming women, sweet children, wonderful flowers, colorful butterflies, and funny pets.

name: ManServant: Gay Visual Novel
summary: In Ancient Rome, demons rule and mortals are slaves. Follow the ambitious slave Silvan as he schemes his way into the emperor's court to accomplish his mission of becoming a demon.

name: Manic Panic Ghosts
summary:
Manic Panic Ghosts, known as Poka Suka Ghost! It's a Boo Bash! in Japan, is an arcade game released by Sega for Sega NAOMI arcade hardware in 2007.
It can be seen as a hybrid between light-gun and "whack-a-mole" games, relying on magic hammer wands which players wave in the air (similar to Wii remotes).

It has so far received no home ports.

name: Master of Orion
summary:
Master of Orion, the award-winning and critically acclaimed strategy game, has returned. The iconic 4X strategy gameplay of Explore, Expand, Exploit and Exterminate that formed the blueprint for a whole generation has been resurrected and upgraded. Stunningly enhanced for a new line of players, Master of Orion inherits and redefines its core elements, providing a graphically beautiful and deeply rewarding experience.
Master of Orion is the birth of a new era of strategy gameplay featuring the latest multi-platform technology and graphical systems. Within the depths of vast and volatile worlds, will you take up the challenge and ‚ÄúConquer the Stars‚Äù?

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: Women's Day
summary: This collection of 30 puzzles is a tribute to the beauty of everyday moments and the resilience of women in all aspects of life.

name: Math Genius: Multiplication
summary: Math Genius: Multiplication is a fun and educational game that challenges players with randomly generated multiplication problems. Players fill in the missing number in the equation by choosing one of three possible answers. Keep track of your progress with on-screen counters displaying your correct and incorrect answers. Perfect for sharpening math skills in a quick, engaging format!

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: Haunted Lights
summary: The collection of 57 puzzles, "Ghost Lights," is the perfect choice for this Halloween, transporting the player to a world full of autumn magic.

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: Radiant Love
summary: Celebrate Love: A special collection of 33 puzzles for Valentine's Day.

name: Mario's Cement Factory
summary: The Modern version of the game has Mario working in a cookie factory. Yoshi and Toad are featured instead of the drivers, with Yoshi eating the Yoshi Cookies made on the left conveyor belt and Toad packaging the Yoshi Cookies made on the right conveyor belt. Boos also occasionally appear, taking up cookie dough slots on the second floor. Unlike in Classic Mode, however, Mario is allowed to fall down onto an elevator platform, but touching the very bottom or top still earns the player a miss. When Mario amasses 200, 500, and 700 points, a heart appears for him to remove a miss. Music is also featured in this version, with the tempo changing depending on the speed of the game.

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: Beautiful Nonsense 2
summary: Not everything has to make sense to be beautiful. Beautiful Nonsense-2, a collection of 39 unique images, invites you into a world where logic bends, reality distorts, and the unexpected takes center stage.

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: Holiday Paws
summary: Experience the magic and charm of the season through the eyes of nature's most enchanting creatures. This collection of 39 puzzles beautifully combines the warmth of the holidays with the whimsical allure of winter, creating a delightful celebration of animals in a sparkling holiday setting.

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: Harmony of Horror
summary: You will see 33 puzzles that are as captivating as they are disturbing.

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: Beautiful Nonsense 3
summary: Beautiful Nonsense 3 is a vibrant journey into surrealism. This series of 48 bold, colorful puzzles embraces the absurd, fusing dreamlike imagery with expressive brushstrokes and unexpected juxtapositions.

name: Marvel Spider-Man Unlimited
summary: Spider-Man Unlimited is an endless runner video game developed and published by Gameloft; it is based on the Marvel Comics superhero Spider-Man. The player controls the title character and his alternate versions during his fight against the members of the Sinister Six and their multiverse counterparts. The game's main mode features definitive goals in contrast to the traditional aim of running as far as possible. The game is also known for having regular, special, time-limited, community events.

name: Madden NFL 09 All-Play
summary: Celebrating 20 Years of Innovation and counting, Madden NFL 09 All-Play delivers its most complete NFL football package ever. Whether you‚Äôre a seasoned veteran or picking up the game for the first time, players of all skill levels will enjoy a unique, yet challenging experience with the innovative Adaptive Difficulty Engine, which tailors the game to match your playing style. Instantly improve your game with the all-new virtual Training Center or incorporate feedback with EA SPORTS BackTrack, allowing you to learn from your mistakes on the fly. With a new broadcast presentation and online leagues, plus more than 85 new features and enhancements, Madden NFL 09 is the most authentic and adaptable game in sports video game history.

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: Into the Future
summary: The Into the Future collection is a series of 39 images showcasing futuristic landscapes, alien worlds, and thrilling technological wonders.

name: MahjongPuzzle 8
summary: Challenge your intellect! A simple yet deep puzzle game with beautiful Mahjong tiles. Conquer the Dragon's Path, which offers a variety of stages to challenge.

name: Magic Theatre
summary:
Magic Theatre is the award-winning software that brought the art of storytelling to the computer era by allowing kids as young as three to make their own movies. Simple to use, with Magic Theatre you can effortlessly blend animations, music, and your own narration and drawings to create short films ‚Äì the only limit is your imagination.

Developed with educators, artists, and most importantly ‚Äì children ‚Äì Magic Theatre provides not only endless entertainment, but also develops artistic, speech, and extemporization skills. All of these form the foundations for the communication skills essential in every part of life.
---------------------------------
Features
Click and drag animation lets you make movies quickly and easily.
Extensive libraries featuring hundreds of animations, scenery, objects, paint effects, traces, sound effects, and music.
Equally suited for boys and girls.
Verbal help and icon-based user interface enables even pre-readers to use Magic Theatre easily.
Automatic coordination of sound and graphics renders the movies effortlessly synchronized.
Movies are automatically saved and named, meaning no keyboard use or computer administration is required.
Multiple scene feature permits movies to be of any length and complexity.
Broadcast in places like YouTube using a free screen recorder.
------------------------------
Educational Benefits >>
Develops verbal communication and speech skills.
Builds critical thinking, planning and organization.
Stimulates imagination, and encourages storytelling and creativity.
Enhances artistic skills and hand-eye coordination.
Lets you entertain the world!
More on educational benefits here >>

name: Magical Taluluto-kun: Fantastic World!!
summary: Fifth grader Edojou Honmaru is one of the most trodden-upon losers in his class, until he meets Magical Taluluto-kun. Taluluto's powers help him deal with all his hardships, such as girls, bullies, and numerous other challenges.

name: Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree - Collector's Edition
summary:
Collectors' Edition includes:
An exclusive Art Book showcasing never-before-seen illustrations
A CD Soundtrack featuring the haunting Original Soundtrack (OST) composed by Christos Antoniou (from the Greek metal band Septicflesh) and primarily performed by the FILMharmonic Orchestra of Prague!
A double-sided poster
The physical game
A collectible tuck-in box housing all the contents

name: Mangadle
summary:
Mangadle is a Wordle-inspired daily guessing game for anime and manga fans. Each day features a new challenge where you identify a character using multi-attribute hints like gender, affiliation, abilities, ranks, and more‚Äîrefining your guess in up to six tries with intuitive color feedback.

The game covers popular series such as One Piece, Naruto, Dragon Ball, Jujutsu Kaisen, and Attack on Titan, with multiple modes ranging from quick to hard to endless practice. Built with modern web tech for fast loading and a smooth mobile experience, Mangadle also supports social sharing to keep your streaks and friendly competition going. Character info is referenced from public sources, with attention to copyright and data hygiene. Whether you‚Äôre here to relax or to sharpen your series knowledge, Mangadle makes it engaging and replayable.

name: Martial Law
summary: Martial Law is a game about difficulties that came with Communism in Poland. The story is shown from the perspective of a man who is abandoned because of his low social status. He tries his best to be there for his daughter despite the difficulties.

name: Max: The Curse of Brotherhood
summary:
In its core Max: The Curse of Brotherhood is a physics-based puzzle/platformer and set in a 2.5D environment with a free and cinematic camera. The game has 7 chapters and 20 levels in total All levels are connected so the game feels like one long journey. Besides platforming, the gameplay twist is the magic marker which introduces a creative and open approach to how puzzles can be solved. Throughout the game the magic marker will gain different powers.

The five powers are
1. Earth pillars. You can create pillars from the earth to reach higher grounds.
2. Tree branches - You can grow trees to use them as platforms, springboards, rafts and moveable objects. Branches also catch fire.
3. Vines which work like ropes. You can crawl and swing in vines, but vines can also be used to tie objects together.
4. Water streams can be shaped freely and will move objects as well as Max along their path.
5. You must destroy obstacles and defeat Mustacho‚Äôs minions.

Each of the five powers are introduced in settings similar to the power themselves. The magic marker is triggered by pressing and holding RT and controlled by the right analog stick of the Xbox One controller and while controlling the magic marker Max cannot move at all.

name: Mask Fighting:Otherworldly Awakening
summary: In this immersive 3D fighting game, embody Jack ‚Äì a timid youth thrust into a realm where masked power reigns supreme. Master fluid combos and leverage environmental tactics to defeat foes, seize their masks, and gain new abilities. But true power lies not in masks... but in the awakening within.

name: Manipulated
summary: Manipulated is a logic platformer with a lot of puzzles and plot twists. Put your thinking cap on and use your imagination to go through a series of the most difficult puzzles in an experiment that will defy your common sense. But be careful - you will also have to face the evil robots that will be on your way. Go through the experiment and find a way out of the laboratory. But remember - the game manipulated everyone who tried to get to complete it. Will you be able to avoid it?

name: March of the Eagles
summary: The strategy wargame March of the Eagles is dedicated to the era 1805-1820 focused on the dramatic conflicts of Europe. March of the Eagles explores one of the defining periods in European history in an experience crafted by Paradox Development Studio, the masters of Grand Strategy and makers of Hearts of Iron and Europa Universalis. The Napoleonic War is brought to life in this war-focused strategy game.

name: Masters Pool HD
summary: Pure 8-ball billiards in stunning 3D.

name: Marshmallow Marvin
summary: Marshmallow Marvin is a 2D platformer where you must reach the end of the level.

name: Maze and Fairy tale
summary: This is a 2D style, survival and tower defense built ARPG game. Combine dungeon and tower defense construction, become a trap master, and punch unexpected Combo. The more days you survive, you will have the opportunity to travel through a complete fairy tale world.

name: Maestro: Duel of the Fates
summary: Step into a gorgeous opera house with Maestro, the VR orchestra conducting rhythm game that's the essence of elegance, control, and high-society french sophistication with a classic Star Wars twist. This new DLC is fitted with the iconic Duel of the Fates from Star Wars Episode 1 and will be launching on June 20 for PlayStation VR2 (PS VR2), Meta Quest, and SteamVR.

name: Mario Kart Black
summary:
Mario Kart Black is a modification of Mario Kart Wii that consists of a change of textures and music.

The game is a texture hack distribution created by Roobitz. It is the successor to Kustom Mario Kart Wii. Unlike its predecessor, this only contains texture hacks ‚Äì some of which the author made

name: Magical Pool
summary: M√≥ B√†ng Zhu√†ngqi√∫ is a cuesport simulator for the Super A'can.

name: Mahjong Solitaire
summary:
The classic tile matching game. Match the tile pairs until the board been cleared.

You've spent hours playing it on your PC and phone, and now play it again on your classic retro console.

name: Maralinga
summary: Maralinga is a survival horror adventure set in the Australian outback. Scavenge supplies, wield traditional and modern weapons, and outwit mutated wildlife while exploring the ruins of a forgotten test site. Survive the present and uncover the past.

name: Martha's Dolls
summary: Dive into the adventures in " Merphy Town " where Martha's Dolls lives, solve the mystery, prepare yourself for a great horror experience !

name: Mazinger Z
summary: Mazinger Z is an Action game, developed by Eleven (Japan) and published by Banpresto, which was released in Japan in 1994.This is shooting game in which you will be able to pick your character between Mazinger Z, Great Mazinger and Grandizer, each of them with their own strengths and weaknesses... yep, appears that although the name of the game only has one of those robots, you can control one from the 3 of them, or 2 if you will be playing in the usual 2-player game, which requires a friend of yours to spend his own coins.

name: Mario Kart Tour: Peach vs. Bowser Tour
Malachite: Temple of the Sun - Collector's Edition
summary: Embark on a journey through the depths of a lost ancient jungle temple.

name: Maggotmania
summary: Maggotmania is a single screen shooter inspired by the arcade game Centipede where you control a blue creature at the bottom of the screen trying to destroy a large maggot that appears at the top of the screen over various levels. You can move left or right, and forwards a short distance as well as move backwards and you keep firing upwards when you fire your weapon. The maggot moves across the screen and when it hits a flower or the edge of the screen then it moves down one place and moves the opposite way. When you hit the maggot, it splits into two parts and keeps moving downwards towards you leaving behind a flower.
