name: Manic the Lad: Rage Against the Maniac
summary: Here is the video game ‚ÄúManic the Lad: Rage Against the Maniac‚Äù! Released in 2003 on Windows, it's still available and playable with some tinkering. It's an action game, set in an arcade, platform and fan made themes.

name: Madden NFL 13
summary: Nintendo Wii port of Madden NFL 13.

name: Magnetic Bonds
summary: Magnetic Bonds is a fusion of the visual novel and turn-based RPG genres inspired by shonen manga where players explore a vast galaxy, befriending characters and building relationships as they progress through the story and take down enemies and bosses.

name: Mario 7-in-1
summary: Mario 7-in-1 is an unlicensed multicart game for Famicom, best known for it's inclusion of 7 Grand Dad.

name: Machine With a Big Gun
summary:
Machine With a Big Gun - these are long freeways and hundreds of explosions. You have a difficult road ahead, in which your car and a huge cannon will help you, which shoots long bursts and missiles.
The world has changed, it is ruled by people, greedy for power, who believe only in brute force. In their way, it's only you! Get to the leaders of local groups and overcome them in a hard fight.

name: Maid Slaves & Golden Dungeon
summary: A dungeon exploration RPG. Living a pure love life with a captured general. Go to the dungeon to earn money with the former general who now is my maid!

name: Maze Twister
summary: Rotate the maze to make the ball reach the destination.

name: Maze Breaker V
summary: The goal of Maze Breaker is to hit and break all the blocks to clear a level, while avoiding obstacles, and getting the highest score possible.

name: Marty's Zapstack
summary: An iPhone game where you catch fish by using unconventional means. It's the first game from the Norwegian developer Applicus AS.

name: Matter
summary: Explore a mystic and expressive world in a dynamic first person platformer. Dive in a dreamlike and abstract world where matter evolves and lives around you according to your actions.

name: Maze Art: Black
summary: Maze Art: Black - is a minimalist game of simple mazes with relaxing music.

name: Machine Armor Zero: Mecha Unit 1
summary: Unlocks Mecha Unit 1 in Machine Armor Zero

name: Mature Comedy Visual Novel
summary: Experience a world filled with awful people - and you're one of them! You embark on a journey to get your awful catgirl girlfriend some illicit materials, intense and prolonged misery immediately ensues.

name: Magic Match: Journey to the Lands of Arcane
summary: Magic Match: Journey to the Lands of Arcane is a match 3 style puzzle game from Codeminion.

name: Madden NFL 12
summary: Nintendo Wii port of Madden NFL 12.

name: Marble Pop Paradise
summary: Looking for some stress relief? Sit back, relax and explore mesmerizing scenery while solving stimulating marble pop challenges. Let your worries disappear as you travel to different calming environments and work through the levels with your favorite music playing in the background.

name: Maze Forever
summary: Maze Forever gives you the benefit of countless hours of fun while polishing your puzzle solving skills. A beautiful minimalistic design helps you focus on the gameplay while enjoying each well crafted puzzle level. Golden coins are sprinkled in random locations and you‚Äôll need to collect them to unlock special characters and maze themes. The ultimate goal is to access the worldwide leaderboards and show off to the world how good your puzzle solving skills are. Think you are smart enough to do it? There‚Äôs only one way to find out, install Maze Forever!

name: MAD: Mutually Assured Destruction
summary: Enemy missiles are attacking your base! Shoot them down and see how long you can last against the onslaught.

name: Machine Armor Zero
summary: Isometric Mech Action RPG Survival game. Customize your mech. Unlock new parts. Create endless builds with the unique RPG stat system. And much more!

name: Mario/Rabbids Crossover Adventure Game
summary: In 2010, Ubisoft Paris had explored proposing a crossover between the Mario franchise and its own Rabbids franchise. The game was conceptualized as a "subversive, self-aware take" on the Mario franchise and concept art was produced depicting Rabbids kidnapping Bowser as Mario chased them. According to an anonymous Ubisoft employee, the pitch was possibly rejected by Nintendo before it was formally shown. According to Ubisoft employee Davide Soliani, this attempt is unrelated to Mario + Rabbids Kingdom Battle.

name: Mad Aliens: Seeking the Soul
summary: A wacky and humorous 2D platform game that takes you on an intergalactic adventure! Inspired by classic 80's cartoons, this game is sure to delight players of all ages with its charming visuals and original soundtrack.

name: Matter
summary: Matter is a cancelled video game for the Xbox 360. It would have used the Kinect peripheral. It was originally announced at E3 2012; the game was set in a universe similar to that of Tron, with futuristic, industrial graphics, and featured small, metallic balls as the main characters.

name: Maximum Roadkill
summary: A sc-fi racing game similar to Road Rash, Where you race on pre-rendered FMV backgrounds.

name: Mage's Arena
summary:
In Mage's Arena, play as a lone mage who has 3 combat spells: Ice Wave (single target damage), Blizzard (AOE damage), Freeze (AOE freeze).
You are trapped inside an arena, with enemies swarming you. See how long you can survive and kill as many as possible, and maybe you can find the hidden secrets of the Arena!

name: Match Match Mania!
summary: Compete head to head in this exciting FPS Match-3 MOBA!

name: Magnace: Arena
summary: Magnace: Arena is a sci-fi arena shooter where you fight the bots as heroes from the Magnace universe with their own weapons, characteristics and abilities!

name: Magic Kingdom War DLC-1
summary: Thomson Skill: Cool Down Deals 1.75 times the damage to all enemies and reduces the rage of all enemies by 5.

name: MADFPS 2
summary:
MADFPS 2 is an action first person shooter and sequel to it's previous instalment "MADFPSS"
In this game you play as Mike, a detective from a local police department who, one late evening, receives an anonymous tip about a weapon trafficking cartel disguised as a cleaning company, which is filled with dangerous gang members who won't hesitate to stop you in your tracks. In a bit of a ruthless act, you venture out to clean up the cleaners and murder the owner of the place.

name: MADFPSS
summary: Ever wanted to experience Madness Combat in the perspective of a character? Now you can! Introducing, MADFPSS is a First Person Action Shooter inspired and based on the Madness Combat series by Matt "Krinkels" Jolly. Developed on the Unity Engine, MADFPSS attempts to capture the adrenaline pumping action of Madness and put it into a game.

name: Mad Maze
summary: Mad Maze was a maze themed adventure game created in 1989 and only available through the Prodigy online service. It was one of the first online games to become successful enough to reach a sizable audience.

name: Madness Combat FPS: Fueled by Hot Dogs
summary:
Use W, A, S, and D to move.
Space to jump, C to crouch
PRESS SPACE AND C AT THE SAME TIME WHILE MOVING TO DIVE!!! You are invulnerable to bullets while you dive, and you'll even get a bonus for dodging bullets
Scroll to switch through weapons in your inventory, or use keys 1, 2, 3. You can hold 2 weapons max
If you're having trouble with the web page scrolling when you try to switch weapons, toggle fullscreen in the options
Press Escape or Q to pause the game and access settings
Press V to pistol whip when you have a gun equipped. I forgot to include in game instructions for it.
Press X to drop your currently held item.
Press E to open cabinets, pick up weapons, and go through unlocked doors. picking up weapons while you already have 2 replaces the currently equipped one.

name: MarionetteAI
summary:
MarionetteAI is a tactical battle game where you build an AI for your characters.  
The AI you make will be shared with all players. Players can use their AI to battle against the AI of other players.

name: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe: Booster Course Pass - Wave 2
summary: Add 8 courses to the Mario Kart 8 Deluxe game with the next wave of the Mario Kart 8 Deluxe ‚Äì Booster Course Pass DLC! The Turnip Cup and Propeller Cup add courses like Sky-High Sundae, DS Waluigi Pinball, and Tour New York Minute to the game.

name: Majigire Genkai OL-chan
summary: Control a seriously stressed out office worker who feels the limits of her daily work, and blow away her boss and work that looms over her! A rhythm game dedicated to all working people under stress!

name: Mario's Face
summary: Mario's Face was a tech demo for the Nintendo DS. It had Mario's face in it, which could be squeezed in various ways, similar to the title screen of Super Mario 64, although the touch screen was used instead. Some ideas for moving Mario's face around have been removed from the real game. A Wario face was also available. It was reworked into the title screen of Super Mario 64 DS, albeit quite differently. The top screen uses graphics similar to Super Mario Bros. in Super Mario All-Stars.

name: Market Dominion: Global Rivalry
summary: The Cold War quietly rages on around the world as tensions rise between states. During these turbulent times, you are tasked as the CEO of a new, enterprising company. Can you overcome obstacles to become a burgeoning company and dominate the market?But can you overcome obstacles when it's Global Rivalry?

name: Major Bummer Dude: Lassi Quest RON
summary: A Point And Click Adventure Game created by Visy as part of the Reality-On-The-Norm project.

name: Marble Blast Platinum
summary: Marble Blast Platinum (aka MBP) is a standalone modification of Marble Blast Gold released in 2007.

name: Mageroom
summary:
You are a mage.

A true mage, a tree wizard.

The last of your kind.

I wonder why?

You're locked in a box for a reason.

name: Matematyka Dodawanie i odejmowanie
summary: In the fairytale land, animals teach children the basics of mathematics: adding, subceding and comparing numbers. The program includes six educational games designed for several players, many rich animations and cheerful music. Animals explain the principles of mathematics and accompany children in solving tasks. This is an education combined with great fun

name: Magical Squash
summary: 'Magical Squash' is a virtual reality sports game.The players will view a fantasy squash court immediately at home or even in the office.Within10 minutes, the player will get their body exercised and enjoy a healthy and fun experience.

name: Master of Orion: Elerian Fiefdoms
summary: An iconic race from Master of Orion II has returned to conquer the stars! The psychic Elerian join the original 10 races with their own emperors and advisors, new ship hulls and blueprints, and unique perks and personalities. The whole galaxy welcomes their arrival, just in time to face the return of the nefarious Antarans.

name: Marine Park Empire
summary:
Get ready to jump in the water as you run the most exciting and wild marine park ever in the latest and greatest sea-life simulation!

Control every aspect of your marine park, from caring, feeding and cleaning your animals to hiring and firing employees. Grant your visitors the thrill of a lifetime as you provide fun-filled attractions, rides and shows for them to whet their appetite while they explore your sea-life wonderland.

Featuring a free-form game where you set the rules, and a challenging non-linear scenario mode where you can test your skills at becoming next great saltwater specialist, the fun and varied gameplay in Marine Park will not leave gamers out to dry.

Maintain your checkbook balances afloat, keep your denizens of the deep delighted and the visitors flowing in your park. Then dive in for wave after wave of aquatic fun!

Awash with Realism: Immerse yourself in a fantastic 3D world filled with creatures from the uncharted waters of the sea. From Otters to Orcas, Octopus to Oarfish, Marine Park is overflowing with 28 unique species of marine animals big and small that you can add to your ultimate marine park. Inundate your senses with the spectacular 3d graphics and sound and realistic, lifelike animations.

A Flood of Unique Items: Go overboard in your marine park designs with over 150 structures, facilities and items to decorate your park and entertain your visitors with. Build wet-and-wild rides and unique attractions that your visitors can enjoy as they have a rip-roaring time in your marine park. Only your imagination stands in the way of creating the most exciting park for all to see!

Fun for Sea Dogs and Landlubbers Alike: Now land and marine animals go paw-in-flipper! Marine Park gives you a whopping 60 animals and over 450 unique building and decoration items to toy with as you build not only the best zoo or marine park, but a wildlife menagerie like no other!

With a completely flexible camera, including third- and first-person perspectives, dive in with your animals and experience the world of marine life from a completely different perspective.

Hit the Deck Running: A new, streamlined interface that is user-friendly, task-oriented and context-sensitive allows you to model exhibits and create your marine park with the greatest of ease and the minimum of fuss.

Learn the Ropes as You Go Along: Six intuitive and interactive tutorials let you get your feet wet in no time. Learn about the sea creatures, their habitats and behaviors through the animal fun facts as you create the marine park of your dreams. When you are ready, embark on your own unique underwater quest by completing all 21 challenging scenarios, or experiment with the free-form game where you set the rules.

name: Mandala
summary: Mandala is a hypnotic and and meditative bullet hell shooter. Let the flow inspire you while coloring geometric figures and discover more about yourself through immersive moods.

name: Math for the Real World
summary: The player manages a rock band and must secure funds to producing music videos and become successful by managing the budget efficiently. This is achieved by completing objectives like keeping on schedule and ensuring the van does not run out of fuel.

name: Man O' War: Corsair - Fell Cargo
March March!
summary: March! March! is a turn-based auto battler with puzzle-based mechanics, inspired by the classic puzzle game Tetris Each turn your army gets a regiment that varies in formation and size. Tell your units where to march! march! and they will do the rest.

name: Maze of Infection
summary: A survival-Top down shooter full of zombies!

name: Mahjong Cop Ryuu: Shiro Ookami no Yabou
summary: Mahjong Cop Ryuu: Shiro Ookami no Yabou is a 1989 mahjong game for the Sega Mega Drive by Sega.

name: Madden NFL 17
summary: Old gen port of Madden NFL 17.

name: Mazes of Fate
summary: Mazes of Fate is a real-time first-person role-playing game in which the player takes controls of up to three characters.

name: Man or Muppet
summary: An essay on muppets and my trans life.

name: Mamegoma 2: Uchi no Ko ga Ichiban!
summary:
This time, a very cute ‚ÄúBaby Mamegoma‚Äù is newly introduced! In addition, you will be able to keep two animals at the same time, so you can enjoy watching the Mamegoma parent and child playing together. In addition, "Mamegoma", which swims smoothly in the water, will be unveiled for the first time! The sight of Mamegoma, which is relaxing on the ground, swimming around freely is a moving sight! Daily care such as feeding and cleaning is very easy! If you teach it words, it will show you various poses! There are a total of 32 types of Mamegoma that appear in the game!

Why don't you grow your favorite Mamegoma?

name: Made in Physics
summary: A physics based game with many minigames!

name: Manu
summary: In Manu, the player controls Manu, a child who struggles to finish their homework. In this 2D platform adventure game, the player will encounter various challenges to help Manu break free from their thoughts and, despite everything, manage to complete their assignment.

name: Maze City: A Cyberpunk Lost and Found Centre
summary: Maze City: A Cyberpunk Lost and Found Centre is a game that simulates the life of a wage slave in a lost and found centre of the future cyberpunk city. Go experience life and seek the truth by chatting, returning lost items, trading and playing card games.

name: Mariko: Hot Nightlife
summary: Mariko wants to go to a nightclub and make new acquaintances today. You can make a choice for her how to spend this evening.

name: Maze the Quest
summary:
Maze The Quest is a small adventure action roguelike. Helps your hero in search key and the exit of each maze. Endless mazes and various sizes.
Various monsters, traps, spells and attributes in the purest style of RPG.
Many weapons, shields, accessories and items with which you can equip your hero.

name: MapFriend
summary: Google Maps, but it's a horror game

name: Magnificent Ships: Volume 1
summary: Model ship lovers rejoice! This is a collection of six finely-detailed vessels for viewing at both room- and full-scale using a VR headset.

name: Mad Panic Coaster
summary:
The game was published by Hakuhodo in 1997, an advertising agency in Japan whose only other game is the RPG Himikoden: Renge. The developer of this game is unknown, as the only company shown before the intro screen is Hakuhodo. However, given that Himikogen: Renge was developed by Chime Corporation, it is unlikely that Hakuhodo actually developed Mad Panic Coaster.

In Mad Panic Coaster, you control a boy and a girl (perhaps a brother and sister?) as they sit in a roller coaster car and go through 15 hellish roller coasters. How these roller coasters even got past safety testing is unknown, as they don't have any rails or barriers of any sort. It's up to you to steer the roller coaster car using the d-pad to make sure it stays on the track. The roller coasters also have various monsters, traps, and jumps to avoid. To do this, you use X to jump. Hitting Square will make the girl throw some sort of yellow ball projectile that explodes at a long range, while hitting Circle will make the boy throw that same type of projectile at a shorter range. Falling off the track or getting hit by something will cost you health, and once you run out, you must start the level all over again. Once you make three laps around the track, a rainbow with the words "lucky" form around you as they come to a stop, and you move on to the next level. Every three roller coasters, a boss will be fought after completing the third lap. This boss is similar to the regular enemies, except that they take many more hits to kill. To defeat them, you has to either throw enough projectiles at them or survive another three laps.

name: Mario Kart 64 Randomizer
summary: A randomizer mod for Mario Kart 64.

name: Marie's Room
summary: Marie's Room is a short-story exploration game about an unconventional friendship between two classmates, told through memories. You play as Kelsey, remembering Marie's room as it was 20 years ago. What happened to Marie and Kelsey all those years ago?

name: Maya Treasures
summary: Maya Treasures - a game in the well-known genre "three-in-a-row", made in bright hand-drawn graphics.

name: Maitetsu: Pure Station - Special Luxury Version with Triple Suede Tapestry Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Maitetsu: Pure Station
- Triple Suede Tapestry
- Postcard
- Original Soundtrack (5 set)
- Pocket Colored Paper (2 set)

name: Mansion Mystery
summary: Dive into 'Mansion Mystery,' an immersive VR puzzler. In a haunted mansion governed by real-world physics, ignite matches, shatter plates, solve intricate puzzles. Will you unravel the secrets and escape or be trapped forever?

name: Matter of the Dreams
summary: Matter of the Dreams - is a game for die-hard action fans. No exploration, no searching for keys to unlock paths ‚Äì the player needs nothing more than good aim and a quick trigger finger to succeed.

name: Magic Planet Snack Deluxe
summary: In Magic Planet Snack Deluxe the player takes control of a wizard that has been turned into a giant space worm.

name: Mahjong Sword: Princess Quest Gaiden
summary:
Mahjong Sword: Princess Quest Gaiden is a Mahjong video game developed and published by Naxat Soft for the TurboGrafx-16/PC Engine System in 1995.

It is a censored port of the PC-98 game, "Mahjong Sword: Princess Quest" which was released a few months prior and the game is an off-shoot to the quirky PC-98 Board / Card RPG, "KuruKuru Party: Princess Quest"

name: Masquaradious
summary: Utilize the power of the masks and explore the ever-changing world of Masquradious, where the stories is your to shape. Can the mask bring you to the happy end ? or will it bring you to the abyss ?

name: Mazes of Fate DS
summary: Mazes of Fate DS is a remaster of the Game Boy Advance title Mazes of Fate. It improved on the original by fixing bugs present in the original, introducing a 3D engine in dungeons as a replacement of fake-3D, adding new secret areas in dungeons, and including new dungeon maps.

name: Masters of Puzzle: Black and White - Beads in the Wall
summary: A puzzle box with Black & White photography for the Masters of Puzzle game.

name: Mars: Total Warfare
summary: Mars: Total Warfare uses authentic Martian landscapes to create an intense RTS experience best described as a hybrid between team multiplayer and massively multiplayer online. Fight over natural resources vs human or AI opponents and conquer a crater ridden world, with pink sky and blue seas!

name: Magnet Face
summary:
Billy has been kidnapped by aliens, so your task is to help him escape their prison and spaceship, without taking too much damage so that the aliens catch up to him and grab him back.

As you proceed to the end of each level, give it your best to collect as much cheese as possible, so that you amount to a really big score, and solve all the puzzles you encounter in order to advance, since the path is not that clear. Billy's face is magnetized, so he will be able to collect cheese easier.

name: Mayhem 2018: Orange Edition
summary:
MAYhem 2018 is a pair of megawads for Boom-compatible source ports, totaling 42 levels created in May 2018 by members of the Doomworld forums. It is the seventh installment of the MAYhem series, and was led by James Caldwell (Obsidian) for the first time in the series, who took over from Michael Fraize (Marcaek).
Series founder TheMionicDonut proposed that as a reference to the Pok√©mon series of video games, MAYhem 2018 would feature two megawads, run as separate projects at the same time. The orange edition features 22 levels, whilst the purple edition has 20. Each edition contains its own roster of custom monsters through the use of DeHackEd and custom palettes to bring out the colour themes better.

name: Mayhem 2020: Something Something Hindsight
summary: MAYhem 2020: Something Something Hindsight is a 48-level Doom II megawad for Boom-compatible source ports, created by members of the Doomworld forums. It is the ninth installment in the MAYhem series, and was led by James Caldwell (Obsidian). This time the levels are limited to a maximum of 20 sectors.

name: Mayhem 2022: Memento Moron
summary: MAYhem 2022: MEMENTO MORON is a 28-level Doom II megawad for Boom-compatible source ports, created by members of the Doomworld forums. It is the tenth installment in the MAYhem series and was led by James Caldwell (Obsidian). The stated intention of this year's installment was to homage the projects from the first 10 years of Doom mapping, with a resource pack comprised of textures from the IK Texture pack, Hellcore 2.0 and the Malice total conversion for Quake.

name: Maximo vs. Army of Zin
summary: The story of the game follows on from Maximo: Ghosts to Glory, with Maximo still searching for his lost love, Sophia. He is again accompanied by Grim (a Grim Reaper). However, their search is interrupted as a series of mechanical creatures start to attack villages and slaughter the village folk. These creatures are the Army of Zin, an ancient army powered by lost souls, who were supposedly locked in the vault of Castle Hawkmoor after the last battle with them 500 years ago. However, they are now free, due to the actions of the mysterious warlord, Lord Bane.

name: Mayhem 2019: Blood for the Doom God!
summary:
MAYhem 2019: Blood for the Doom God! is a 19-level megawad for MBF-compatible source ports, created in May 2019 by members of the Doomworld forums. It is the eighth installment of the MAYhem series, and was led by James Caldwell (Obsidian).
The megawad includes textures from Blood and Clive Barker's Undying, and as such, most maps carry a darker, horror-esque atmosphere. Additionally, the WAD features very extensive DeHackEd work, adding custom weapons, items and a wide range of custom monsters as well as new sprites for some of the original monsters

name: Mayhem 2013
summary: MAYhem 2013 is an 11-level PWAD for Boom-compatible source ports, created by members of the Doomworld forums in May 2013. It was the second MAYhem event, and led by series founder TheMionicDonut. As well as being made in a month, there was an additional limitation of using only two monster types per map.

name: Marble Madness
summary: The idea of this arcade game is deceptively simple: Guide a marble down a path without hitting any obstacles or straying off the course. The game is viewed from an isometric perspective, which makes it harder to stay focused on the direction the ball is to follow. There are tight corridors to follow and enemies to avoid. There is a 2-player mode in which players must race to the finish; otherwise you're racing against the clock.

name: Marble Madness
summary: A port for Game Gear and Master System.

name: Magic Survivors
summary: Magic Survivor is an adventure - roguelike survivor game with a unique storyline. You are not a lone survivor, tiny survivor, or zombie survivor... You are a strong magic survivor, a cute but clumsy one with unknown power and ready to face up with the monster.

name: Magnate: Robot Idle Tycoon
summary: Start at the bottom selling old machine parts and junk droids and... tap, tap, tap your way to your very own cyberpunk empire! Before you know it you‚Äôll be able to hire managers to do the hard graft for you, and with billions banked, you must face the ultimate fat cat dilemma; take the path of GOOD or EVIL in your pursuit of even greater fortune?

name: Marbleous Blocks
summary: Challenge your spatial thinking in this point & click, physics based, 3D-puzzle game, where you combine blocks to create paths for a marble named Max.

name: Mami no Doki-doki Tiro Finale
summary: Mami Tomoe protects Madoka and Sayaka from the witch and its familiars.

name: Math Mayhem!!
summary: Math Mayhem!! is a math game available on mobile platforms. Master arithmetic, including multiplication, addition, subtraction, and division, while having fun and relieving stress.

name: Mar Koochooloo
summary: Snake game for Playdate with nine levels and a "Gentle Mode" for new players.

name: MagicBeans
summary: An action role-playing game. The plot is full of ups and downs, innovative gameplay, and lively battles, including treasure hunting, seaside leisure hunting, and tower defense elements. I believe it can bring you unexpected surprises.

name: Mafia Wars Shakedown
summary: Zynga's third game in the Mafia Wars familly

name: Mars Type I
summary: Horizontal shooter and god-killing simulator

name: Martian Potato
summary: Galactic farmer - it sounds proud! Do you have a farm on the Red Planet?

name: Magic Sudoku
summary: Magic sudoku is a collection of 2000 logic games: sudoku and crucipixel. In sudoku the player have to fill a grid with numbers (no mathematical skill needed!), in crucipixel the player have to fill a grid with black squares in order to form a picture following the clues.

name: Masters of Puzzle: Echoes
summary: A puzzle box in the digital art for the Masters of Puzzle game.

name: MacMan And The Caber Eater
summary:
Meet MacMan, the canny Scot who takes children on fun-packed maths adventures.

MacMan and the Caber Eater teaches addition and subtraction and shows some of the relationships between numbers. By adding and subtracting, children help MacMan to build up a caber, piece by piece, and then toss it. Easy? Not when the dreaded Caber Eater appears on the scene and tries to steal the pieces away!

The program has five levels of difficulty, a built-in assessment device, and a 'help' sequence for children having difficulty.

This software was devised by educationalists and has been tried and tested in schools and homes. The program was wrtitten by Intelligent Software, creators of high quality educational software for 4-8 year olds.

name: MacMan And The Great Escape
summary:
Meet MacMan, the canny Scot who takes children on fun-packed maths adventures.

MacMan and the Great Escape teaches children about shape and area, and about the effects of rotation and reflection. MacMan is guarding some prisoners trapped behind a wall. As if by magic, holes of different shapes and sizes appear in the wall. Children help MacMan stop his prisoners escaping by selecting shapes of the appropriate area, then manipulating them by rotation and/or reflection to fit each hole. If they are too slow, the prisoners break out and terrible things happen to MacMan!

The program features suberb special graphics effects, and a range of six difficulty levels.

This software was developed by educationalists and has been tried and tested in schools and homes. The program was written by Intelligent Software, creators of high quality educational software. For 5-9 year olds.

name: MageCosmos
summary: MageCosmos is a VR platform for global users to meet, play and discover together. We have immersive multiplayer games with interesting themes like fly simulation, farming, tower defense...This is also a place for you and friend to relax yourselves, it's definitely worth your visting !

name: Magic Garden
summary: In this game, players need to plant various plants to defend their gardens, and at the same time, they need to cultivate these plants to increase their combat effectiveness.

name: Mahjong Duels
summary: Play the classic chinese game with your friends in live Mahjong battles!

name: Machine Gun Fury
summary: On a bold and potentially dangerous mission to revive the classic Arcade military shooter. Fully loaded with addictive top-down and side-scrolling run-and-gun gameplay, pixel-perfect 2D graphics, explosive SID soundtrack and massive destruction! Fight on foot and in heavily armed vehicles.

name: Manor Maze
summary: Have you ever dreamed about being trapped in a manor where the architecture is a maze? Understandable, but unfortunately that will be happening. Where each maze has its own mechanic, will you be able to decipher them to free yourself from a place where it seems like you have no allies.

name: Malevolence
summary: Malevolence is a retro styled first person horror adventure

name: Manic
summary: Manic is a thrilling and brutal action game where you must fight off swarms of enemies whilst seeking vengeance against the mysterious group that murdered your family.

name: Masters of Chess
summary: Play chess in virtual reality, either against the computer AI, against a friend on the same computer (using desktop screen and mouse), or against someone online. There are 3 AI settings to choose from and the chess board measures 1.5m x 1.5m.

name: Mario Heardle
summary: A variation of Heardle dedicated to songs from throughout the entire Mario franchise. This includes not only Super Mario and its spinoffs, but the Donkey Kong, Yoshi, Wario, Luigi's Mansion, Princess Peach, and Captain Toad games as well. Mario remixes from the Super Smash Bros. and Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games series are also included. Originally created with glitch.com but has since moved to GitHub.

name: Manafall
summary: Manafall is a VR Tower-Defense game that melds strategy and action. Set in a magical-fantasy world, the player will fight through hordes of enemies using swords and bows, while casting spells, and building towers.

name: Mahou City
summary: 3D Action Battle City like game.

name: Madness on Display
summary: Venture into the world of chilling psychological horror, where the line between reality and nightmare is thinner than a spider's web. Grandview is not just a game, it is a test for your nerves and mind.

name: Manludo 2

name: Mace: The Dark Age
summary:
Mace: The Dark Age is a fighting video game released by Atari for arcade machines in 1997 and ported by Midway to the Nintendo 64 in 1997.

The game is similar to Bio F.R.E.A.K.S. and the Mortal Kombat series. Like in Mortal Kombat, when a character wins both rounds, they can perform an execution move on the enemy. Methods included severing an opponent's limbs and torso (Al Rashid), beheading (The Executioner), repeated stabbing (Koyasha), impaling the opponent with a sword (Lord Deimos), breaking an opponent's back by hoisting them on top of a Viking helmet and throwing them to the ground, causing their body to explode (Ragnar), and some more far-fetched methods including pulling out an opponent's heart (Xiao Long), shrinking (Namira), transforming the opponent into a chicken (Taria), and entering an opponent's body and bursting them from inside (Dregan).

Note: Heavily borrowing from the arcade game Soul Edge (1995)--first of the Souls Series. Which borrowed heavily from the framework WeaponLord (1995) laid out. Visual Concepts (developers of WeaponLord) would send builds of the game to Namco (the publisher of WeaponLord) to playtest.

In Mario Remix: Boss Edition you're up against 35 famous and original bosses from past series. It also includes an item system and original minigames.

A long time ago I made Mario Remix. Ever since then I've been wanting to do another Mario crossover game. Well, I've finally gotten around to doing it. I've always loved a good boss fight. Enjoy!

name: Max & the Magic Marker
summary: Max is a young boy, and like most boys he loves to draw. One day he gets a mysterious marker in the mail. There is no letter attached - only the plain orange marker. Max decides to test it right away, sits down and starts drawing. He draws a monster but as soon as he finishes the lines on the paper start moving and to Max's great surprise the monster runs off the paper and into another drawing. Max realizes that he has to stop the monster. So he draws himself on the same drawing that the monster is in and immediately finds himself inside the drawing. The game begins.

name: Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games Tokyo 2020: Arcade Edition

As with the Nintendo Switch version, the game takes place in Tokyo, Japan, home of the 2020 Summer Olympics, and features events from both 2020, as well as 2D Events from the 1964 Summer Olympics, which were also held in Tokyo.

The game is set to launch with a 400 player pvp battle royale mode first in 2018 with the full MMO game being released in 2019.

Rato Machindranath Jatra is a chariot procession honoring the Vajrayana Buddhism deity of compassion Avalokitesvara and as an incarnation of Shiva for Hindu people which is held in Lalitpur, Nepal. It is one of the greatest religious events in the city and the longest chariot festival celebrated in the country.

This game honors the tradition of this festival. This game is made using Godot game engine for Cultural Heritage Game Jam 2021.

name: Mahjong 2 Classroom
summary:
A Premium Mahjong for Everyone
Whether you play Mahjong everyday or want to learn how to master this game, Mahjong 2 Classroom was made for you!
Based on an old Chinese solitaire game, Mahjong is a free solitaire matching game which uses a set of Mahjong tiles. The goal of this pyramid game is to match open pairs of identical tiles and remove them from the board, exposing the tiles under them for play. You will be challenged to eliminate all pieces from the board.
In this brand new 3D version, we bring you stunning HD graphics. Experts will have the opportunity to play with the classic Mahjong tiles. Beginners will be introduced to the game through simpler and very colorful tiles based on all the classics from Magma Mobile.
For those of you who like brain and puzzle game, chess, checkers or backgammons, you will for sure enjoy this Premium Mahjong !

All in all, Marvel First Alliance is one of the finest examples of the freeware fighting genre, offering dozens of characters that many players are sure to appreciate. "

name: Marines Modern Urban Combat
summary:
Wii-exclusive gameplay controls have been built from the ground up to take advantage of the Wii?s unique motion-based control scheme, including Wii Zapper compatibility. 
Authentic marine tactics allow you to move aggressively, knowing your team executes the same tactics Marines use right now in the most dangerous places in the world. 
Devastate your enemies with precise attacks from mortar, snipers, and Cobra gunships. 
Play co-op with a friend with the easy of grabbing a second Wii Remote. 
Both your squad and your enemies feature deadly AI unlike anything you?ve ever seen before. Step up and command your squad in the only FPS for Wii that lets you issue orders to your fellow Marines.

name: Makai Hakkenden Shada
summary:
A PC Engine Action-RPG based on the famous Japanese novel series Nansou Satomi Hakkenden. The gameplay is at least partly inspired by Falcom's Ys series.

Makai Hakkenden Shada is an action-RPG from Data East that was released on the PC Engine (the Japanese TurboGrafx-16) in 1989. The game bears more than a close resemblance to Falcom's Ys: specifically the first game in the series, The Vanished Omens, which was a huge success for the PC Engine a few months prior as well as being a generally well-regarded computer RPG before then. As well as having a similar nude female figure in the opening intro, the game also borrows Ys's combat system: fighting occurs by walking into enemies at a slight angle, causing them to collide with the player character's weapon (which hurts them) rather than the player character himself (which hurts the player character). The various gauges for health and experience are also similar.

Makai Hakkenden Shada is based on a centuries-old Japanese novel series called Nansou Satomi Hakkenden, or "Eight Dog Chronicles", that features eight half-brother samurai who are all descended from the same dog and have the Japanese word for "dog" somewhere in their names. While these books have been referenced or adapted many times in other media such as manga and film, Makai Hakkenden Shada and the Famicom RPGs Satomi Hakkenden and Shin Satomi Hakkenden: Hikari to Yami no Tatakai are the only direct video game adaptations. Okami also contained an oblique reference to the novels.

Unlike Satomi Hakkenden, which eventually allowed the player to recruit all eight of the central characters of the novel series, Makai Hakkenden Shada only has the one playable character. Instead, other characters from the novels occasionally appear to help the player.

name: Man Enough
summary:
Man Enough is a full-motion video dating simulation game. The objective, as in most of these games, is to have intercourse with several women. The game starts with the player subscribing to a dating agency called "Man Enough", run by a woman named Jeri. She assists by popping up on the screen to give hints and evaluate progress. After that, the game goes to a gym where Blair, Erin, Fawn, Kellie and Quinn are. They can be clicked with a cursor in the shape of a human face: it changes to one with a speech balloon when placed over their heads (to initiate dialog and the dating progress), and to one with bulging eyes when placed on their bodies (to play a short "sexy" video of the girl).

The game manual comes with profiles for each girl, listing their predilections and dislikes. Using that information, the player must choose between three answers to each question made. These questions are displayed over a picture of the girl that changes according to her mood. Wrong answers bring sullen looks, and right answers bring broad smiles.

Jeri appears regularly to evaluate and encourage the player. Success moves the game forward to another stage, where the whole process is repeated again. Sometimes there is a change of pace with a mini-game (in the case of Quinn, after the second conversation the player has to win on a game of paintball against her). Each section has to be played from the beginning after failure.

name: Mathica
summary:
The small town of Numberville is under the curse of the late Professor Alfons Numerus - imprisoned in Number-Castle, Mathica, the stepdaughter of the mathematical genius, must solve the problem of squaring the circle, which her father failed.

The task is to redeem Mathica from the curse by finding the lost formula of Ramanujan, which proves the unsolvability of the problem and thus the futility of her arithmetic. Only in this way can the mind of Numerus acknowledge its lifelong error and find peace. Clues to the whereabouts of the formula can be found scattered throughout the city. Along the way, various mathematical puzzles must be solved, for example, to open locked doors. Thus, to free Mathica, certain mathematical knowledge about geometry, equations, numbers, probabilities and combinatorics is required, which can be acquired in the knowledge part of the game.

summary: AKA Puzzle Game Shanghai. The famous tile matching game hits mobile.

name: Magnetic
summary: In this puzzler, you play as a magnet and must use your attract and repel abilities to move objects, clear threats, and unlock portals. Think ahead, as one wrong move could have you literally bringing the danger towards you.

name: Major Motion
summary: In this action-packed top-down vehicular combat game from the 1980s, take on the role of a lone road warrior fighting to protect the highways of the western frontier from the sinister Draconian League! Drive a high-tech spy car, with machine guns, oil slicks, missiles and more!

name: Maze
summary:
Can you find your way out of over 200 mazes? Play through three different modes to beat the clock and escape as fast as you can in Maze.

Use the Arrow Keys to move around the map. Your goal is to get to the large green circle as fast as you can!

name: Max Payne: Kung Fu Edition v3
summary: One of the most acclaimed mods, so much so that there is an easter egg on its creator in Max Payne 2. All kinds of kung fu punches and kicks have been added, including combos, use of the cane and even a simple skill system (from only four levels), which enables spectacular extra movements, such as "wall running". There is a special stage, the Dojo, which is practically a tutorial to learn the different blows and techniques.

name: Madlad Friend Sim
summary: Go on an adventure as a regular old human and get to know some aliens!

name: Masquerade
summary: You are a detective trying to bring down a crime boss.

name: Madden NFL Mobile
summary: Madden NFL Mobile is an American football sports video game based on the National Football League and published by EA Sports. Part of the Madden NFL series, the game was released for both iOS and Android platforms on August 26, 2014.

name: Mappa Imperium
summary: A Worldbuilding pen & paper game

name: Mass Effect: Team Assault
summary: An unreleased spinoff to the Mass Effect series which got scrapped after 4 months of being in development. Some of it‚Äôs aspects would later be implemented into Mass Effect 3.

name: Marvel Mystic Mayhem
summary: Marvel Mystic Mayhem is an upcoming free-to-play, team-based tactical RPG set in the Marvel Universe.

name: Mamiya: DoomsDayDreams
summary: Mamiya: DoomsDayDreams is the thrilling final part of the dark mystery visual novel Mamiya, in which in which a group of young men struggle against existential dread before the end of the world.

name: Manickologi
summary: Manickologi is a game about getting sidetracked on your way back home. Follow mani the manickologist and his robot friend Stefan on their adventure. Swap between characters to make use of their unique skillsets. Collect hidden treasures and complete quests.

name: Matched
summary:
Test your brain skills with Matched. A simple yet challengingly tricky game that‚Äôll keep you hooked and on your toes.
Matched is an advanced take on the classic game of memory match and more. Memory match with open faced cards? What? What kind of memory game is that? ‚Äî It‚Äôs not! It‚Äôs more than that. Matched will put your hand-to-eye coordination on trial and scrutinize your observation skills.

name: Magic Quest
summary: Magic Quest is a tower defense game with towers, mighty enemies, bosses and heroes with unique abilities.

name: Mary-Kate and Ashley: Pocket Planner
summary: Is your life totally disorganized? Do you lose track of what you need to do? Have you lost the phone number of the cutest guy in school? Get organized with MARY-KATE & ASHLEY: Pocket Planner for the Game Boy Color. Use the calendar to keep track of all those really important messages and never forget a phone number with the phone book. You can also write super-secret messages to your friends and beam them to another Game Boy Color. In addition to these features, several games have been included. You can help raise Mary-Kate and Ashley's dog, Clue. If you have a question, go to Ask Ashley, and she will check her crystal ball for an answer. If you are completely unorganized and need some help, run out and get MARY-KATE & ASHLEY: Pocket Planner.

name: Mario & Luigi: 4 Party
summary:
Mario & Luigi: 4 Party is a fangame of the well-known Mario Party series. It is a multiplayer game centered around playing as Mario and co. in minigames reminiscent to the Mario Party games themselves.

The game consists of several fun games in which four players battle each other for victory!

name: Magnetic: Cage Closed - Challenge Map Pack DLC
summary: Get ready for a brand new set of challenges that really tests the limits of both players and the game tools. In this DLC-pack you get the best of both worlds: puzzle-focused brain teasers and neck-breaking trick-jumping action. If you really love a challenge, then this pack is for you.

name: Mama Russia Needs You
summary: Mama Russia Needs You is a bloody shoot'em up set in the alternative history, where USSR is at the final stage of taking over the world.

name: Magical Drop CPC
summary: A homebrew CPC conversion by Oscar Sanchez (aka Mochilote) of the 1995 classic from Data East

name: ManGuin: Penguin Apocalypse
summary: A real-time strategy (RTS) game which comes from our love of 50s Sci-fi films. Set in Antarctica you control a team of top scientists researching penguins. Disaster strikes when a satellite carrying an unknown space virus crashes near a penguin colony.

name: Marble Blast Gold
summary: Marble Blast Gold revolves around controlling a colorful marble around different stages, with the goal of getting to the end pad while avoiding falling off the level. Some levels contain hazards to hinder the player‚Äôs progress and powerups to help you pass through or over various environments. In levels with gems, you must collect them all before you are allowed to complete the level. Some levels feature a Qualify Time, where you must finish the level in the allotted time limit, and all levels feature an optional Gold Time target; though, clearing these do not unlock anything.

name: Matchunk
summary:
The aim of the game is to match two chunks that have identical symbols or lead green dices to the right place. 
 
Orange chunks are also moveable, use them when help is needed or to protect dices against lava. Watch out for the red lava, dices burn in it! 
 
Blue ground is ice, which is slippery. 
 
Pink malicious chunks show a symbol only for a moment, you have to memorize what you just saw. 
 
Snow white chunks have to be removed by quick taping on them. 
 
The faster you reach the target, the more points you score.

name: Masarada Town Story
summary: This is Masarada Town. It is a lonely town that few tourists visit. That's why I, Takarayama Jewel, were sent to this small town to work hard to mine rare ores!

name: Mage
summary: Dungeon exploring Wizard action! Learn spells, defeat bosses and escape the evil clutches of Lord Daos in this 2D metroidvania.

name: MafiaMatrix
summary: Text-based online player game that mirrors the real world in gritty detail.

name: Mad Geometry
summary: You are what you collect.

name: Making a Monster
summary:
Loupe is an aspiring witch who wants to make an elaborate training dummy to help them hone their magic skills. Instead, they make something worse.

A micro visual novel about facing your worst enemy.

name: Maestro: Music of Death - Collector's Edition
summary: Stop a mysterious illness that is causing an entire village to rapidly age! Find the cause and find a missing young girl!

name: Magical Massage
summary: In a world where magic reigns, you're a rare mundane masseur, easing stressed magicians to prevent disaster. Flaming nostrils, flowers sprouting from backs, floods on the bed‚Äînothing too fancy that you can't handle. However, if your skills fall short, these powerful, unclothed threats may kill you.

name: Max Payne Mobile
summary:
A fugitive undercover cop framed for murder, hunted by cops and the mob, Max is a man with his back against the wall, fighting a battle he cannot hope to win. Max Payne is a relentless story-driven game about a man on the edge, fighting to clear his name while struggling to uncover the truth about his slain family amongst a myriad of plot-twists.

The groundbreaking original cinematic action-shooter, Max Payne introduced the concept of Bullet Time in videogames. Through its stylish slow-motion gunplay combined with a dark and twisted story, Max Payne redefined the action-shooter genre.

name: Masquerade
summary: Masquerade is an old-school FPS blended with classic adventure games, with a stylised cel-shaded look that creates a modern and fresh FPS experience.

name: Marble Partner
summary: Go and capture all the elves. Embark on an adventure, collect all the badges and become a master wizard.

name: Maze Of Misery
summary: Unite with up to 4 players in dark trials and survive the Maze of Misery, where shadowy forces dictate your fate. Put your wit and teamwork to the test. Will you conquer these sinister puzzles and escape the enigmatic grasp? Your survival hangs on cooperation in a world of malevolent secrets.

name: Madness Robots
summary: A game where you must protect a ship from an atack of evil robots, with the help of turrets and other devices

name: Masters of the Broken World
summary: A fantasy turn-based strategy game offering non-linear and choice-based gameplay. Developed by Russian studo Unicorn Games.

name: Mars Miner
summary: Tap on a planet with your finger to mine it, and discover alien planets!

name: Maze of the Mini-taur
summary: Make your way through the labyrinth while you move and manipulate its very rooms. Can you escape?

name: Mastodonte
summary: Mastodonte is an innovative Shoot 'Em Up with the unique mechanics of swapping the view from Vertical to Horizontal scrolling. Sometimes optional, sometimes necessary, but it creates a new experience for each retry.

name: Massive Air Combat: Puzzles
summary: This game is a puzzle game. This is a free add-on for customers who purchase the Massive Air Combat.

name: Maelstrom
summary: Maelstrom is a video game developed by Andrew Welch, released as shareware in November 1992 for Mac OS.

name: Maronia
summary: Maronia is a roguelike game where you control a 2D pixel character to withstand attacks from monsters for a limited time. Upgrade your skills and defeat your enemies to survive until the end. It's all up to you.

name: Mad Freebording Snowboarding Free
summary: Mad Freebording is a skating game featuring the new sport Freebording. It feels like snowboarding the streets. This game offers over 30 missions on 18 levels, large variety of clothes and items, realistic levels and pure fun. Ride, level up, improve your skills, customize your clothes and get involved with the world of freebording! This game is the successor of Freebord The Game.

name: Mayday Memory
summary: A mobile dating simulation game where the protagonist, a private investigator by the name of Dell, must recover her memories in an advanced society that treats memories like currencies. Is it possible that her teammates hold the key to her memories?

name: Maze Keeper
summary: You are the guardian of a cursed labyrinth and must prevent an adventurer from escaping with the help of your monsters. But the adventurer keeps trying again and again, accumulating levels and getting stronger... Survive to the highest possible level !

name: Mahjong Daiyogen
summary: An adult themed arcade Mahjong game.

name: Maui Mallard in Cold Shadow
summary: The Game Boy port of Maui Mallard in Cold Shadow.

name: Mayan Reynolds
summary: Mayan Reynolds is a small vanilla compatible episode for Doom 2 featuring overgrown ruins and dank caves. The WAD was speed-map project made over the course of a week. Difficulties are implemented. Mouselook, jumping, and crouching should be disabled if you're playing on a port with those features.

name: Master of LinCard
summary: This is a fast-paced card game. Including nearly 500 cards. Let's build your deck and become a master of LinCard.

name: Matchsticks
summary:
Keep your mind active with this classic matches game!
The rules are simple: you must create triangles, squares or fix simple equations by adding, moving or removing matches.

name: Mario + Rabbids Kingdom Battle: Ultra Challenge Pack
summary:
The Ultra Challenge Pack will put you to the test with:

‚Ä¢ 8 new Ultra Hard Challenges inside each world‚Äôs Secret chapter
‚Ä¢ 5 exclusive Co-op Maps

Gather your heroes and dive into the 8 new Ultra Hard Challenges to prove your worth! As if it wasn't enough, a gust of chaos is bringing panic in to the Co-op Mode; Chain Chomps, Tornados and Boos are wreaking havoc on the 5 new Co-op Maps.

Get ready to team up against their chaotic wake in the brand new Cataclysm Kerfuffle Co-op Campaign!

name: Maid Mansion
summary: Maid Mansion is an eroge-thriller visual novel set shortly after the Great War, developed by Crazy Cactus Entertainment. A young man inherits his relative's mansion after their untimely death. Now he is the lord of the manor, with only one restriction left upon his grandfather's passing - he may never fire the head maid, Takako.

name: Magic Purple
summary: Magic Purple is an action platformer released for arcades in 1996.

name: Margrave: The Blacksmith's Daughter
summary: Embark on a thrilling rescue mission in Margrave: The Blacksmith's Daughter! The town of the Cyclops appears for a single day once every three hundred years, on an island lost to cartographers. On this Day of Alignment, the town rises and sets with the midsummer sun. As the Margrave saga nears its devastating conclusion, Edwina Margrave embarks on a rescue mission into the town. Her only chance of escape is to return life to the arcane machines, and hope to the sole survivor of an ancient war, in Margrave: The Blacksmith‚Äôs Daughter. Prepare yourself for the adventure of a lifetime: the legacy of an entire civilization depends upon your cunning and compassion.

name: Maliguard
summary: A swashbuckling stealth misadventure in which an ambitious alchemist must reclaim his inheritance from a web of intrigue.

name: Maze Final Challenge
platforms: Visual Memory Unit / Visual Memory System

name: Mars Rising
summary: A top-down shooter similer to Xevious, exclusive to the Mac OS (classic). Precedes Deimos Rising.

name: Marco Polo
summary: MARCO POLO - The art of bargaining lies in knowing how far you can go. Fame, fortune and adventure lie ahead.

name: Match-Off
summary: Memory card game crossed with turn-based, wild-west themed duel

name: Magic Mirror Hall
summary: Remedy a relationship plagued by a magical malady (and repression)

name: Mandroid
summary: Part man, part droid, all mandroid.

name: Marble Watchness
summary:
With 3D isometrics levels, stunning graphics and world ranking to challenge everyone, this tribute to Marble Madness will enjoy your Apple Watch!
Goal of the game is to move in the maze to collect the coloured balls.

name: Magical Hike
summary: Welcome to the enchanting world of Magical Hike, a soothing and immersive walking simulator that invites you to embark on a tranquil journey through picturesque landscapes and captivating environments. Leave your worries behind as you explore breathtaking locations.

name: Mario 4: Kosmichyeskaya Odissyeya
summary: Mario 4: A Space Odyssey is a bootleg game based on the Mario series made for the Sega Genesis.

name: Magicliment
summary: In this real-time action adventure RPG, players set off as Pururin, a fledgling hero freshly graduated from the Hero's Academy. Jump, fight, and use magic to collect the seven Rainbow Fragments scattered across the world and prevent the Demon King's resurrection.

name: Marble Madness
summary:
Marble Madness is an isometric platform game in which the player manipulates an onscreen marble from a third-person perspective. The player controls the marble's movements with a trackball, though most home versions use game controllers with directional pads. The aim of the game is for the player to complete six maze-like, isometric race courses before a set amount of time expires. When a player completes a race, the remaining time is added to the next race's allotted time. The game also allows two players to compete against each other.

Courses are populated with various objects and enemies designed to obstruct the player. As the game progresses, the courses become increasingly difficult and introduce more enemies and obstacles. Each course has a distinct visual theme. For example, the first race, titled "Practice", is a simple course that is much shorter than the others, while the fifth race, named "Silly", features polka-dot patterns and is oriented in a direction opposite from the other courses

name: Matchy Star
summary: Match-them-all to progress through strategy and skill challenges! Matchy Star is a casual action puzzle journey in space with dapper ships, perky stars, and a lot of tactical fun. Cruise the Alpha System all the way to Xanadu. Get your Matchy on!

name: Mahou no Princess Minky Momo: Remember Dream
summary: A 1992 Famicom game published by Yutaka based on the Minky Momo magical girl anime.

name: Master of Ives
summary: Join Jennifer and her Ive sisterhood in a quest to restore their roles as muses. Explore the Institute for Vital Energy, uncover potentials, and mend the lost bond between humans and these ethereal inspirers.

name: Magic Orbz
summary: Get Magic Orbz, Puzzle game for PS3 console from the official PlayStation website. Know more about Magic Orbz Game.

name: Mark Davis': The Fishing Master
summary:
In Mark Davis' The Fishing Master, the player can take control of fishing legend Mark Davis and fish in five different lakes and even compete in a fishing tournament to win a trophy.

The gameplay is reminiscent of Super Black Bass. The player picks a location to fish using an overhead map where the player is then taken to a behind the person perspective to cast their reel. Once the player casts their line, the view will change to a split screen with the original view on the top with a underwater view on the bottom to view the bait and an approaching fish.

name: Magicae Mundi
summary: You have magical powers and must use them for survival in this action game!

name: Madden NFL 95
summary:
Play exhibition, Super Bowl, playoffs or full season with any of the 1994 teams or all Madden teams.

This time around, you can select whether or not to include weather conditions, new player animations (high steppin', QB slides), a bigger field and over 100 injuries.

Also includes windowless passing, all new Madden-designed strategies and team match-up that shows how your players stack up to the other team in their position.

name: Mayhem 2002
summary: A futuristic sports game from Cinematronics.

name: Mario Superstar
summary:
This rom hack only has one level, but it features different mechanics that allow Mario to absorb the powers of some enemies, in a similar way to Kirby.

This rom hack was made to participate in SMW Central's Chocolate Level Design 2010 contest and came in first place.

name: Max Dirt Bike
summary: A physics bike game - You must use balance and skill to pass each level.

name: Match Gem 99
summary: MatchGem 99 is a unique large-scale 3-match puzzle battle royale game where 99 players compete in real-time. Master the use of special blocks and gauge attacks to outlast your opponents and be the last one standing!

name: MasqueradeAI
summary:
In this card game, players select and place the cards prior to a battle. 
The biggest feature of the game is that all actions in a battle are performed automatically, with players having to do nothing but to accept fate.

name: MASD
summary: MASD is a unique shooter/survival project. Once you have landed on the island, many challenges await you. Craft equipment, build your shelter and destroy your competitors. The availability of resources is strictly limited!

name: Mansion Tour
summary: A short RPG Maker Game about a girl trying to deal with her problem - by going into an abandoned house.

name: Maglev Metro
summary:
In Maglev Metro, utilize state-of-the-art magnetic levitation technology to build a metropolitan rail system, transporting workers and robots beneath the city. Replace aging Manhattan and Berlin subway systems with newer, faster, quieter technology. Enhance your rail system's abilities so that your passengers arrive at their destinations first.
Efficiency is your key to success in this pick-up-and-deliver, tile-laying, engine-building game. Transparent tiles allow your route to overlap your opponents' tracks, winding you along from station to station. Robots efficiently upgrade and adjust your abilities, leveraging unique goals to maximize points. By the end of the game, the game board has morphed into a modern subway map, with brightly-colored routes connecting stations all over the city.

name: Man/Woman
summary: A guide

name: Math Olympiad
summary: In the mysterious continent full of monsters, encounter mysterious creatures, according to the clues left along the way, try to challenge, find the way to the new world.

name: Many Buttons to Press
summary: This video game is living proof of how hard it is to make video games.

name: Mayhemers
summary: Mayhemers is game where you can create chaos and mayhem in different type of places. Play solo or up to 4 people against AI or challenge with other players in 3v3 pvp game mode.

name: MamoBall
summary: 2D multiplayer soccer mobile game.

name: Majime ni Fumajime Kaiketsu Zorori - Kyoufu no Takarabako
summary: "Kaiketsu Zorori", who is a big star in the manga and anime, is now available for the DS for the first time. Many familiar and fun characters also appear! Find the "Seven Treasure Chests" hidden in the world! Rub, cut, poke, blow, and enjoy the stylus action in this "easy-going adventure".

name: May Angels Fall Down
summary: Follow under, to a secretive cult of Icarus filled with lost individuals who seek selfish salvation. At its center lies Haejin, an alluring yet tormented leader whose flesh, when consumed, cures mortality.

name: Massive Assault Network
summary: Turn-based multiplayer strategy game.

name: Masters of Puzzle: Dream of Arcadia
summary: A classical painting puzzle box for the Masters of Puzzle game.

name: Match Up!
summary: Flip, match and‚Ä¶kaboom!

name: Mavis Beacon Teaches Typing Version 4
summary: Mavis ditches the exclamation point as she moves on to Windows 95.

name: Make Trax
summary: Player controls a paintbrush to paint paths within a maze. The player is harassed by two fish which can be temporarily destroyed by running them over with a one of two paint rollers located near the maze center. A critter occasionally emerges to leave footprints on painted areas which must then be repainted.

name: Matsumoto Toru no Kabushiki Hisshougaku II
summary:
A stock-trading simulation game for the NES and the sequel to Matsumoto Tooru no Kabushiki Hisshou Gaku.

Matsumoto Tooru no Kabushiki Hisshou Gaku 2 is the sequel to the original Matsumoto Tooru no Kabushiki Hisshou Gaku and like that game is a stock trading simulator akin to something like Wall Street Kid. The player needs to keep track of which stocks are rising and falling, identify trends and invest wisely to ensure a wealthy and happy life.

name: Magic Golf
summary: Mini Golf like you never played before! Thousands of crazy courses are waiting for you. And once you're ready for something else, start creating your own and share them with the world! Don't forget to upgrade your character with tons of wacky accessories. And most importantly, have fun!

name: ManagerLeague
summary:
ManagerLeague is an online Multiplayer Football Manager game enjoyed by thousands of players around the world.
Once in, you take charge of your own club, buy and sell players, train your players to improve in the areas you wish to focus on, send them off on training-camps and much more.
You are also expected to take care of the club economy, signing sponsors and upgrading your stadium and club facilities.

name: Maniac Pro-Wrestling: Ashita e no Tatakai
summary: A menu-based wrestling game that focuses on dramatic cutaways for moves and finishers.

name: Master of Music
summary: Play through the world of the Master of Music as a young bard setting out to explore new territory using his trusty lute and the power of music to destroy his enemies.

name: Magic Tales: Baba Yaga and the Magic Geese
summary: "Baba Yaga and the Magic Geese" is the second part of the "Magic Tales" series. It is based on Russian folklore and tells the story of a girl, Tasha, whose little brother Niki is kidnapped by magic geese for the evil witch Baba Yaga. When Tasha gets him out of Baba Yaga's hut, they receive magical help from a stream of milk, an apple tree and an oven, which allows them to escape and safely return home, while the evil witch lands on a lonely island.

name: Magical Warrior Rin: The Forbidden Alchemist Kira
summary: A role-playing game from TeamJOKER.

name: Machinarium & Creaks Bundle
summary: This bundle includes two games: Machinarium and Creaks. Machinarium Machinarium is the award-winning independent adventure game developed by the makers of Samorost and Botanicula.

name: Mall Master
summary: Mall Master - now you can design, build and manage shopping mall. Create your own successful business and make your customers happy. Mall Master gives you the opportunity to create a happy, stress-free work environment... of course, if you can do it.

name: Manly Mines
summary: 1-4 player bodybuilding co-op survival horror. Collect loot to sell for food and supplements in order to beef up to tackle the mighty testing gates.

name: Marmalade Boy
summary: Marmalade Boy is a dating simulation video game based on the anime adaptation of Marmalade Boy.

name: Mallion
summary: Play the game from the perspective of a traveler who comes to the dealer and is faced with numerous choices in a story prepared by the dealer. Experience a story that changes based on your choices and see the ending that changes based on your choices!

name: Maginet
summary: Maginet is a turn-based abstract strategy game where two guilds of mages battle each other. Dominate the arena with your wit and wisdom, play locally with friends and against the AI, or online across the world!

name: Maji de Watashi ni Koishinasai! A-3
summary: A fandisc for the game Maji de Watashi ni Koishinasai! featuring routes for Lee and Stacy, as well as an after story for Tsubame.

name: Masters of Puzzle: Worlds We Know
summary: A puzzle box in the traditional art for the Masters of Puzzle game.

name: Manpuku
summary: Short strange card game included in a Disc Station compile

name: Master Builder Simulator
summary: Dive into virtual brick-building with Master Builder Simulator! Explore solo or with friends in Sandbox, Model Building, Co-op, or versus modes. Unleash your inner Master Builder in endless creative adventures!

name: Maze Race Challenge
summary: Enjoy racing other players through a 3d maze on your Android device.

name: Makeover Date: Makeup ASMR
summary: Different stories from different characters, transform from boring to fascinating, from desperation to brilliance, by changing appearances through makeup!

name: Manage the Stars: Sports Agent
summary:
Become a head of a sport agency, hire agents, get football athletes, take care of them and sign them to best contracts you can find.
Negotiate to get the best terms and the biggest profit cut to form the most respected football agency in the US

name: Mad Frost
summary: Welcome to the world sketched on squared paper. The world full of adventures and unexpected meetings. Holidays are just around the corner! And our hero is waiting for them so much. But everything is not as simple as it seems...

name: Margaret's Little Shop of Wonders
summary: Gardening and magic are meeting in Margaret‚Äôs Little Shop of Wonders. Play as Margaret, a young witch who just opened her own flower shop, and fulfill the peculiar requests of her strange customers!

name: Masters of Puzzle: Clockwork Factory
summary: A traditional art puzzle box for the Masters of Puzzle game.

name: Magic Masks
summary: A casual puzzle adventure where you take on the roles of Lido and Rosy on their quest to restore the Ancient Mask. Using your wits and the abilities of different magic masks, will you be able to solve the increasingly difficult, puzzling levels?

name: Mario Undoukai
summary: Mario Undoukai (Mario Sports Festival) is a Mario arcade game released only in Japan. Like Buzzing Mario, very little is known about it. The game is a dancing game geared toward small children. It is one of the only two dancing games in the Mario series and is very similar to the other one, Dance Dance Revolution: Mario Mix, but there are two neutral foot spaces and no 2-player mode.

name: Manascape
summary: A roleplaying game set in a dark, new scifi fantasy universe. Make choices and lead your companions through a deep, branching story. Blast your enemies with magic or slice them with your manableid in tactical real time with pause combat as you unravel the mystery of the Lythlavir.

name: Mario Mania
summary: A Sonic Mania mod that replaces Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, Badniks and bosses with Mario characters. Some sounds and music have been changed as well!

name: Marsupilami
summary:
Marsupilami is a character created by Belgian cartoonist "Franquin". Marsupilami is a long tailed made-up character who was stolen from the jungle and performs in a circus. After helping the other animals escape, Marsupilami must make his way back to the country he came from - Palombia.

The aim is to guide his Elephant companion, Bonelli, through the levels, passed obstacles and traps. As he progresses, he gains more abilities by collecting power ups. Each level is timed so each action must be thought about carefully.

name: Maze Escape
summary: A maze chase game. A monster is chasing the player, and the player needs to keep running, jump over the guardrail, avoid being caught by the monster, and gradually find the maze exit and escape the maze.

name: Magical Hat no Buttobi Turbo! Daibouken
summary: Hat is the descendant of a hero who fought an evil king and sealed Devildom. Hat falls into Devildom and finds he has to defeat the evil king.

name: Match
summary: MATCH is a minimalist, arcade-style score-attack game that puts the focus on player skill. Memorize, flip, and match cards as you progress through levels, each with a shorter time limit. Compare your high-scores with friends' in the variety of game modes to see who is the MATCH Master!

name: Marcianito Go
summary: When the sonar button is pressed, one of the top-screen bar's energy levels is consumed and the location of martians in the surrounding area is revealed. If any is detected, it will show in the radar screen. In order to capture it, it is necessary to quickly tap the point in the radar and the capture screen will show. Once this has been done, one only needs to throw Marciano Balls until one of them shakes 3 times. Marciano Balls are limited and can be obtained inside chests that are detected by the radar. There are currently 16 different martian species.

name: Maximum Racing: Super Truck Racer
summary: Get behind two tons of massive machinery! Put your racing skills to the ultimate test as you get behind awesomely powerful super trucks in a battle for the finish!

name: Machine Heart
summary: Delve into the captivating cross-timeline puzzles of Machine Heart, and unravel the conspiracy behind a mass mind-uploading scheme.

name: Magnetic Joe
summary: Take control of Magnetic Joe, everyone's favorite little magnetic sphere.

name: Maze Company
summary: A short horror walking simulator where you just head from the workroom to the exit. Something may happen along the way, but don't worry, just keep going.Your goal is to return.

name: Matcha Warriors
summary: Matcha Warriors is an action platformer game with roguelike elements, where the player crosses the most varied environments fighting against monsters, barbarians and supernatural entities. Use the warrior's power and bring back the amulet, the world needs you!

name: Massage Salon Story: Spring Breeze
summary: Customers of all personalities are waiting for you here. You can tempt your customers with different massage techniques and positions to satisfy their desires. Of course, it is important to work hard to earn money. So Work hard and enjoy the life!

name: Maska's Masks
summary: The brother and sister that destiny joins, the illusion that emerges ceaselessly and weird masks...What is the true face of mysterious person maska after all? Here, players will explore dreams, illusions, absurdity and reality with Ayr.

name: Mammon: Devil Help
summary: Mammon: Devil Help is a turn-based, resource management, indirect battle between you and the will of any unfortunate victims. Drive them to desperation and buy their souls while being a human in the shoes of the Devil.

name: Marvel: Ultimate Alliance 2

The game received mixed reviews from critics. It was considered faithful to the physical version, but reviewers commented that it was not accessible to players who weren't already fans of collectible card games. The handheld versions were criticized for presenting a visual format inappropriate for small screens.

In addition to chaser cars there are various traps on the roads that the player has to avoid hitting such as rocks, oil and ice. Unlike the original arcade game, in this version the player cannot use a smokescreen to confuse the chasers. Both versions allow the player to choose the speed of the AI cars. In the ZX81 version, it is also possible to choose if the car should have momentum while in the Spectrum version this is always the case.

The original Mahjong Shikaku game was released for the Arcades and MSX2 and is a "strip mahjong" game. This enhanced PC Engine version removes the nudity.

Maniac Square is an action puzzle game with gameplay similar to Columns, but with pieces of only two parts and colours. Blocks drop down from the top of the screen and can be rotated. To create a match and make them disappear, at least three identical pieces need to be lined up horizontally, vertically or diagonally. Every now and then blocks contain a star piece that can be matched with any piece.

The game is played at a fast pace with a time limit. To extend the time and continue playing the player has to form a certain number of lines. Progress is shown through a vertical Goal bar in the top right side of the screen. Multiplayer is supported for two players simultaneously, racing each other.

50 million downloads worldwide! Mathooze is a casual puzzle game designed for those who like maths puzzles on the likes of sudoku and people with a general interest in mathematics or numbers. The game has over 400 puzzles with many more coming soon!

Each puzzle is designed to take only a few minutes to resolve, with a relatively wide difficulty gradient allowing beginners to gradually progress towards more difficult puzzles, keeping the gameplay challenging without it being too repetitive or taking excessive amounts of time. Perfect for when you're waiting on that salty ass***e who's roping you in Hearthstone!

The game features a tip system so if you run into a puzzle that for some unknown reason seems to be much more complicated to you, you can simply use the coins earned so far to make the puzzle easier or to get hints to come to a resolution more speedily.

name: Makyou Densetsu
summary:
AKA: È≠îÂ¢É‰ºùË™¨. The jungles surrounding the village of Minofu are under the thumb of the evil Jagu cult who require a blood sacrifice. A beautiful young woman named Flare has been selected as this season‚Äôs offering, however her boyfriend Gogan will not stand for it. Equipped with the legendary axe ‚ÄòSting‚Äô, he braves the six zones of Jagu‚Äôs territory to defeat the cult and save his love. 
 
Throughout the zones are breakable Jagu idols which drop various sized gems for points leading to extra lives, health revitalizing orbs of differing strength, crown-like crystal containers, and wing icons. Four crystal containers can be earned which charge the destructive power of Sting‚Äôs strike, while up to two wings can be collected increasing the speed of subsequent strikes. 
 
Each time you use the axe, the power meter drains completely then recharges as long as you don‚Äôt continue to swing. The added strategy of - is it better to dodge and charge the axe for a crushing blow, or is it better to hack away as fast as possible ‚Äì sets this game apart from most other hack-n-slashers. When you die, one level of speed and axe power is taken away and you must re-find an icon to get it back. The game doesn‚Äôt lock you to only scrolling right, so there are times where you can backtrack to find items.
