The game includes various modes such as Season, Playoffs, and Exhibition, allowing for different types of gameplay. It features updated rosters and playbooks, aiming to deliver an accurate representation of the sport. With its multiple gameplay options and official NFL licensing, Madden NFL 2002 on GBA enables players to engage in football matches and manage teams.

name: Marvel Pinball 3D
summary: Marvel Pinball 3D will have scoring features such as online leaderboards, local hot seat multiplayer, Hero Score and Team Force, as well as rewards for completing missions on each table.

name: Maxxed Out Racing: Nitro
summary: Maxxed Out Racing: Nitro is a Racing game, developed and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2006.

name: Maze of Gaea
summary:
Have you ever been challenged in a real maze? Stand tall and find the path of the maze, and then try to get out of the maze by memory. It's a double test of patience and memory.
We have crafted seven labyrinths, each with its own characteristics, come into the maze of virtual reality .

name: Mazelit: Rolling With Style
summary: Roll your own player character by choosing from six more style options for Mazelit - or create your own and use it in the game.

name: Matchbox Caterpillar Construction Zone 2: Gold Mining
Marcel Desailly Pro Soccer
summary: A soccer game that released for Nokia N-Gage.

name: Mario Kart 64 Chaos Blast
summary: This mod is challenging. It has the traffic in every map, features, a lot of map subversions and custom items

name: Manasis Refrain
summary: Manasis Refrain is a 3D anime adventure-RPG set in a colorful fantasy world filled with equal measures mana and magic. Determined to combat the Dark Lord and his dastardly forces, civilization has established schools to specially train and educate promising young pupils. You are one such student on their first day at the academy - don't be late!

name: Marbles Garden
summary:
Marbles Garden is match-3 marble shooter puzzle.

Your goal is to protect your beautiful garden against evil golems. Special projectiles and other bonuses, which you can upgrade during the game for collected stars, will also help you with that.

name: Machine Hunt
summary: Machine Hunt is a first person, fast paced, chaotic shooting game that pits heavily armed players against machines that have only one goal, destroy humanity.

name: Make the Border Great Again: Visa Officer Simulator
summary: Play as a visa officer in this chaotic simulator! Inspect passports, catch lies, and decide who crosses the border. But watch out‚Äîone bad stamp, and you're in jail! Test your wits in this hilarious battle of logic and deception.

name: Mayhem
summary: Mayhem is a horde-mode top down shooter where you and a friend must take down hordes of robots, aliens, zombies, and a giant UFO at the end.

name: Maverick Bird
summary: A Flappy Bird inspired game by Terry Cavanagh.

name: Mad Nurse
summary:
In Mad Nurse you take on the role of a midwife in a maternity hospital. In this hospital the babies run amok, leaving their cots to stick their fingers into electrical sockets, drink whatever medications they can get their hands on, fall down lift shafts and engage in other fatal activities. This makes it difficult for a trainee nurse such as yourself to bring them under control and it's your job to keep them alive.

Every time a baby jumps out of its cot, you must chase after it and rescue it from potential harm by picking it up and putting it back into its cot. The hospital ward is on three floors linked by a lift. Babies appear randomly at the left of the screen on any of the floors and crawl towards the right of the screen where, if they survive that long, they will fall down the lift shaft. To rescue the little dears you must run to them, pick them up, run to the nearest cot and put them down.

The player has three lives, or trainee nurses, to play with. A nurse is fired if too many babies die on a ward. Keep enough babies alive on your ward for long enough and your nurse moves onto the next ward. Advance through sufficient wards and you get another life (a new trainee is assigned to you). Points are awarded for babies picked up and put into their cots and for medicine bottles picked up. Also, to aid you in your task to save the babies you have a gas button that, when pressed, stops all the babies in their tracks while leaving your nurse free to move around.

The game has three levels of difficulty. The easy or 'No Problem'' level starts on ward 8, the intermediate or 'Problem!' level starts at ward 16, and the hard or 'Fat Chance' level starts at ward 24.

name: Massive Cleavage vs Zombies
summary: It's a zombie apocalypse horror story, told through arcade style fighting, and cut scenes. Your character wanders the city in search of supplies for her people, using only her massive cleaver. Every place she goes she leaves behind piles filled with hundreds zombie corpses.

name: Mauled
summary: Mauled is a first-person survival horror game where players are stuck in an endless loop of death trying to escape a horrific late-night shopper...

name: Magic Bean
summary: This is the ultimate test of skill and determination: Magic Bean , an intense platformer. So, are you up for the challenge ?

name: Macabre Ring 2: Mysterious Puppeteer
summary: The Macabre Ring case has been reopened, this time with a menacing twist. Can you solve the mystery?

name: Madden NFL 09
summary: Mobile port of Madden NFL 09.

name: Mabeop Cheonjamun DS 2: The Final Hanja Magic
Marvellous Journeys Bundle
summary:
This bundle includes three amazing adventure games from Artifex Mundi:

Modern Tales: Age of Invention
Eventide 2: The Sorcerers Mirror
Persian Nights: Sands of Wonders

name: Madden NFL 08
summary: Old-gen port of Madden NFL 08.

name: Magi
summary: Magi is a challenging game of wizard duels, mixing strategy and RPG elements with the dynamism and immediacy of fighting games.

name: Matrixed Reality
summary: A modification of Max Payne that recreates scenes from the first three Matrix films.

name: Marvel Pinball: Epic Collection Vol. 1
summary:
Includes several tables available to play: Spider-Man, Doctor Strange, Iron Man, Blade, Marvel's The Avengers, World War Hulk, Civil War, Marvel's Ant-Man, Venom and Fear Itself
Realistic pinball simulation featuring table designs based on immensely popular Marvel IPs. The player uses mechanical flippers to keep a ball in play.
Single player mode is the well known pinball gameplay, with game mode completion and asynchronous high score competition via Leaderboards being the primary goals.
Local Hot seat mimics the multiplayer feature found in real pinball tables, in which up to four players take turns, each one playing until a ball is lost.
Local split-screen allows players to play simultaneously, with a time or score limit ending the game

name: Mayhem ZX
summary: SMASH and BLAST your way through your enemies in this excitingly fast paced Multiplayer Run-N-Gun Action Platformer! With a full 360 Degree Firing Radius you'll be able to Run, Skid, Slide and Wall Jump around the environment all while OBLITERATING the competition!

name: Maze: A VR Adventure
summary: Maze: A VR Adventure is a roguelite horror game. Lose yourself into the darkness of a procedurally generated maze. Rely on your sense of direction and your magical skills to get out alive. Two types of locomotion systems available to meet the player's needs. HTC Vive or Oculus Rift are required.

name: Mamono Sweeper
summary: RPG-inspired Minesweeper variant. Available to play on web browsers. Previously available on the App Store and Google Play, but has been delisted.

name: Mailbag for a Tattered Nation
summary: An interactive poem.

name: Marsh
summary: Face-off against wacky, cartoony, brought to life objects in this 2D platforming shooter! Challenge your cute squishy self to get the highest of scores, up the difficulties and find the many secrets.

name: Magic Bubble
summary: A component albeit very blatant clone of Bust-a-Move aka Puzzle Bobble. There is also a version labeled the "Adult Version" which features images of naked women in the background, completely uncensored. Groovy.

name: Mars Parking Simulator

name: Maze Break
summary: A combination of maze and brick breaking game.

name: Mafia II DLC: War Hero Pack
summary: The 40s wouldn‚Äôt be complete without a war hero. Vito plays the role well in the War Hero DLC pack. Drive 2 military style vehicles and notice the superior handling in all weather conditions. Vito looks sharp in 2 new military inspired suits, including a full uniform and fatigues.

name: Mario Kart Arcade GP 2
summary: Mario Kart Arcade GP 2 is the second game of the exclusive Mario Kart series for arcades by Namco, which runs on the Triforce system.

name: Mafia II DLC: Made Man Pack
summary:
The Made Man Pack offers two new "Made Man" suits for Vito to wear and two new cars. Get a taste of being a Made Man in this exclusive Collector's Edition pack. Feel the difference of a luxury automobile as you drive two classics, modeled after cars from the period featuring bold design and dynamic performance. Vito will look the part in two new suits including a red carpet worthy tux.

The cars included in the pack are the Cossack and the Roller GL300. The suits are the Made Man suit with sunglasses and the Tuxedo with bow tie. Both outfits come in five color combinations.

name: Mad Taxi
summary: MAD TAXI is a top-view game that will test your reaction and concentration. You are driving a mad taxi driver in a drunken state. Enjoy!

name: Masters of Puzzle: Halloween Edition - Chess on Halloween Eve
summary: A special edition puzzle box in the traditional art for the Masters of Puzzle game.

name: Match In Peace
summary: In this terrifying, genre-busting strategy game, find and match monster pairs to unleash their terror on your enemies. Battle in PvP, conquer the Tower and Roguelike modes and find alchemy components to craft new powerful monsters. Can you keep your calm under pressure and Match In Peace?

name: Marry a Deep One
summary: Establish your bloodline, lead a sinister cult and manage an isolated seaside village, where aquatic monsters crossbreed with humans. Use social manipulation and occult magic to slow down the inevitable descent into a spiral of madness.

name: Mars Wars
summary: Mars Wars is a top-down shooter game, where you have to defend your base from aliens on Mars. You control a rover with different weapons that you can use to kill the aliens.

name: Mafia Reigns: Power And Blood
summary:
Dominate the underworld in this immersive strategic card game as a mafia boss!
Dive into the thrilling world of organized crime in a role-playing card-style game, where you ascend to the pinnacle of the criminal underworld, experiencing fate as a mafia boss or other key characters. Discover unique criminal sagas across different eras in America and beyond.

name: Master of Orion: Retro Fleets

name: Master of Wills

Craft Faction card decks from a collection of characters and powers to outplay opponents. Choose a side and become the Master of Wills!

name: Mahjong Quest Collection
summary: Includes the first three installments of Mahjong Quest, the epic tale of tile matchmaking!

name: Master of Rogues - The Seven Artifacts
summary: Dungeon-Crawler, Roguelike-like RPG

name: Maze Domination
summary: A fast-paced maze game where strategy and speed are key. Control unique robots through intricate mazes, collecting figurines across diverse biomes. Manage energy, avoid or kill enemies, and compete on leaderboards.

name: Mad Skills BMX 2
summary: Mad Skills BMX 2 is the latest side-scrolling BMX game from Turborilla

name: Matthias Sammer Soccer
summary: Matthias Sammer Soccer is a soccer game made for Germany. The game features a field spread North to South where your player moves North and the opponent moves the ball South. The game was released in Germany in 1997.

name: Maya the Bee: Garden Adventures
summary: This game uses the license from the famous German TV series Biene Maja. Maja's best friend Willi is kidnapped by the hornets, the enemies of the bees. In this game you are playing Maja the bee and has to free Willi. In this adventure you have to solve some puzzles, finding things to get further. Inside the hornets nest you have to hide and seek to not get caught.

name: Manyland
summary: Welcome to Manyland, an open universe we invent and live together! In an infinite world of abundance, we create new things by drawing them, build new places, hang out and chat, collect, make music, party, script objects, go on adventures... and have fun together in ways none of us can predict.

name: Math Ninja HD
summary:
Use your math skills to defend your treehouse against a hungry tomato and his robotic army in this fun action packed game! Choose between ninja stars, smoke bombs, or ninja magic - and choose your upgrades wisely! 

 * Works on your iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad - buy once, works everywhere!
 * Action-packed strategy in the castle defense genre!
 * The primary goal is to have fun - but you'll also greatly improve your Math skills along the way!
 * Choose your weapons - from ninja stars to fire magic - and upgrade their power along the way!
 * Humorous story starring the ever-hungry Tomato-San, who is building a robotic army to steal your tasty math treasure!
 * Math options are fully customizable - disable/enable operations, or even toggle number ranges to practice!
 * Great for all age groups, from 7-99.

Say goodbye to boring flash cards - and hello to Math Ninja!  

***** "Cat-bots? Giant tomatoes? This is a job for Math Ninja!" --whatsoniphone.com
***** "My seven year old daughter is thoroughly enjoying the Math Ninja app. It combines an arcade style game with math practice and it does it in a way that's a lot of fun." --theiphonemom.com
***** "Math Ninja does a great job of balancing video game play with testing math skills into a cute and fun application." --geardiary.com

We love to hear from you! Drop us a note anytime at razeware.com.

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: Dreamy Depths
summary: Unique Puzzles Not Found Anywhere Else. These 33 detailed stained Underwater Landscapes will immerse you in a world where the intricate beauty of Dreamy Depths comes to life.

name: Man Vs. Missiles
summary: Evade enemy Jets and fly your plane as long as you can before getting shot down!

name: Mario's Cement Factory
summary: Mario's Cement Factory is a Game & Watch game. Two versions of the game were produced: the first was for the Game & Watch Table Top and the second was a more conventional New Wide Screen Game & Watch. In both versions, Mario's mission in the cement factory is to open doors to prevent cement containers from overflowing. To get to the different containers, Mario has to jump onto moving platforms. The game was remade as a downloadable DSiWare title.

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: Welcome to Slumberland
summary: Discover the beauty, mystery, and magic. With 42 pictures, immerse yourself in the whimsical and fantastical world of Slumberland. Are you ready to enter the world of dreams? Start your adventure today and let your imagination soar.

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: Canvas of Time
summary: Step into the past with Canvas of Time, where every puzzle holds a piece of the history. Enjoy 39 gorgeous puzzles.

name: Mario Kart 64: Mega Mushroom Blast
summary: A challenging mod that implements RPG elements, level system and a lot of features

name: Magic Flight Academy
summary: MUST HAVE for VR arcade centers. Perfect for the first-time experience. Join the MFA and take a walk on a plank hundreds of meters above the ground, fly an enchanted broomstick around the ancient magical academy, cast spells with a magic wand and fight a fire-breathing dragon!

name: Mai-Otome: Otome Butou Shi
summary: A fighting game based on the My-Hime/My-Otome anime series.

name: Maledictor
summary: Classic, dark ambience in a bloody and difficult retro FPS. Fight cultists and demons who are as dangerous as you in your fight against the Maledictor.

name: Mail Rabbit
summary: A game developed for Global Game Jam 2021

name: Marine Wars
summary: The game has four scenes: fighting ships at day, fighting ships by night, fighting planes and ships by day, fighting planes and ships by night. You move left or right and press the button to fire. In the night scenes, you cannot see the ships or planes in the distance unless something explodes.

name: Maracaibo Digital
summary:
Play as an adventurer and sail around the Caribbean! Upgrade your ship, complete quests, and engage in combat. Every card you buy will unlock new abilities and bonuses to outwit your opponents.
The board changes every round, and your strategy will have to keep up. Will you play slowly, buying as many cards as you can? Or will you race to the final space to catch your opponents by surprise?

name: Math Rescue: Rounding and Estimation game
Magical Diary: Secrets Sharing
summary: Write your Diary with this amazing software for Nintendo DSi and Nintendo 3DS!

name: Magenta Arcade
summary:
The cycle of wishes is a sacred ritual for the people! It is where you give out wishes for them. During many cycles peace reigned in your lands, but everything changed when Ivo Magenta made his last wish. Now, disaster emerges, and you have to sleep until the next cycle. When you wake up, everything depends on you!

Use your finger to shoot him and his minions down with weaponized wishes, the world's order is now in your hands! Literally! Magenta Arcade is a finger-based top-down shooter. In other words, it is a top-down 2D shooter where your "ship" is your finger. Know when to touch the screen to attack or retract and hide to defend yourself!

name: Maze Quest Master: Cyclist
summary: "Embark on a thrilling journey in 'Maze Quest Master - Cyclist.' Conquer intricate mazes, collect coins, and master wall-bound movement. Become the ultimate maze explorer!"

name: Mansions of Madness: Altered Fates
summary: Lady Helena, the woman who hired you, is abducted through a polychromatic portal before your eyes! With the portal closing and only moments to act, you must decide who will follow into the unknown. Will you be able to work together even while torn apart?

name: Match Day II
summary:
Match Day is a soccer simulator in which each team is made up of 7 players (6 field players and the goalkeeper)6 and the goals appeared one on each side of the screen, having to scroll to reach them (side view).

It included new game modes as well as the popular level bar whose content controlled the power of the shot. The game had the possibility of performing different moves such as headers, crosses and heels; all of them responding quickly to the movements of the controls, which together with its graphic speed and meticulous design of the elements - players, court, public, ball; it was a great revolution in the world of the simulators of the time.

name: Maze Game
summary: Maze Game challenges players to build the strongest maze they can, to see who can keep the ball on the board for longest.

name: Mainbody
summary: A puzzle-based horror game where the player takes on the role of a building manager who manages a haunted building and its "patients". Through the player's different options will raise or lower the pollution value, thus triggering different endings.

name: Magicka: Wizards of the Square Tablet
summary:
The once wandering wizards have found their way back home in Magicka - Wizards of the Square Tablet, now available for PC. Experience the mobile hit on your squarish and almost certainly, stationary monitor. But fret not, if any wizards still happen to be wandering you can still accidently kill them with cross platform support across all devices.

From the publisher that brought you Magicka, it‚Äôs more Magicka! Wizards of the Square Tablet features the innovative and dynamic spell casting system from the original PC hit. Experience a brand new campaign set prior to the original tale of Magicka.

Adventure through the new campaign by yourself, or ‚Äúaccidentally‚Äù obliterate your friends in multiplayer co-op, which supports up to four players! Play together with fellow mages across multiple platforms, which may co-exist in the same game session thanks to a twisted union made possible by dark sorcery!

Cast your spells across multiple levels, and unlock new powers unique to Magicka ‚Äì Wizards of the Square Tablet. Experience the humor and chaos of this satirical fantasy world. And exclusively for the PC version your wizard will get all in-game Robes and Staffs for free in this enhanced square edition, and all your gear carry over to other platforms!

name: M.A.S.H.
summary: M.A.S.H. is a digital fortune-telling game for iOS devices where players answer customizable questions about their future, including potential spouses, living situations, and life outcomes. Players can either input their own answers or select from pre-populated random options, with results calculated through a spiral-based selection mechanism. The game features solo and multiplayer modes, email and save functionality for results, and includes humorous preset answers referencing pop culture figures and vehicles. The gameplay centers on the classic childhood prediction game format, offering entertainment through unexpected and often comedic future scenarios.

name: Mahjong Taisen
summary: Mahjong Taisen is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Nihon Bussan and published by Nichibutsu, which was released in Japan in 1992.

name: Mappy Arrangement
summary: A remake of Mappy, released in Namco Classic Collection Vol. 1.

name: Madness Interactive
summary: Madness Interactive is a game based on the Newgrounds animation series "Madness Combat"

name: Mario Party Superstars: Mario's Rainbow Castle + Luigi's Engine Room
Magician's Gambit
summary: Chess! Magic! VR! Play this age-old Game of Kings against the best strategic mind in the Kingdom - a master tactician and chess paragon unlike any other. Word is he has never been defeated... Will you rise to the challenge?

name: MagMax
summary:
A horizontal scrolling shooter, players control the title hover ship in an attempt to completely construct the ship into a giant robot and to destroy any enemies attempting to stop it.

The three-headed mechanical dragon found as a boss character in the game, known as Babylon, strongly resembles Mecha-King Ghidorah from the Godzilla franchise.

name: Magma Fever
summary: "Magma Fever" is a 2D pixel-style mining action-adventure game. You will pilot a mech and dig into an underground volcanic world. Complete missions and confront enemies in various environment, overcome disasters like earthquakes and lava surges, bring back ores to upgrade your mech at the base.

name: Maltese Cross
summary: A domino simulator game for BBC Microcomputer System.

name: Mailbag Mayhem
summary: A remake of the Atari 2600 game Keystone Kapers and tribute to the late Ryan Davis of Giantbomb.com

name: Magic Fluids
summary: Click the screen and experience an amazing, lifelike simulator of fluid physics that you can interact and play with. Gorgeous visual effects give a out of this world feel. Experiment with infinite configurations, find the perfect one and create beautiful images or just sit back and enjoy the view!

name: Maze Workout: Western Lost Solo Car Racer
summary: It's a retro western styled, maze racing game with 50 levels and 30 western style musics, find the checkpoints and laps to the next level.

name: Mad Crasher
summary:
A diagonal driving/shooting 'em up game.

This was SNK's first 3-D Isometric game.

name: Maraka
summary: Maraka is an action dungeon-crawler that features physics based combat. Delve into a procedurally generated cave system on an alien planet. Harness the power of magnets and the environment to wield as your weapon: defeat opponents by physically manipulating objects and the enemy itself.

name: Magic Crystals
summary: "Magic Crystals" is a fun tower defense game with very unique mechanics - during the game you need to move crystals to the best places for the best defense. Don't forget to upgrade your crystals because enemies are stronger with every new wave!

name: Master Chu and the Drunkard Hu
summary: Return to a mythical time in the Far East, when the legendary Siamese-Twin Shiva, God of Destruction, cursed your village with fearsome evil spirits. Despaired by repeated failures to drive out Shiva's evil demons, your best friend, Master Hu, has turned into a drunkard. You, Master Chu, must search through hostile palaces and temples to find and destroy this four-armed incarnation of Shiva. If you would like, just ask your teammate, the Drunkard Hu, to help out. Playing together can be a lot of fun!

name: Maru
summary: A complete a mess. Waking up in a very interesting morning, Maru finds himself in a mysterious adventure with his best friend Lei before he even knows what happened. Maru will find the answers to all the questions he cannot make sense with Lei on this journey.

name: Match Masters
summary: Match Masters is a competitive Match-3 puzzle game. It combines skill, luck and innovative game elements to create a unique player experience.

name: Marble Monster
summary: A series of spatial logic puzzles based on moving a marble.

name: Masters of Puzzle: Halloween Edition - Sing Me a Pumpkin
summary: A special edition puzzle box in the traditional art for the Masters of Puzzle game.

name: Match 3 Fantasy
summary: A love-letter to classic turn-based RPGs with match 3 puzzle combat and point-&-click gameplay. Travel the globe, battle enemies, and save the world!

name: Make It In Time
summary: Third Person Shooter with some RPG Elements.. and Space...

name: Magic Carpet 1001
summary: Magic Carpet 1001 is an unlicensed Action game, developed by MegaSoft and published by Gluk, which was released in Europe in 1991.

name: Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite - Winter Soldier
summary: Adds Winter Soldier as a playable character on your Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite team. Includes additional Premium Costume for Winter Soldier. Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite required; not included.

name: Mazes of Karradash 2
summary:
The city of Karradash is once again threatened by evil forces: fight the demons using dozens of adventurers with different skills, explore 20 huge levels and save the city.

The first person dungeon crawl RPG (inspired by classic games from the 90s) is back! In "Mazes of Karradash 2" you can develop your character, find supplies, build more facilities in the village and create hundred of different adventurers.

The game's character creation has 8 races and 10 classes to unlock, with their own special skills and attributes. It is a permadeath game so your character is lost forever on death but another stronger adventurer from Karradash will be ready to replace them and continue exploring the 20 huge dungeons. Improve facilities in the city to unlock new items and new options, to upgrade equipment, and to enhance future generations of adventurers. Dozens of weapons, armors, helms, rings, shields and talismans available.

New features include the options to choose a trait for your character, hire a mercenary, build your own special skill and increase the difficulty level to gain more XP and gold.

No pay-to-win and no in-app-purchase of gold, diamonds, better equipment or other stuff: complete the game using your own skills, not your credit card. Old school.

name: Man of Steel
summary: Official mobile game based on the 2013 blockbuster film.

name: Make Sail
summary: ÔªøMake boats and sail them. Survive an ocean of storms and beasts to find better pieces to make your ship bigger, faster stronger, prettier, stranger, wilder: more yours.

name: Master of Squad
summary: A new strategy game that will make you discover your inner strategist.

name: Master Arena: Orange Neon Bundle
summary: Explore the "ORANGE NEON" bundle featuring 10 dazzling skins. Dive into a futuristic urban aesthetic and be captivated by the glow of neon lights.

name: Master Arena: Phantom Edition Bundle
summary: Introducing the "PHANTOM EDITION" bundle: 10 flashy and attention-grabbing skins guaranteed to make you stand out on every arena. Command attention with bold style.

name: Magritte
summary: Magritte is an indie adventure game in which the player has to discover the Polish city of Wroc≈Çaw that happens to look like Ren√© Magritte's surrealistic paintings.

name: Magical Chase
summary: Ripple is a student of magic, and her teacher is a terrifying witch. Ripple is particularly afraid of her teacher right now, because she's just broken a promise she made to the witch: Ripple took a peek inside the forbidden book Sleeping Demons! No sooner had she opened the cover then out jumped six demons, all of which raced away! Unless she can catch all six demons and get them back inside the book, the witch will turn Ripple into a frog for breaking her promise! So Ripple sets off on her quest with her two Elf-Star friends, Topsy and Turvy. Good luck, Ripple!

name: Make Them Stop
summary: This time it's too much! Make Them Stop is a game where you must manage the organization of a strike by blocking vehicles. Choose your cause, get organized, and make your voice heard. Be careful not to get run over!

name: Madness Inside
summary: "Madness Inside"" immerses you in the dark depths of an abandoned psychiatric hospital, where horrifying experiments were once conducted. Police Lieutenant Vic Voight, in pursuit of a dangerous criminal, unexpectedly finds himself trapped in this nightmarish place.

name: Makato: Your Fantasy Shop
summary: Build your own medieval fantasy shop and sell armor, weapons, potions and more to earn money. Send out adventurers to gather goods and combine them to create more powerful and more valuable goods.

name: Man on the Moon
summary:
"Man on the Moon" is a boom compatible map that was designed in about a year (on and off, give or take a few more more months) and it is a rather large map.
It serves as a sequel to my previously released "Travelling to the Moon" and, this time, well as the title suggests, it actually takes place on the moon (at least some moon). It has more of a focus on set pieces and incidental combat rather than a succesion of arena fights.

name: Man of Sterling Quality
summary: Son: Father, what is the nature of masculinity? Father: That is a most excellent question my son. Most worthy of contemplation.

name: Mario Heardle 2
summary:
A 2nd Mario Heardle that ran concurrently with the first, featuring different songs.
It ended on May 14th, 2023.

name: Marching Band Simulator
summary: Create marching band shows just like the pros do! Marching Band Simulator is like having drill writing software right on your phone! Create whatever you can imagine, control everything from the dots to the uniform, and share your shows easily to be judged by other designers! So what are you waiting for, we have a championship to win!

name: Madout Big City
summary: Combat race in open world. Destroy opponents. Feel the dynamic chases and fighting battles. Enjoy the good physics of cars. You can choose from more than 30 cars

name: Magic vs Zombies
summary: Simple game of shooting magic projectiles to kill zombies and level up to get stronger and kill more zombies.

name: Magic Rampage
summary: Action RPG

name: Magia X
summary: The Real Fantasy 2D Action, Magia X. Splendid actions beyond the limits of 2D, unique characters, breathtaking adventures, and warm pastel-colored world awaits you. Stimulate your action urges.

name: Malfortune
summary: A twin-stick shooter where your actions have consequences. Engage in blood-pumping boss fights, soothing casual puzzles, and chats with quirky locals. This planet's fate lies in your capable, albeit confused, hands.

name: Mario Kart RiiBalanced
summary: Mario Kart RiiBalanced is a mod for Mario Kart Wii that balances the states of very vehicle, character, modifies item probability, harder CPUs, edits textures and music, adds Toad Circuit from Mario Kart 7 and changes to the existing tracks to make the game more evenly balanced.

name: Magic Cats
summary: Dozens of levels to beat are sure to keep you entertained for days. Can you clear all the challenging puzzles of Magic Cats? Give it a try!

name: Marvel Ultimate Alliance Gold
summary:
Marvel: Ultimate Alliance is an action role-playing game developed for PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3, Xbox and Xbox 360 by Raven Software and published by Activision. The game was simultaneously ported to the PlayStation Portable and Wii by Vicarious Visions, and to Microsoft Windows by Beenox. A significantly different Game Boy Advance version was also created, developed by Barking Lizards Technologies. The game was initially released on October 24, 2006 in North America for most platforms, with PlayStation 3 and Wii ports following shortly thereafter, as well as international releases. Japan was only able to see a Wii and PS3 release.

Marvel Ultimate Alliance is set within the fictional Marvel Universe and features many of the superheroes, supervillains, and supporting characters that appear in publications by Marvel Comics. Ultimate Alliance is the third Marvel title to be developed by Raven Software, and features similar gameplay to their previous Marvel titles, X-Men Legends and X-Men Legends II: Rise of Apocalypse. A sequel, Marvel: Ultimate Alliance 2, was developed for multiple platforms by Vicarious Visions, n-Space and Savage Entertainment and released in 2009.

name: MagForce Racing
summary:
If you need an adrenaline rush, MagForce Racing might be just your thing: Step into your magnetic glider and race through lots of roller-coaster like tracks full of curves and loops, psyched up by pumping techno beats.

There are of course power-ups scattered on the track that may be picked up, including weapon systems to get rid of your enemies.

Similar to Wipeout, this is a game for speed freaks.

name: Magical Girl Pretty Samy Part 2: In the Julyhelm
summary: A visual novel based on the Magical Girl Pretty Sammy series.

name: Mach Breakers
summary: Mach Breakers: Numan Athletics 2 is a sports arcade game that was released by Namco in 1994 only in Japan; it runs on Namco NB-2 hardware and is the sequel to Numan Athletics, which was released in the previous year.

name: Magical Houshin
summary: In Mystic Heroes, it's up to you to find hidden Runes that will help you defeat an enemy army. As one of four main characters, you'll battle through Mt. Hoshin, Mt. Senkai, and The City of the Ancients. In each stage, you must equip your Runes strategically in order to defeat powerful enemies and bosses. The more Runes you gather, the more spells you unlock and levels you advance. There are 70 total Runes hidden throughout the single-player missions and multiplayer modes.

name: Mario and the Mystic Purple Stars
summary: Mario and the Mystic Purple Stars is a Major Rom Hack of Super Mario 64 with 115 stars.

name: Marica: Shinjitsu no Sekai
summary: Japan-exclusive RPG released in 1997 for the Sega Saturn.

name: Madness
summary: Madness is a single-screen platformer that puts you up against robots, snakes, and... Pac-Man?

name: Martial Story
summary: "Martial Story" - a 2D platformer runner with classic game mechanics: run on platforms, dodge enemies, throw swords, balance in free fall, test your reaction against hundreds of enemies, train your accuracy in jumping in caves.

name: Maxix Robotics
summary: Survive the night in this Survival Horror environment as you navigate a Historic Robotics Facility by solving puzzles in various wings of the factory. By utilizing a Robotic companion called 'DOTT' you can open doors, activate terminals and more... Just make sure to look behind you.

name: Madden NFL 2005
summary: Tapwave Zodiac port of Madden NFL 2005.

name: Masked Forces 2: Mystic Demons
summary: Are you ready to explore the underworld and kill hundreds of monsters and demons in the process?

name: Macross Ace Frontier
summary:
This game is based in the Macross franchise. Although the game is named after Macross Frontier, all current Macross series (with the exception of Macross II: Lovers Again) are included. Players create two pilots (a main pilot and a wingman) and fight in the many memorable battles of the Macross timeline.
The developers, Artdink, are also known for the Gundam Battle PSP series. Macross Ace Frontier uses a slightly modified version of the Gundam Battle engine, and therefore has many notable similarities to Gundam Battle Universe.

name: Make-Up and Style
summary: It's a make-up game for the DSi.

name: Magic Clouds
summary: Magic Clouds - pixel puzzle, in which all the puzzles fly in the clouds.

name: Magnetic Projectiles
summary: Aim and shoot magnetic projectiles at your objective!

name: Mario Party Kuru-kuru! Carnival
summary: Mario Party Kuru-kuru! Carnival, is an arcade game based on Mario Party 8 that was developed by Capcom. The game was released exclusively in Japan in 2012, and supports up to four players. It is the fourth Mario Party arcade game developed by Capcom and the seventeenth installment overall.

name: Magic Book Auto Battler
summary: Magicbook AutoBattler is a non-traditional strategy game that combines Roguelite moves. This game has unique binding combinations, rich weapons and equipment, cool magical effects, and thrilling combat scenes. In the world of magic books, you will face endless challenges and rewards‚Ä¶‚Ä¶

name: Mahjong Kyoushitsu
summary: Mahjong Kyoushitsu is an early mahjong arcade game.

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Long Live the Empress II: Dragon Master
summary:
Long Live the Empress S2: Dragon Master is an original maybe series.
Long Live the Empress S2: Dragon Master is the second book of the Long Live the Empress series.

name: Make a Killing
summary: Make a Killing is a first-person single-player survival horror game. You play as Cole, a man that travels to unhallowed grounds in hopes of saving his brother Jace, only to be ensnared in a game of cat and mouse with a century old mass murderer.

name: Manuganu 2
summary: Manuganu is back with lots of action and brand new features for new adventures. Help him in his quest to rescue his best friend. Manuganu-2 is a 3D side- scroller running game, in which you control the boy ‚ÄúManuganu‚Äù.

name: Madou Monogatari: Tower of the Magician
summary: Madou Monogatari: Tower of the Magician is a first-person dungeon-crawler developed by Compile. It was first released on September 6, 1997 for Microsoft Windows 95 through Disc Station Vol. 16. Unlike most Madou Monogatari games which follow Arle, this game follows Schezo Wegey and his quest for power as he ascends Wish's tower.

name: Maize Mace Maze
summary: Dig, grow and harvest plants in your ever-expanding underground maze. Command squads of veggies, plant defensive fruits and upgrade your perishables to better protect against the next onslaught of vicious pests!

name: Maths Circus Act 5
summary: A mathematics-focused game designed for classroom use. It is considered an extended version of the now obsolete Maths Circus Act 2.

name: Mailman
summary: "Mailman" is a 2D old-school top down arcade game ported to PC. It puts you in the role of a postman who has to deliver all the letters to the mailboxes.

name: Maths Challenge
summary: Maths Challenge is a very simple indie game, you will have to face mathematical challenges against the clock.

name: Max Raider
summary: Max Raider is a top-down 3D action shooter where you fight waves of enemies on procedurally generated arenas. Rest and prepare for the next series of waves by buying a variety of weapons and items from your allies. Protect the Bunker, your only hope for a home.

name: Magic City Detective: Wrath of the Ocean DLC
summary: Who says an impending tsunami isn't a good case for a detective? The Siren King didn't think much of the humans, and now that one of them has made his daughter disappear... How will you solve this problem?

name: Maginary
summary:
Maginary is the unique fiction novel where your are one of the main characters. It connects our real world with the world of your imagination through the iPhone.

Michael Sterry ‚Äî the previous reader of this book ‚Äî woke up in a strange, far distant land called Anzo. The only thing he's got is the medallion which somehow broadcasts everything into your imagination. You will need to use your brains, your hands and even your legs to help Michael survive in Anzo and get him back into our real world...

name: Magic Tiles 3
summary: A rhythm-based mobile game where players tap black tiles in synchronization with the music.

name: Matrix World
summary: Welcome to the captivating world inspired by the iconic movie "The Matrix." Here, you'll find a unique blend of freedom and diversity in a virtual city that has become a symbol of this fantastic universe.

name: Madtale
summary: Madtale is a time-saving and strategic idle RPG with a dark fairytale theme. Embark on the enchanted adventure with Little Red Riding Hood.

name: Maimai DX Buddies Plus
summary:
Maimai DX Buddies Plus is an upgraded version of Maimai DX Buddies for arcade.

General Information / Changes
maimile shop & Weekly Mission introduced. Completing Weekly Missions will reward you maimile, which can be used for items in the maimile shop.
- This makes maimai BUDDiES PLUS the first game in the series to use the maimile currency since ORANGE PLUS.
- maimile shop can be used inside maimai„Åß„Çâ„Å£„Åè„ÅôNET.

New progress tickets introduced that can be purchased at the maimile shop:
- Weekly Area progress 2x ticket („Ç¶„Ç£„Éº„ÇØ„É™„Éº„Å°„Åª„ÉºÈÄ≤Ë°å2ÂÄç„ÉÅ„Ç±„ÉÉ„Éà), which doubles the distance multiplier on the Area. Only one ticket can be purchased/owned a week.
- Tour Member level up 5x ticket („Å§„ÅÇ„É°„É≥„É¨„Éô„É´„Ç¢„ÉÉ„Éó5ÂÄç„ÉÅ„Ç±„ÉÉ„Éà), which quintuples the level up rate of tour members.

Favorites can now be chosen for songs on the song results screen by pressing a button. Up to 30 songs can be added.
- This function can only be used on songs you have unlocked.

Album page now shows the location where the picture is taken, a save button, and also a disclaimer of the photo.

Favorite and random selection functions have been added to Collections. Up to 30 of each type of Collection item can be saved as favorites.

When playing with someone who's not your friend on the same cabinet, a friend registration screen will be displayed after the name entry screen. If you select "yes", you will instantly become friends. This feature on the website is called friends on the spot („Åù„ÅÆÂ†¥„Åß„Éï„É¨„É≥„Éâ).
- This will not display if either player has set their settings to skip friend registration.

When performing a rating color change effect, the effect screen will be retained until a certain amount of time passes, or until the "Skip" button is pressed.

By touching the rival score display area, you can temporarily hide your rival's score.

English notation added to various UI.

name: March on Oz
summary: March on Oz is a RTS style Road Defence game where you need to rescue Princess Ozma from RuggeDoh and the Evil Alliance

name: Maestro: Dark Talent - Collector's Edition
summary: Diva's dark talent claims another victim ‚Äì can you stop her before the curtain falls?

name: May's Perfect Romance
summary: This is a 3rd person dating simulator about a girl decided to piece together the perfect guy do it yourself. To do this she needs to enter trust in six guys like them and then kill them and choose the most beautiful part of their bodies.

name: Mahjong: Wolf's Stories
summary: Mahjong - Wolf's Stories couples great gameplay with a moving story. Solve your way through hundreds of levels. Explore the forest and help the wolf find his cub. Play in timed mode for an extra challenge, or relaxed mode to sit back and enjoy the journey. Rescue a wolf cub and save the day in the heart-warming story of Mahjong - Wolf's Stories.

name: Match Venture HD
summary: Match Venture is an extraordinary memory matching game with cute and vivid graphics, unique and creative game play, and funny and challenging levels. It will not only bring you plenty of fun, but also improve your memory and concentration ability. This game is a great way to train your child's brain and help older people improve their memory ability. It is actually designed for the entire family and suitable for all ages! All of your family members will enjoy themselves when playing this game.

name: Masters & Heroes
summary:
Masters & Heroes is a new mobile strategy RPG. Lead your town to prosperity, build a strong squad, follow the captivating story, and fight other players.
To win, you‚Äôll need to be smart about growing your army and choose where to put your resources and time carefully ‚Äî instead of looking for your wallet. Your battles will be automatic, but the outcome will depend on your tactical decisions: choose the right gear, find the best position for your warriors, and use your items and buffs on time.

name: Match Hit: Puzzle Fighter
summary: Street fighting with street food!

name: Mars Flight VR
summary: Mars Flight VR is a helicopter simulator that lets you explore real location on Mars. Take control of the JPL Mars Helicopter Scout, a real helicopter designed to fly in the thin Martian atmosphere.

name: Mafiaens Hevn
summary: A norwegian browser based MMORPG with a mafia theme that focuses on strategy and teamplay.

name: Mars: The New Eden
summary: End of the 21st century. New technologies allowed the realization of a great dream of humanity: the colonization of the red planet. However, something went wrong, which could compromise the viability of this project. Embark on this adventure guiding our hero Rick and unravel the mysteries of Mars.

name: Mahjong 3D: Warriors of the Emperor
summary: The world famous board game in real 3D: for the greatest Mahjong experience of all time!

name: Mantra
summary: A real-time RPG.

name: Mad Dog II: The Lost Gold
summary: The sequel to American Laser Game's original Mad Dog McCree, with pretty much the same gameplay and motion capture graphics. This PC conversion seems to have been tweaked a bit to be more stable than the original Mad Dog. There's also somewhat limited replay value as you can choose from 3 different guides for 3 different routes through the game.

name: Magic League
summary: Get ready for magic clash. Collect spells, create your perfect deck, summon creatures and lead your heroes to the victory!

name: Macho Mouse
summary: Macho Mouse is an arcade game which was released by Techstar in 1982; it runs on the hardware first used by Amenip and Centuri for Round-Up (two Zilog Z80s, running at 3.072 and 2.5 MHz, with two General Instrument AY-3-8910s running at 1.536 MHz for audio). The player must use the four-way joystick, to direct the eponymous "Macho Mouse" around a maze, leaving a trail of dots behind him as he goes (like Pac-Man in reverse), and causing images of his head to appear while avoiding cats that will kill him on contact - but as in Konami's Amidar, Macho Mouse can jump by means of a button and stun the cats for a short period of time. Between rounds, there is a "slot machine" similar to that of Chuo Co., Ltd.'s Funny Mouse (later re-released by Taito Corporation, as "Super Mouse").

name: Marry Me, Misato!
summary: You are the hero, whose only love is Misato decides to marry her. But it's obvious - she is an anime character, how can you marry her then? However, your love is so strong... And you have a plan...

name: Magic Quest: TCG
summary: Magic Quest: TCG is a fantasy themed collectable card game with 11 different classes to choose from, a world to explore with hundreds of Stages, competitive PvP, Dungeons and Raids which you can play solo or with your guildmates.

name: Math Blaster Ages 6-8
summary: Eight absorbing activities with five levels of content introduce addition, subtraction, and sorting of simple and complex number sets. Over 350 lessons and 1,000 problems and puzzles build operations and data skills, while exploration activities build visual and logical thinking skills. Progress reports and printable activities are included.

name: Magic Numbers 2
summary: The sequel to the original Magic Numbers math based puzzle game.

name: Magna Fortuna: The Gargantuan Fate and a Girl of Eternity
summary: A role-playing game from doppelgesicht.

name: Mancopter
summary:
Mancopter is a side view horizontal game where the screen scrolls from right to left when you move, as you control your hero flying a primitive helicopter powered by pedal-power for a race over the ocean. You must fly and pass as many other competitors as you can as you try to get from the start-line to a finish-line a long distance away. To fly your helicopter you keep pressing the fire button to stay airborne and press left to move along the screen. If you stop pressing the fire button then you fall downwards towards the water, if you stop pressing left then your momentum keeps you going until you slowly come to a halt. The race is timed and you start with seventy seconds and this decreases as you race but passing buoys gives you forty extra seconds.

The other competitors fill the skies and you can avoid them or hit the top of their helicopter which sends them into the water but if you are hit from above then you fall into the sea. You are carrying four fish and every time you hit the water then a whale appears and lifts you onto it's head but at the loss of a fish and if you have no more fish when you hit the water then a shark appears and eats you. Pelicans fly in the air from left to right and if they have a fish in their mouth then when hit gives you the fish and you can carry up to eight. Hit a pelican without a fish and it takes one of yours and if you hit one without carrying any then you hit the water and get eaten once again.

Other creatures to avoid are squids, dodos, and storm clouds which release lightning and if you are hit by any then a fish is lost. If you run out of time then a fish is lost but you are given five seconds to try to reach a buoy. Trees make an appearance and you are unable to pass the leaves and branches so you must fly underneath while avoiding hitting the water. During the race, rafts make an appearance and when landed on give you bonus points for time remaining and competitors passed. Hitting a competitor into the water doesn't count as a pass.

name: Maze Breaker
summary: The goal of Maze Breaker is to hit and break all the blocks to clear a level, while avoiding obstacles, and getting the highest score possible.

name: Majin and Sacrificial Girl
summary: A card battle game while exploring dungeons. There are 15 floors in total, and it is cleared after defeating the boss on the bottom floor. There are 17 types of cards. Move with arrow keys and play with mouse clicks.

name: Man in a Maze: Deathmatch
summary: Enter the deadly game show of Man in a Maze and leave with more than your life! Sneak past patrolling robots, avoid deadly traps and fight back with nifty gadgets and weapons. Man in a Maze has elements of puzzle, arcade and stealth ‚Äì plus local multiplayer for 2-4 players.

name: Magia Knabino in the Eternal Night
Malfunction II
summary: Malfunction II is a journey that'll feature vast exploration and difficult obstacles to overcome. Danger burdens the universe like never before as the Plague has overtaken it's creators and shows no sign of diminishment. Your mission is to take control of the Plague and destroy it- once and for all.

name: Married Woman Eilla's NTR RPG: Two Man Cell Journey with Obeying a Douchey Guy
summary: A role-playing game from akadashi no misoshiru.

summary: „ÄäÂ•áËøπÈ¢Ü‰∏ª„ÄãÊòØ‰∏ÄÊ¨æ‰ª•È≠îÂÖΩ‰∏éÂ•áÂπª‰∏∫È¢òÊùêÁöÑÁ≠ñÁï•ÂÖªÊàêÊ∏∏Êàè„ÄÇÁé©ÂÆ∂‰Ωú‰∏∫‰∏ÄÂêçÊåáÊå•ÂÆòÔºåÂüπÂÖªËá™Â∑±ÁöÑÂÜõÈòü„ÄÇÂ∞ùËØïËá™Â∑±ÁöÑÊµÅÊ¥æÂíåÊâìÊ≥ïÔºåÂú®ÂâßÊÉÖÔºåÊé¢Èô©ÔºåÊØîËµõÔºåËµÑÊ∫ê‰∫âÂ§∫Ê®°Âºè‰∏≠Â∞ΩÊÉÖ‰ΩìÈ™åÊó†‰∏é‰º¶ÊØîÁöÑ‰πêË∂£„ÄÇ

name: Machine Gun Gardener
summary: Endless wave shooter

name: Maitre des Fleurs
summary: An online trivia game designed for being simultaneously commentated by a streamer and played by hundreds of players.

name: Master Ninja: Shuriken Killer
summary: Dive into the world of ninjas and prove yourself as the ultimate ninja master in this action-packed game!

name: Mario Artist: Game Maker
summary: Mario Artist: Game Maker was one of the games from the Mario Artist series that ended up cancelled due the Nintendo 64 Disk Drive lackluster sales.

name: Maimai DX Splash Plus
summary: "maimai DX Splash PLUS" is an upgraded version of the arcade music game "maimai DX Splash," which began rolling out on Thursday, March 18, 2021. The new version includes new popular songs, as well as a number of exciting collaborations!

name: Main Character Simulator
summary: Stop sucking, gain protag powers, save the world and experience an alien invasion, young love, and so many exams, in this hilarious comedic visual novel.

name: Mahogen
summary: Mario's ship gets wrecked by some Big Boo's. One thing left to do. Take Revenge!

name: Mall Mayhem
summary: Mall Mayhem is a game with one very simple goal: destroy the mall. How you do it is up to you. In your arsenal is a variety of abilities perfect for the job. Almost every object in every mall can be destroyed so your destructive spree won't end anytime soon. Watch out for shoppers!

name: Magicians Legacy
summary: Magicians Legacy is a classic turn-based fantasy strategy. Defeat countless enemies to solve the mysteries of fading magic and bring life back to the kingdom of dwarves.

name: Magitek VR
summary: Magitek VR is a magic adventure game that uses physics driven spells based on the four elements. Use magic to fight enemies and solve puzzles as you explore the world of Embra.

name: Markov Alg
summary: Markov Alg (short for "Markov Algorithm") is a retro-style puzzle game where you navigate game fields filled with code and instructions, and transform strings of symbols to finally get to your goal.

name: Maze: Subject 360 - Collector's Edition
summary: Here, you have no name. You're simply Subject 360

name: Mass Effect Datapad
summary: Companion Game for Mass Effect 3, released on iOS, it has since been discontinued, but is still available in a browser based version at Bioware's N7 HQ website.

name: Maniyugi Tokoyo
summary: Maniyugi TOKOYO is a Pixel-art shooting game inspired by Japanese Buddhist worldview. The player becomes a priest, goes on a journey round the Rokudo, aims at constant life while accumulating merit.

name: Mask of Sanity
summary: My name is Tom Bailey. It all began with an investigation into the murder of a physician in a local asylum St. Verginy, which was coated with strange rumors.

name: Mask: Beyond Lies
summary: Transported in in another world, a masked person guide you through the day to the exit to go back to your world. But will it really be this easy ? Mask - Beyond is an Otome game that features four love interests.

name: Masters of Puzzle: The Goblin Watermill
summary: A traditional art puzzle box for the Masters of Puzzle game.

name: Massive Decks
summary:
Massive Decks is a free, open source comedy party game based on Cards against Humanity, designed for mobile and desktop.

Play the classic game, or mix things up with house rules like writing your own white cards, and play with custom decks from Many Decks!

name: Mario Artist: Video Jockey Maker
summary: Mario Artist: Video Jockey Maker was one of the games from the Mario Artist series that ended up cancelled due the the Nintendo 64 Disk Drive lackluster sales.

name: Mavis Beacon Teaches Typing Version 17
summary: Seventeenth edition of Mavis Beacon.

name: Mana Spark: Complete Edition
summary: Mana Spark: Complete Edition comes with everything included in the essential version of the game as well as an amazing additional content ‚Äì Forgotten Crypts!

name: Mail Tail
summary: Deliver the mail on a beautiful island. Solve puzzles and fight against creatures from below to reach your destination.

name: Match It!
summary: Simple but fun... how fast can you clear the dome of blocks! Built for VR-only, and it's a great game for people who don't like a lot of motion. Requires two controllers.

name: Marble-O-Tron
summary: Pick from multiple marble packs and 3 difficulty levels! Be warned though the larger the chain you take away the bigger the new dropped marble will be. This game is designed to be relaxing and completely stress free. There are no timers. Just try to end the game with the smallest marbles you can to score the coveted 3 stars The kids love this game too. Its simple enough for even toddlers to pick up and understand.

name: Majesty: The Northern Expansion
summary: Expansion for the original Majesty game on the PC released by Cyberlore studios.

name: Mafia Gangster City
summary: Improve yourself by playing the online Mafia Game,crimes and robberies. Get new weapons and armor. Exercise. And crush your opponents.Help Your Clans Court Friends.Buy Yourself A Nice House.

name: Master of Tactics
summary:
Master of Tactics is a 4X Turn Based Strategy Game. It is non commercial and free to play with no in game sales. It is heavy on strategy and light on micro management. 
Features include: 
- Random Galaxy Generation 
- Custom Craft Design 
- Tactical Battle System 
- Diplomacy (Espionage, Sabotage, Trading) 
- Strategic Resources 
- Deep Technology Tree

name: Marvel Heroes: Android Onslaught
summary: Reactivated with a new array of deadly weapons, the android Ultron plans to conquer Earth and rid the planet of its inferior human race! Help Tony Stark, The Invincible Iron Man, defeat Ultron's legion of rogue robots with his powerful Uni-Beam, then destroy this mechanical menace once and for all!

name: MahJah
summary:
Mahjong-solitaire like matching 3D time killer game.
Find matching cubes. Faster you find matches - more scores you earn.

name: Math puzzles PRO 2
summary: Math puzzles PRO 2 increases your logical thinking.

name: Magic Johnson's Fast Break
summary: DRIVE, PASS, SHOOT, SCORE! Now you can slam dunk like the pros!Magic Johnson's Fast Break is slammin' jammin' basketball action. Play against the computer or an opponent. Up to four players can play simultaneously. Head for the hoop and slam dunk the ball! The better you get the better your salary gets! Simple enough for beginners, challenging enough for pros. Shoot free throws, 3-pointers, execute special plays, and more! Master all five levels of this ultimate basketball contest!

name: Masyu by Nikoli
summary: Masyu by Nikoli contains 50 Masyu puzzles.

name: Math Blaster!
summary: Math Blaster! is the orignal game in the Math Blaster Series. It challenges players to solve math problems through first person and sidescrolling shooting games.

name: Mafia: Sex Noir
summary: Mafia Sex Noir is a visual novel game with Live2D animated sex scenes.

name: Matchy Moods
summary:
Only a few things in this world feel better and more satisfying than completing levels in Matchy Moods. But hey, try it yourself and find out why! You'll get sucked into the adorable world that belongs to these moody tiles. Suitable for every member of your family!
In fact, the cuteness level sometimes hits record levels, so for your safety please keep a positive attitude while playing. Thank you for understanding and wish you a happy journey!

name: Mario Tennis: Power Tour - Reflex Rally
summary:
To promote Mario Tennis: Power Tour, the minigame was remade as an online Flash game that appeared under the name Mario Tennis: Power Tour -- Reflex Rally in the Nintendo Arcade, a section with promotional web games on Nintendo's official website.

From a gameplay standpoint, there are no major differences between the two versions, although the timer in the Flash version starts counting from 30 instead of 60 seconds as in the original minigame. There is also no set score to beat, and the player always controls Clay.

name: Make-A-Chip
summary: Educational game which teaches players how to make basic 8-bit microchips

name: Magneko
summary: Magneko is a casual platform game. in the cute handmade toy world, you can jump or use the magnet magic to move, solve puzzles and collect dried fish to pass the levels. With a simple mouse click, you can use magic and begin your adventure.

name: Marvin the Martian vs. the Earth
Magical Warrior Diamond Heart: Alex Route DLC
summary: An otome game about magical girls and boys! Befriend your teammates, defeat the villainous Nightmare Agency, rescue the princess, and fall in love along the way.

name: Magical Warrior Diamond Heart: Liam Route DLC
summary: An otome game about magical girls and boys! Befriend your teammates, defeat the villainous Nightmare Agency, rescue the princess, and fall in love along the way.

name: MakerKing: Become a Maker King (or Queen)!
summary: Creation meets competition! Make levels and play them online

name: Magic Tower: Tap Defense
summary: Defend the Midgard by building the Magic Tower from the attack of the Hellheim monsters.

name: Maneuver Warfare: CSS Pack
summary: This pack adds a Combat Service Support (CSS) company to your battle group. It has a selection of CSS platoons that increase your ammo resupply rate or the proportion of troops/vehicles that are wounded/damaged as opposed to dead/destroyed - this results in greater reinforcements in campaign games.

name: Maneuver Warfare: Headquarters Pack
summary: This pack adds a Headquarters Company to your battle group. It includes a Commanding Officer, a Headquarters and a selection of units that provide important bonuses or can call upon additional artillery or air support. The HQ Coy is an important force multiplier for your battle group.

name: Maneuver Warfare: Mission Pack South
summary: This DLC is a mission pack that adds 2 countries, 5 operations, 15 battles, and 41 units to the original game. The operations contained in this mission pack can be played alone or mixed together with those from the original game to create a custom Grand Campaign.

name: Magic Summoning Adventure
summary: A strategy and adventure game Use the A and D keys of the keyboard to control the movement of the character, and use the mouse to fire bullets

name: Master Theft TVs
summary: Master Theft TVs is arcade platformer with find and collecting items on levels for a certain time.

name: Machiavelli's Ascent
summary: Machiavelli's Ascent is an XNA Indie Game also released for the iPhone.

name: Maze Man Mania 3D
summary:
Maze Man Mania 3D is the first true 3D game in this genre where you can switch from classic top down view to 3D and even change to FPS view for that extra adrenaline boost!

A powerful level editor allows you to fully customize the game and build your own levels for added enjoyment.

name: Mass Effect 2: Normandy Crash Site
summary: Normandy Crash Site is a DLC pack for Mass Effect 2 that was released with the game's launch. Explore the crash site of the SSV Normandy as Commander Shepard is asked by Alliance Command to explore the site and recover the remains of missing crew members and place a monument on the site. Alliance Command wants Shepard to be the first to walk on the site as Shepard was the vessel's last commanding officer.

name: Matthew: Last Journey
summary: Matthew: Last Journey - is a 3D indie adventure exploration game made in a low poly style. You will explore different locations and learn the story about the boy and his family. You will have a fascinating journey through picturesque places and try to find all the memorable objects.

name: MaguMagu Pro
summary: A baseball game that allows you to easily enjoy the hitting feeling! With super-exquisite 3D graphics and an absolutely smooth feel, meet friends anytime and anywhere to play real-time battles!

name: Marsport
summary:
Marsport is the first (and ultimately only) game in an unfinished trilogy set in the 25th century. Humanity is at war with the Sept alien race, and they are now in a position to invade Earth, as they have the plans for their protective sphere. You play John Marsh, a soldier turned leader who must go to Mars and locate the original plans.

Marsport uses the same game system as Tir Na Nog and Dun Darach, although a 3D effect is incorporated into the graphics. A single path is displayed on screen at a time, and the view is rotated at junctions. The Warriors and Warlords must be shot down using weaponry, making this Gargoyle's most action-driven adventure up to this point.

The Marsport is split into ten distinct sections with their own functions, such as Stores, Administration and Computers. There are robots to interact with, for gaining information or objects. Pairs of objects can be combined to manufacture new ones. A central computer locks out many sections until it can be found and disabled. You will have to shoot the Sept before they can touch you, and also be wary of Warden robots which may malfunction and mistake you for a Sept.

name: Malice: Two Sisters
summary: Help Victoria search for her missing sister, Emily, in Malice: Two Sisters. Emily's last known whereabouts was Urami Island, the boarding school that both sisters attended many years ago. The island is abandoned these days and people whisper that it is cursed as well. Explore deserted ruins, discover the shocking history of Urami Island and save Emily in this gripping Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure!

name: Maid Idle
summary: You are now a tavern owner in an incredible magical world filled with wonderful maids to hire! Each one is ready to have lots of fun and new experiences with you! Are you ready to manage all of her hearts?

name: Mario 64 x Banjo Kazooie

name: Magebuster: Amorous Augury

name: Maximum Override

name: Maristice

name: Mahjong Tales: Ancient Wisdom

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Lord of Demons
summary:
Lord of Demons is an original maybe scenario.
You play as Estelle, daughter of the King of Demons, Pluton, as well as his heir apparent- as far as she's concerned. Yet the nobles that surround her father's court don't see her as such, and there's only so much you can do as a demon with little to no powers left in their body. Eager to prove herself to the court and her father, she heads into the world of humans and enlists the help of three men who seem to be willing to do anything for her. But in such a world that fears demons as much as they do, Estelle must do as much as she can to not only succeed, but survive. Can Estelle retrieve the powers she lost once upon a time, and return to the demon world as a champion?

Cut off from supplies from home, the colony must fend for itself against starvation, illness, radiation storms, and the inevitable death of irreplaceable machinery.

It is the first game in the Miner Willy series and among the early titles in the platform game genre. The game itself was inspired by the Atari 800 game Miner 2049er. It has since been ported to numerous home computers and video game consoles.

The game received mostly favorable reviews at the time, although it was noted by some that the tie-in to the franchise was quite tenuous and only the graphics, rather than the storyline and gameplay, connected it to the M.A.S.K. franchise.

summary:
Created in Wolf RPG Editor by yako, this is a puzzle game where the player must navigate dungeons, evading enemies and traps in order to save a kidnapped girl from the Evil Lord. The objective is to reach the end of every map before a timer runs out. The player character can destroy any enemy just by body slamming it into oblivion at the cost of HP equal to the level of the enemy. It is also possible to restore 30 HP with the press of a button in exchange for 1 second on the timer.

The player must find the most optimal route in every map, managing health and trying to find all the secrets hidden in the game, while still reaching the exit point of the map on time.

But contrary to Berzerk where you could see every enemy right from entering the screen; in Marauder the enemies only appear on the screen when they are in your line of sight. Therefore the player can be surprised by enemies much more easier. The ultimate goal of Marauder is to destroy the power center which has to be found by the player before the timer at the bottom of the screen runs out. After having destroyed the power center, the game starts anew on a harder difficulty level.

name: Makaimura for WonderSwan
summary:
Makaimura for WonderSwan (Japanese: È≠îÁïåÊùë?, "Demon World Village for WonderSwan") is a game for the WonderSwan developed by Capcom and published by Bandai in 1999 and is part of the Ghosts 'n Goblins franchise.

Sharing similar gameplay to its predecessors, Makaimura also shares enemies, weapons and backgrounds from the previous three games. Unique features include double paths from the second till the fifth levels, swimming in water and a level which requires the player to rotate the wonderswan by 90 degrees as Arthur climbs and swings down a rope in a vertical shaft. Unlike other games, the player is not required to repeat the game after the penultimate level in order to get the one weapon to defeat the final boss Azrael.

name: Madden NFL 23 Mobile Football
summary:
Kickoff for another season on the Gridiron with Madden NFL 23 Mobile Football. Authentic sports game action, real-world events and mobile-first visuals await in the world‚Äôs most immersive NFL Football experience on mobile.
Play Like Mad! Football superstar or armchair QB - touchdown and enjoy the celebrated sport with the same energy as iconic Coach John Madden. Madden 23 brings the highest-quality football experience with new, mobile enhancements and improved game visuals.
Build your Ultimate Team and dominate the competition. Earn football superstars from your favorite NFL teams, including the defending champion Los Angeles Rams! Keep your NFL Superstars from last Season with the soft-season reset.

name: Magic of Endoria
summary:
The strategy-game Magic of Endoria takes place in the fantasy kingdom Endoria. Aeons ago the gods of Endoria were disgusted by the badness in the world and morphed themselves into crystal splinters and retreated into the underworld. Who gets all these splinters becomes the master of Endoria. Now two rival arch mages got aware of this myth and go on the search. You are one of them. 
 
Of course you have to dig deep into the underground to find them. Your responsibility lies in the building. managing and defending of mines. To achieve this you hire employees with different professions: Craftsmen, researchers, mine workers, hauliers and warriors. These people want to see money for their work and they improve their abilities when they become experienced. 
 
During the game you dig new alleys, equip them with traps, research new tools and fight against enemy troops to conquer their alleys. Later you have mutated creatures to your disposal. You spend most of your time on a map with hexagonal fields. There you issue orders and set the routes of your employees. 
 
The in 1995 released CD-ROM version features speech, new background music and an online help. Additionally there is a "light" version of the game which tones down the complexity. 
 
The PC version of Magic Endoria differs from the Commodore 64 version released the previous year in that it is real time instead of turn based.

Now you're pulled up outside the house. The rear mirror's showing two steely eyes. You adjust your hat, stiffen up your collar and grab your badge off the dash. Here goes. You've one last chance so... MAKE IT GOOD

name: Mass Effect 3: Retaliation
summary:
The battle to save the galaxy rages on and a familiar foe returns in the largest downloadable content pack to-date for Mass Effect 3 multiplayer! Mass Effect 3: Retaliation ups the challenge by adding treacherous environmental hazards to existing maps and will introduce the infamous Collectors as a new enemy faction in multiplayer.

Also making its way into the Mass Effect 3: Retaliation pack is a brand-new challenge system that will reward players for their accomplishments in multiplayer. This new feature will give players the ability to track and compare progress across different multiplayer challenges.

The entire pack will include:

New ‚ÄúHazard‚Äù Versions of Existing Maps: Wage war across six maps as a regular rotation of Firebases will be introduced to different hazards and traps. Survive the onslaught of Acid, Lightening, Meltdowns, Sandstorms, Swarms and Whiteouts!

New Deadly Enemy Faction: Prepare to face off against the Collector Praetorian, Scion, Abomination, Trooper, and Captain. Reports have also come in that Cerberus has enlisted the Dragoon to their ranks and the Geth are deploying new Drones to the battlefield.

New Unlockable Weapons: The Collectors have also brought deadly new weapons to the fight: the Collector Assault Rifle, Sub-Machine Gun, and Sniper Rifle. Unlock these weapons and new equipment upgrades to build to your arsenal.

New Class Kits to Unlock: A host of new characters have joined the war to fight this new threat, including the Turian Havoc Soldier and Turian Ghost Infiltrator. Additional class kits will be added as the weeks progress.

New Powerful Upgrades: Outfit your weapons with three new ammo modifications and fortify your gear with five unique upgrades to defeat even the toughest foes.

New Multiplayer Challenge Feature: Think you are the best soldier in the Alliance? Make sure to track your progress in the new ‚ÄúChallenges‚Äù database. Complete various multiplayer assignments and feats of strength to unlock titles and banners to display in-game, and then compare your progress against your friends.

Help Lucas MacGuffin (magician turned thief turned werewolf) sneak and smash his way through this fiendishly addictive comedy-puzzle-adventure for PC and Mac. Winner of the Freeplay Award for Best Game Writing! With hilarious dialogue, charming hand-drawn art and huge replay value, it's perfect for seasoned adventurers and casual gamers alike.

When fugitive magician Lucas MacGuffin bungles a museum robbery, he finds himself magically bound to an ancient amulet and up against a city in full high-tech security lockdown. Suddenly dealing with the worst body hair problems he's ever had. As a human, Lucas is agile and cunning. Wolf Lucas would rather smash anything in his way. Only by transforming between the two forms and cleverly utilising both sets of skills will he stand any chance of lifting his curse.

And with the city's most powerful billionaire after his blood, a jaded Private Investigator on his (now-literal) tail and the rent long overdue, he'll need every ounce of ingenuity he manage.

Along the way he'll need to befriend a hilarious cast of characters, convince the city its most beloved citizen is a terrifying criminal mastermind, and hardest of all, teach his daughter it isn't funny to fill the fridge with dog food.

The 9th core Atelier game and the first of the two Mana Khemia games.

The game's main focus is on the lead protagonist, Vayne Aurelius, the son of a legendary alchemist named Theofratus who had disappeared sometime after Vayne's birth. Since then, Vayne has led the life of a hermit, his only companion being a Mana in cat form named Sulpher. Vayne is invited to the Al-Revis Academy for alchemy training by Zeppel, one of the professors. He is quickly indoctrinated into the school by becoming part of an atelier led by Flay Gunnar (an older student who is known as The Defender of Justice) along with two other students, Jess (a clumsy girl who is nevertheless adept at alchemy), and Nikki (an impulsive beastgirl). They are soon joined by Pamela (the school's resident ghost), Anna (an 11-year-old master swordsman), Roxis (the son of a famous family of alchemists who is quickly forced to join the workshop by Flay), and Muppy (an alien the group discovers on an assignment). The eight of them are able to succeed at completing assignments, learn the skills of alchemy, and allow the workshop to prosper.

name: Mario Kart Arcade GP
summary:
Mario Kart Arcade GP is an arcade-only iteration of Nintendo's Mario Kart series, developed by Namco. Designed for the Triforce arcade board (also used for F-Zero AX), players can race as one of eleven characters on twenty-four tracks. On certain machines, for an additional fee, a player's data can be saved on a magnetic card which can be inserted into the machine again later to retain unlocked items and records. Nintendo's limited role of development was mainly isolated to ensuring that it was a worthy title for the established franchise.

This game's arcade cabinet houses a camera that will take a photograph of the player's face. The photo can be customized and then will be displayed above the player's character during multiplayer races.

The game is noted for being the first Mario Kart to feature playable crossover characters: Namco's Pac-Man, Ms. Pac-Man and Blinky. The game's sequel also featured Mametchi, a character from the Tamagotchi games. The third installment included Don from the Taiko no Tatsujin franchise.

name: Magical Drop
summary:
Magical Drop is a 1995 competitive arcade puzzle game created by Data East Corporation. It is the inaugural game of the Magical Drop series. Magical Drop is based on a game called Drop-Drop created by Russ Ltd, a Russian company.

The arcade game received an updated version named Magical Drop Plus 1! that features aesthetic improvements and also introduces a "Solo Play" mode. Magical Drop Plus 1! was released in North America and Europe as Chain Reaction; in this version, the puzzle pieces are changed from spherical Drops to various items (such as food or celestial bodies) and the character-unique voice acting is replaced by a single male narrator.

All versions of the original arcade game were developed for Data East's "MLC" arcade hardware.

summary:
Malkari is a 4X (explore, expand, exploit, exterminate) space strategy game in the tradition of Reach for the Stars and Master of Orion.

However, there is a new twist on the traditional concept here: your solar system has been devastated by a runaway star, ripping the old planets apart into a vast clutter of asteroids. Making things more difficult for long-range planning, the asteroids are all moving at their own particular speeds, so the planet next door may be on the other side of the system a hundred turns from now!

Now that your people have emerged from their long cryo-sleep, you must resume the old struggles against rival guilds...all the while trying just to survive in the strange new Malkari system.

It features 31 tracks across 11 countries from all over the world, featuring cities, mountain roads as well as off-road tracks. You can play in arcade mode (to unlock tracks), player mode and championship mode. Player mode allows you to play against a friend or set personal records and in championship mode you play through all tracks. There are four difficulties to select from in the championship mode.
